Turk_Translation_1: According to a report by Mehr News Agency, Iranian President Dr. Mahmud Ahmadi-nejad, severely criticized Arab leaders' silence over Israel's aggression and its oppression and injustice in the Gaza Strip, and has expressed disappointment.
Turk_Translation_2: The report of the news agency Mehr says that President of Iran Doctor Ahmadinejad has expressed sorrow while strongly criticizing the silence of the Arab leaders on the Israeli aggression and its brutalities in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the report of Mehr News Agency, Iran's President Dr. Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has intensely criticized and expressed regret at Arab leaders' silence over Israeli oppression and brutality in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_4: According to a report from the news agency Mehr, Iran's president Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has strongly criticized the silence of Arab leaders over Israeli aggression and atrocities and has expressed regrets over it.

Urdu: صدراحمد ی نژاد نے عرب ممالک اور ان کے سر براہوں کی غزہ پر اسرائیل کی وحشیانہ کارروائی پر خاموشی پر تعجب کا اظہارکرتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ اسرائیل فلسطینی عوام کاہو لوکاسٹ کر رہا ہے فلسطینی بچوں ، عورتوں اور عام شہریوں کو اپنی بربریت کا نشانہ بنا رہا ہے اور عرب رہنماؤن نے حتی ایک بیان بھی جاری نہیں کیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad, expressing astonishment at the silence of Arab countries and their leaders over Israel's barbaric activities in Gaza, has said that Israel is enacting a holocaust upon the Palestinian people, making Palestinian children, women, and civilians targets of its barbarianism, and so far Arab leaders have not even issued one statement.
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad said, while expressing his astonishment over the silence of the Arab countries and their heads on the barbaric operation of Israel in Gaza, that Israel is engaging in a holocaust of the Palestinians and making Palestinian children, women, and common citizens a target of its barbarism, and the Arab leaders have not issued even a single statement.
Turk_Translation_3: Expressing his shock over the silence of Arab countries' leaders on Israel's barbaric attacks on Gaza, President Ahmadinejad said that Israel is engaged in the holocaust of Palestinian people and is targeting Palestinian children, women and civilians with its barbaric acts while the Arab leaders have not even issued a statement.
Turk_Translation_4: Expressing surprise at the silence of Arab countries and their leaders concerning Israel's aggression in Gaza, President Ahmadinejad said that Israel was committing the holocaust of the Palestinian people and committing barbaric acts against Palestinian children, women and civilians, but Arab leaders have not issued a single statement about it.

Urdu: صدر احمدی نژاد نےکہا ہے کہ اسرائیل کے خلاف تمام عرب ممالک متحد ہوجائیں اور غزہ کے مظلوم مسلمانوں کو اسرائیل کے شر اور اس کے ظلم وستم سے بچائیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad has said that all Arab countries should unite against Israel and save the oppressed Muslims of Gaza from Israel's wickedness and its oppression and injustice.
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad said that all Arab countries should unite against Israel and save the oppressed Muslims of Gaza from the evil and brutalities of Israel.
Turk_Translation_3: President Ahmadinejad has asked all the Arab countries to be united against Israel and rescue the oppressed Muslims from the cruelty and ghastly acts of Israel in Gaza
Turk_Translation_4: President Ahmadinejad said that all Arab states should unite against Israel and save the oppressed Muslims of Gaza from Israeli evil and oppression.

Urdu: احمدی نژاد سعودی عرب کے بادشاہ غزہ میں اسرائیل کی طرف سے انسانی نسل کشی کےبارے میں اپنا مؤقف واضح کریں
Turk_Translation_1: Ahmadi-nejad: King of Saudi Arabia Should Define His Stand on Israel's Genocide in Gaza
Turk_Translation_2: The King of Saudi Arabia should Clarify his Viewpoint on Human Genocide by Israel in Gaza: Ahmadinejad
Turk_Translation_3: Ahmadinejad Asks Saudi King to Make His Position Clear over Israeli Genocide in Gaza
Turk_Translation_4: Ahmadinejad: Saudi king should clarify his position concerning Israeli genocide in Gaza

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی کی رپورٹ کے مطابق صدر محمود احمدی نژاد نے سعودی عرب کے فرمانروا ملک عبداللہ کے نام اپنے پیغام میں کہا ہے کہ سعودی عرب کے مسلمان بادشاہ کا غزہ میں انسانی نسل کشی پر سکوت اور غزہ میں معصوم بچوں اور عورتوں کے قتل عام پر خاموشی دشمنان اسلام کی حوصلہ افزائی کا سبب بنی ہوئی ہے
Turk_Translation_1: According to a report by Mehr News Agency, President Mahmoud Ahmadi-nejad, in his message to Saudi Arabia's sovereign King Abdullah, has said that the calmness of Saudi Arabia's Muslim king over the genocide in Gaza and his silence over the massacre of innocent women and children in Gaza are the reason for the encouragement of the enemies of Islam.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the report of the news agency Mehr, President Ahmedinajad has said in a message to the ruler of Saudi Arabia, Malik Abdullah, that the silence of the Muslim King of Saudi Arabia over human genocide in Gaza and the silence over the massacre of innocent children and women in Gaza has become a cause of encouragement to the enemies of Islam.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the Mehr News Agency, President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad has said in his message to the Saudi monarch Abdullah that silence of Saudi Arabian Muslim King on the genocide and massacre of innocent children and women in Gaza is encouragement for the enemies of Islam.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the news agency Mehr, President Ahmadinejad, in a message to Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah, said that the monarch's silence over the Israeli genocide in Gaza and the massacre of innocent women and children were a source of encouragement to anti-Islam forces.

Urdu: صدر احمدی نژاد نے پیغام میں کہا ہے کہ آپ غزہ کے بارے میں اپنا صحیح مؤقف اور مظلوموں کی حمایت کرکے واضح کردیں تاکہ دشمنوں کی طرف سےاسلامی محاذ میں اختلافات ڈالنے کی کوششیں ناکام ہوجائیں
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad said in the message, "You should define your stand and support the oppressed in Gaza so that the efforts of the enemies to create rifts in the Islamic front will fail."
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad has said in his message that you should clarify your correct point of views about Gaza by supporting the oppressed so that the efforts at creating differences in the Islamic Front by enemies may fail.
Turk_Translation_3: President Ahmadinejad has asked the Saudi king to clarify his correct stance on Gaza and support the oppressed people to fail the plans of the enemy who want to create divisions in the Muslims front.
Turk_Translation_4: Ahmadinejad, in his message, asked the Saudi king to express a righteous stance on Gaza and support the cause of this oppressed people in order to frustrate the attempts of enemies to create differences among Muslims.

Urdu: صدر احمدی نژاد نے اپنے پیغام میں کہا ہے کہ آپ کو معلوم ہے کہ 19 دنوں سے اسرائیل غزہ میں انسانی نسل کشی پر تلا ہوا ہے بے گناہ معصوم بچوں کا قتل عام کررہا ہے گھروں ، مسجدوں ، اسکولوں اور ہسپتالوں پر وحشیانہ بمباری کررہا ہے غزہ میں نہتےمسلمانوں کا صہیونی حکومت بری طرح قتل عام کررہی ہے ان حالات میں آپ جیسے رہنماؤں کی خاموشی سے اسرائيل کے حوصلے بلند ہورہے
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad has said in his message to the king, "You know that for nineteen days now Israel has set out to commit genocide in Gaza, is massacring innocent children, and is savagely bombing homes, mosques, schools, and hospitals. The Zionist government is savagely slaughtering unarmed Muslims in Gaza. Under these circumstances Israel's determination is increasing because of the silence of leaders like you."
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad has said in his message that you know that Israel has been carrying out human genocide in Gaza for the last 19 days, killing innocent children, bombing houses, mosques, schools, and hospitals insensibly, and the Jewish government is massacring innocent Muslims badly in Gaza. In this situation, the silence of leaders like you has emboldened the Israelis, making their morale high.
Turk_Translation_3: President Ahmadinejad has said in his message that, you are aware that Israel is bent upon committing genocide in Gaza for last 19 days; it is massacring innocent children and is carrying out barbaric bombardment on houses, mosques, schools and hospitals; the Zionist government is openly murdering helpless Muslims. In circumstances like these, the silence of leaders like you is a source of encouragement for Israel.
Turk_Translation_4: In his message, Ahmadinejad said, "You are aware that Israel has been committing genocide in Gaza for the last 19 days, is carrying out the massacre of innocent children and bombing houses, mosques, schools and hospitals. The Zionist regime is busy perpetrating the mass murder of innocent Muslims in Gaza, and the silence of leaders of your stature under these circumstance is boosting Israel's morale."

Urdu: صدر احمدی نژاد نے ملک عبداللہ سے کہا کہ ونزوئلا اور بولیوی جیسے غیر اسلامی ممالک نے اسرائيل کے خلاف ٹھوس اقدام کئے ہیں تو آپ سے تو ان ممالک سے بہتراقدامات کی توقعات ہیں
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad said to King Abdullah, "If non-Muslim countries like Venezuela and Bolivia have taken concrete steps against Israel, how much more is to be expected from you."
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad said to Malik Abdullah that when non-Muslim countries like Venezuela and Bolivia have taken solid steps against Israel, then better steps compared to the steps taken by those countries are expected from you.
Turk_Translation_3: President Ahmadinejad said to Malik Abdullah that the non-Islamic countries like Venezuela and Bolivia have taken concrete steps against Israel, therefore, you are expected to take stronger actions than those countries.
Turk_Translation_4: Ahmadinejad said that non-Muslim countries like Venezuela and Bolivia have taken concrete steps against Israel, so Saudi Arabia should have taken better steps than those countries.

Urdu: صدر احمدی نژاد نےکہا کہ غزہ میں کامیابی فلسطینیوں کے قدم چومے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Ahmadi-nejad said that Palestinians will be successful in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_2: President Ahmadinejad said that the Palestinians will be victorious in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_3: President Ahmadinejad said that the Palestinians would be victorious in Gaza
Turk_Translation_4: Ahmadinejad said that the Palestinians would emerge victorious in Gaza,

Urdu: ور مظلوم کو ظالم پر فتح نصیب ہوگی اور یہ اللہ تعالی کا وعدہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And the oppressed will be granted victory over the oppressor and that this is God's promise.
Turk_Translation_2: And the oppressed will prevail over the oppressor and this is God's promise.
Turk_Translation_3: And the oppressed will overpower the oppressor, and it is God's promise.
Turk_Translation_4: and the oppressed would trounce the oppressor, as God has promised.

Urdu: صدر جارج بش دہشتگردی امریکہ کے لئے اب بھی ایک خطرہ ہے
Turk_Translation_1: President George Bush: Terrorism Is Still a Threat for America
Turk_Translation_2: Terrorism Still Poses Danger to America: President George Bush
Turk_Translation_3: President George Bush: Terrorism is still a threat to America
Turk_Translation_4: Terrorism still poses danger to US: President Bush

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی نے جرمن خبررساں ادارے کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ امریکی صدر جارج بش نے اپنی الوداعی تقریر میں اپنے جانشین باراک اوبامہ اور قوم سے خطاب کرتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ اگر چہ سات سال پہلے کی نسبت امریکہ آج محفوظ ہے لیکن دہشت گردی کا خطرہ آج بھی امریکہ سر منڈلا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mehr News Agency has quoted from a German news organization that the American President George Bush, addressing his successor Barack Obama and the nation in his farewell speech, said that even though, as compared to seven years ago, America is safe today, the threat of terrorism still hangs over America's head.
Turk_Translation_2: The news agency Mehr has quoted with reference to German news agency that American President George Bush has said, while addressing to his successor Barack Obama and the nation in his farewell address, that although America is safe today as compared to 7 years ago, the danger of terrorism is still dangling on America's head.
Turk_Translation_3: Mehr News Agency has quoted a German News Agency as saying that American President George Bush, in his farewell speech addressed to his successor Barack Obama and the nation, said that America is safer as compared to seven years ago, but the threat of terrorism is still looming over its head.
Turk_Translation_4: The news agency Mehr quoted a German news agency report that US President George W. Bush, in his farewell address to his successor Barack Obama and the nation, said that while the US was safer than 6-7 years ago, terrorism still poses a threat to it.

Urdu: بش نے کہا کہ امریکہ پر حملہ کرنے کیلیے دہشتگرد دشمن صبر سے تاک لگائے بیٹھے ہیں اور وہ امریکہ پر حملہ کرنے کا مصمم ارادہ رکھتے اور امریکہ کو بھی اپنی سلامتی سے غافل نہیں رہنا چاہیے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Bush said that the terrorist enemies are waiting patiently to attack America, they have a firm resolve to attack America, and America should not be careless about its security.
Turk_Translation_2: Bush said that the terrorist enemy is sitting patiently for an ambush and they are determined to attack America and America should not remain oblivious of its security.
Turk_Translation_3: Bush said that the terrorist enemies are sitting patiently, watching, waiting to attack America and they have are determined to attack America. and America should also not be careless of its own security.
Turk_Translation_4: Bush said that terrorist enemies were patiently looking for a chance to strike the United States again and they are determined to do so, but Washington is also not oblivious to its security.

Urdu: امریکی صدر نے غزہ میں لاکھوں فلسطینیوں کے غم و آلام کو فرموش کرتے ہوئے اپنی جارحانہ اور غلط پالیسیوں کا دفاع کیا امریکہ کے صدر نےکہا کہ امریکہ آج بھی آزادی کا سب سے بڑا حامی ملک ہے البتہ مبصرین امریکی کے منفور صدر کے ان بیانات کو حقیقت تسلیم نہیں کرتے ہیں کیونکہ امریکہ نہ تو آزادی کا علمبردار ہے اور نہ ہی انسانی حقوق کا حامی ہے بلکہ امریکہ دنیا میں سب سے زیادہ شریر ملک ہے جو اسرائیل جیسی خونخوار حکومت کی نہ صرف حامیت کررہا ہے بلکہ اس جرائم میں براہ راست شریک ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Ignoring the pain and suffering of hundreds of thousands of Palestinians in Gaza, the American President defended his aggressive and wrongful policies. America's President said that America continues to be the biggest proponent of freedom, although critics don't accept these statements of America's hateful President as reality because America is neither a champion for freedom nor a supporter of human rights; instead, America is the most evil country in the world, not only protecting a bloodthirsty government like that of Israel, but directly involved in its crimes.
Turk_Translation_2: The American president defended his aggressive and wrong policies while putting aside the grief and misery of hundreds of thousands of Palestinians. The American president said that America is still the biggest country supporting freedom; however, the observers don't accept that these statements of the hated American president are true, because America is neither a flag-bearer of freedom nor is it a supporter of human rights. Instead, America is the most mischievous country in the world, supporting not only a predator government like that of Israel, but also directly participating in these crimes.
Turk_Translation_3: Ignoring the miseries and sufferings of millions of Palestinians, the American President defended his aggressive and wrong policies. The American President said that the United States was still a major champion of freedom of nations, but analysts, however, do not accept the truth of these claims by the despised American President because the America is neither a proponent of freedom nor supporter of human rights, but it is the world's biggest mischievous country which is not only supporting an oppressive government like Israel but is also a direct partner in its crimes.
Turk_Translation_4: Ignoring the suffering of hundreds of thousands of Palestinians in Gaza, the US President defended his aggressive and unjust policies, saying that the United States was still a proponent of freedom. However, analysts do not accept the authenticity of these claims, as the US is neither a champion of freedom nor a champion of human rights, but rather, the United States is the country that does the most mischief in the world, not only backing the oppressive regime in Israel but also being an equal partner in its crimes.

Urdu: اسرائيل بچوں ، عورتوں اور عام شہریوں کا قتل عام کررہا ہے اور امریکہ کا صدر اسے شاباش کہہ رہا ہے یہ امریکی انسانیت اور آزادی جسے دنیا غزء میں اور دنیا کے دیگر مقامات پرمشاہدہ کررہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Israel is massacring children, women, and civilians, and America's President is condoning this; this is the American freedom and humaneness that the world is observing in Gaza and other areas.
Turk_Translation_2: Israel is carrying out the massacres of children, women, and common citizens, and the American President is applauding her; the world is watching this American humanity and freedom in Gaza and other places of the world.
Turk_Translation_3: Israel is massacring children, women and civilians, and the American President is applauding it. This is the American brand of freedom and humanity that the world is is witnessing in Gaza and other parts of the world.
Turk_Translation_4: Israel is committing the massacre of children, women and civilians and the US President is backing it; this is America's love for humanity and freedom that the world is witnessing in Gaza and other parts of the world.

Urdu: اسامہ حمدان فلسطین میں مقاومت جاری رہے گی
Turk_Translation_1: Osama Hamdan: Resistance Will Continue in Palestine
Turk_Translation_2: War Will Continue in Palestine: Osama Hamdan
Turk_Translation_3: Osama Hamdan: Resistance to continue in Palestine
Turk_Translation_4: Resistance in Palestine will continue: Usama Hamdan

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی کی رپورٹ کے مطابق لبنان میں حماس کے نمائندے اسامہ حمدان نے فرانسیسی خبررساں ایجنسی کے ساتھ گفتگو کرتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ اسرائيل کی جانب سے یکطرفہ جنگ بندی بین الاقوامی جامع فائر بندی کی کوششوں کے خلاف ہے انھوں نے کہا جب تک اسراغيل غزہ میں موجود رہے گا اس وقت تک یک طرف جنگ بندی بے معنی رہے گی
Turk_Translation_1: According to a report by Mehr News Agency, Osama Hamdan, a representative of Hamas, while talking with a French news agency in Lebanon, said that a unilateral cease-fire from Israel is against the collective international efforts towards a cease-fire. He said that as long as Israel is present in Gaza, a unilateral cease-fire will be meaningless.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the news agency Mehr, Hamas representative in Lebanon, Osama Hamdan has said, while talking to a French news agency, that a one-sided ceasefire by Israel is against the international efforts for a comprehensive ceasefire. He said that as long as Israel remains in Gaza, a one-sided ceasefire will remain meaningless.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the Mehr News Agency, Hamas representative in Lebanon Osama Hamdan told French News Agency that the unilateral ceasefire by Israel is violation of international efforts of comprehensive ceasefire. He said the unilateral ceasefire will be meaningless if Israeli remains in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the news agency Mehr, the Hamas representative in Lebanon, Usama Hamdan, told Agence France Presse that Israel's unilateral ceasefire ran counter to international efforts for a comprehensive ceasefire. He said that a unilateral ceasefire was meaningless as long as Israeli troops were present in Gaza.

Urdu: انھوں نے کہا کہ یک طرف جنگ بندی شکست سے بچنے کے لئے اسرائیل کی ناکام کوشش ہے حمدان نے کہا کہ اگر اسرائیل پائدار امن چاہتا ہے کہ اسے محاصر ختم کرنے کے ساتھ حماس کے شرائط کو قبول کرنا پڑےگا
Turk_Translation_1: He said that the unilateral cease-fire is a useless attempt by Israel to avoid defeat. Hamdan said that if Israel wants lasting peace then it will have to discontinue the siege and accept Hamas's conditions.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that the one-sided ceasefire is Israel's effort in vain to avoid the defeat. Hamadan said that if Israel wants a durable peace it has to end the siege as well as accept the conditions of Hamas.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that the unilateral ceasefire was a futile attempt by Israel to avoid defeat. If Israel wants a long-lasting peace, it has to lift the siege as well as accept the terms of Hamas.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that the unilateral ceasefire was a failed Israeli attempt to avert defeat. Hamdan said that if Israel wanted a durable peace, it would have to end the blockade and accept the demands of Hamas.

Urdu: لبنان میں حماس کے رہنما نے واضح کیا کہ غزہ پٹی میں اسرائیلی فوج کے باقی رہتے ہوئے اگر اسرائیل نے یکطرفہ فائر بندی کی تو اس کے خلاف مزاحمت جاری رہے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Hamas's leader in Lebanon clarified that if Israel calls for a unilateral cease-fire while its army remains in the Gaza Strip, then opposition will continue against it.
Turk_Translation_2: The Hamas leader in Lebanon made clear that, with the presence of the Israeli army in the Gaza Strip, if Israel ended the one-sided ceasefire, resistance would continue against it.
Turk_Translation_3: In Lebanon Hamas leader made it clear that if Israel goes for unilateral ceasefire in the presence of its troops in Gaza Strip, resistance will continue against it.
Turk_Translation_4: Hamdan made it clear if Israel kept its troops in the Gaza Strip after announcing a unilateral ceasefire, resistance would continue against it.

Urdu: بیروت میں اہل غزہ کے ساتھ یکجہتی کانفرنس سے خطاب کرتے ہوئے اسامہ حمدان نے یورپی ممالک سے اسرائیل کے ساتھ تعلقات منقطع کرلینے کامطالبہ کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: While addressing the Unity Conference with fellow Gazans in Beirut, Osama Hamdan demanded that European countries discontinue relations with Israel.
Turk_Translation_2: Addressing a conference for solidarity with Gaza people in Beirut, Osama Hamdan demanded of the European countries to sever relations with Israel.
Turk_Translation_3: Addressing a Gaza Solidarity Conference in Beirut, Osama Hamdan asked the European countries to sever relations with Israel.
Turk_Translation_4: Addressing a conference for solidarity with the Gaza people in Beirut, Hamdan urged European countries to sever their ties with Israel.

Urdu: حماس کے رہنما نے کہا کہ شہدا اور زخمیوں کی بڑھتی ہوئی ہوئی تعداد سے ہمارے عزائم اور حوصلے اور بلند ہوں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The leader of Hamas said that "with the increasing number of martyred and wounded, our determination and courage will grow stronger."
Turk_Translation_2: The Hamas representative said that the increasing number of martyrs and the wounded would enhance our morale and courage.
Turk_Translation_3: Hamas leader said that, the rise in number of the martyred and injured will further strengthen our resolve.
Turk_Translation_4: Hamdan added that the rise in the number of martyrs would give a further boost to morale and resolve.

Urdu: انہوں نے فلسطینی عوام پر سے کہا کہ وہ دشمن کے خلاف جنگ میں چٹان بن کر مزاحمت پرڈٹے رہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: He told the Palestinian public to take a rock-solid stand in the resistance against the enemy in the war.
Turk_Translation_2: He asked the Palestinian people to stay firm and give rock-hard resistance to the enemy in the war.
Turk_Translation_3: He asked the Palestinian people to stand like a concrete wall of resistance, in the war against the enemy.
Turk_Translation_4: He urged Palestinians to put up a stiff resistance in the war against the enemy.

Urdu: پاکستان پاکستان کے قبائلی علاقے شمالی وزیرستان میں طالبان نے چھ افراد کو قتل کردیا ہے
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan: Taliban Have Killed Six People in Pakistan's North Waziristan Tribal Area
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan: In Pakistan, Taliban Kill Six People in North Waziristan of Tribal Areas.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan: Taliban Kill 6 people in Northern Waziristan Tribal Area of Pakistan
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan: Taliban killed six in North Waziristan tribal area of Pakistan

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی نے رائٹرز کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ پاکستان کے قبائلی علاقے شمالی وزیرستان میں دو افغان شہری اور چار پاکستانیوں کو طالبان نے جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کر دیاہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mehr News Agency has quoted from Reuters that in Pakistan's North Waziristan tribal area the Taliban has killed two Afghan citizens and four Pakistanis accused of spying.
Turk_Translation_2: The news agency Mehr has quoted with reference to Reuters that in the tribal area of Pakistan, North Waziristan, the Taliban have killed two Afghan citizens and four Pakistanis under the allegation of spying.
Turk_Translation_3: Mehr News Agency has quoted Reuters as saying that Taliban have killed four Pakistanis and two Afghan nationals, on the accusation of spying, in Pakistan's tribal area of Northern Waziristan
Turk_Translation_4: Quoting Reuters, the news agency Mehr said that the Taliban have killed two Afghans and four Pakistanis in the North Waziristan tribal area of Pakistan on charges of spying.

Urdu: اطلاعات کے مطابق مقامی لوگوں کو منگل کی صبح تحصیل میرعلی کے علاقے تحصیل چوک میں چار لاشیں ملی ہیں جنہیں گولیاں مار کر ہلاک کیاگیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to reports, local people found four dead bodies at the Tehsil Intersection, in the area of Tehsil Mir Ali on Tuesday morning who had been killed by gun shot,
Turk_Translation_2: According to the information, on Tuesday morning, in the area of Tehsil Mir Ali, the local people found four dead bodies who were shot dead.
Turk_Translation_3: According to information, on Tuesday morning the locals found four bodies in Tehsil Chowk area of Mir Ali.
Turk_Translation_4: According to reports, the locals found four bodies in the Chowk area of Mir Ali Monday morning. The individuals had been shot dead.

Urdu: جبکہ دو لاشیں صدر مقام میرانشاہ سے ملی ہیں جنہیں بازار کی ایک مارکیٹ میں پھینک دیاگیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: while two dead bodies were found in the capital Miranshah that had been thrown in one area of the market.
Turk_Translation_2: Whereas two bodies have been found from the capital place Miranshah, which were thrown in the market of a bazaar.
Turk_Translation_3: while two bodies were found in the headquarter Miranshah, that were thrown into a market.
Turk_Translation_4: Two bodies were recovered from a market in Miran Shah, the capital of North Waziristan.

Urdu: لاشوں کے پاس اردو میں لکھے گئے خطوط بھی ملے ہیں جس میں دعویٰ کیا گیا ہے کہ مقتولین جاسوسی کرتے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Letters written in Urdu were also found with the dead bodies in which it is claimed that the murder victims were spies.
Turk_Translation_2: Letters also, written in Urdu, have been found in which it has been claimed that the victims were engaged in spying.
Turk_Translation_3: Letters written in Urdu were found near the bodies which claimed that that the murdered had been spying.
Turk_Translation_4: Letters written in Urdu were also found near the bodies, claiming that the killed individuals were spies.

Urdu: دو ہفتے قبل بھی شمالی وزیرستان کے صدر مقام میرانشاہ میں دو افغان باشندوں کو جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کردیا گیا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Two weeks ago two Afghan natives accused of spying were also killed in Miranshah, the capital city in North Waziristan.
Turk_Translation_2: Two weeks earlier too, in the capital of North Waziristan, Miranshah, two Afghan citizens were killed under the allegation of spying.
Turk_Translation_3: Two weeks ago as well, two Afghan nationals, accused of spying, were killed in Miranshah, the capital of Northern Waziristan.
Turk_Translation_4: Two weeks earlier, two Afghan nationals were killed in the Miran Shah area of North Waziristan on charges of spying.

Urdu: گزشتہ بارہ دنوں میں پندرہ افراد کو امریکہ کے لیے جاسوسی کے الزام میں ہلاک کیا جاچکا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the past twelve days, fifteen people accused of spying for America have been killed.
Turk_Translation_2: In the last twelve days, fifteen people have been killed under the allegation of spying for America.
Turk_Translation_3: Fifteen people have been killed on charges of spying for the United States during last twelve days.
Turk_Translation_4: At least 15 persons have been killed on charges of spying for the United States over the past 12 days.

Urdu: واضح رہے کہ جنوبی اور شمالی وزیرستان میں گزشہ چھ سال کے دوران ایک سو سے زیادہ افراد کو جاسوسی کے الزام میں قتل کیا گیا ہے طالبان پر الزآم ہے کہ وہ اس قسم کے قتل کیسوں میں ملوث ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: During the past six years more than one hundred people accused of spying have been killed in North and South Waziristan. The Taliban has been accused of being involved in these types of murder cases.
Turk_Translation_2: It should remain clear that in South and North Waziristan, during the past six years, more than one hundred people have been killed under the allegation of spying. The Taliban are alleged to be involved in these types of cases.
Turk_Translation_3: It is worth mentioning that more than 100 people, accused of spying, have been killed in Southern and Northern Waziristan during last six years. Taliban are accused of being involved in such murder cases.
Turk_Translation_4: It may be recalled that more than 100 persons have been killed on charges of spying in South and North Waziristan over the past six years. The Taliban are accused of being involved in these killings.

Urdu: باراک اوبامہ گوانتانا موبے کی بدنام زمانہ جیل کو بند کرنے کے حکم نامے پر دستخط متوقع
Turk_Translation_1: Barack Obama's Signature Expected on Order to Shut Down Guantanamo Bay's Infamous Prison
Turk_Translation_2: Barack Obama: Signing on the Orders to Close Ignominious Prison in Guantanamo Bay Expected
Turk_Translation_3: Barack Obama: Likely to Sign Orders for Closure of Guantanamo Bay
Turk_Translation_4: Barack Obama expected to sign order to close notorious Guantanamo Bay prison

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی نے ذرائع کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ امریکی صدر آج گوانتانا موبے کی بدنام زمانہ جیل کو بند کرنے کے حکم نامے پر دستخط کرینگے
Turk_Translation_1: Mehr News Agency has quoted from sources that the American President will sign the order today for shutting down the infamous Guantanamo Bay prison.
Turk_Translation_2: The news agency Mehr has copied with the reference of sources that American President will sign today the order to close the ignominious prison of Guantanamo Bay.
Turk_Translation_3: Mehr News Agency has quoted sources as saying that the American president will sign an order for closing the notorious Guantanamo Bay Jail.
Turk_Translation_4: The news agency Mehr, while quoting sources, said that the US President would sign an order to close the notorious Guantanamo Bay prison.

Urdu: نئے امریکی صدر باراک حسین اوبامہ نے اپنی انتخابی مہم کے وعدوں پر سطحی طور پرعمل درآمد شروع کردیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The new American President Barack Hussein Obama has started to take steps toward fulfilling his campaign promises.
Turk_Translation_2: The new American President Barack Hussein Obama has started acting superficially on the promises made during his election campaign.
Turk_Translation_3: The new American President Barack Obama, on the surface, has started implementing his election campaign pledges.
Turk_Translation_4: The new US President Barack Obama has apparently begun delivering on his election promises.

Urdu: اس سلسلے میں صدر اوبامہ نے عراق سے امریکی فوج کی واپسی کے لئے منصوبہ بنانے کی ہدایت کردی ہے ، جبکہ آج امریکی صدر گوانتانا موبے کی بدنام زمانہ جیل کو بند کرنے کے حکم نامے پر دستخط کرینگے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Along these lines, President Obama has instructed Iraq to make plans for the departure of American troops, while today the American President will sign the order for shutting down the infamous Guantanamo Bay prison.
Turk_Translation_2: In this connection he has issued instructions for making a plan for the return of American troops from Iraq; whereas, today, the American President will sign the order to close the ignominious prison of Guantanamo Bay.
Turk_Translation_3: In this regard, President Obama has directed preparation for the plan of withdrawal of American troops from Iraq, whereas today, the American president will sign orders to close the notorious Guantanamo Bay Jail.
Turk_Translation_4: In that regard, President Obama has also ordered the preparation of a withdrawal plan for Iraq, and today he will sign the order to shut down Guantanamo Bay.

Urdu: توقع کی جا رہی ہے کہ صدر باراک اوبامہ اس حکم پرممکنہ طور پر آج دستخط کرنے والے ہیں جس کے تحت گوانتامو کا قید خانہ ایک سال کے اندر اندر بند ہو جائے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: It is expected that President Barack Obama may sign the order today under which Guantanamo's prison will close within one year.
Turk_Translation_2: It is expected that today President Barack Obama is possibly going to sign the order according to which Guantanamo Bay prison will be closed within a year.
Turk_Translation_3: It is expected that possibly today President Barack Obama will sign the orders under which Guantánamo Bay Jail will be closed down within a year.
Turk_Translation_4: Obama is expected to sign the order today, under which the prison will be closed within one year.

Urdu: اس کے علاوہ وائٹ ہاؤس سے مشتبہ دہشت گردوں سے تفتیش کے طریقوں پر نظرِ ثانی اور قیدیوں سے بد کلامی پر پابندی کے احکامات بھی جاری ہونے کا امکان ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In addition, orders are expected to be issued from the White House about revising interrogation techniques with terrorist suspects and there is a possibility of orders being issued against foul-mouthing prisoners.
Turk_Translation_2: Besides this, orders for the review of the investigative methods on suspected terrorists and the ban on the use of foul language with the prisoners are also expected to be issued from the White House.
Turk_Translation_3: Apart from that, instructions are likely to be issued from the White House to review the interrogation techniques used on terror suspects and to ban abusive language against the prisoners.
Turk_Translation_4: Moreover, the White House is likely to issue directives for reviewing tactics for interrogating terror suspects and a ban on the abuse of prisoners.

Urdu: صدر باراک اوبامہ نے اپنی صدارت کے پہلے دن الیکشن کے وعدوں کو پورا کرنے پر کام شروع کر دیا اور سب سے پہلے اپنی حکومت کے عمل اور فعل کو شفاف بنانے کے اقدامات کئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Barack Obama started working on fulfilling his election promises on the first day of his presidency and has begun by taking steps toward making the procedures and actions of his government transparent.
Turk_Translation_2: President Barack Obama started working on fulfilling the election promises on the first day of his presidency and has taken steps for making the actions and working of his government transparent as the priority.
Turk_Translation_3: On the first day in office, Barack Obama has began fulfilling his election pledges, and firstly, he has taken steps to ensure transparency in government's actions.
Turk_Translation_4: On the first day of his presidency, Obama has begun making good on his election promises and has consciously taken steps to make the affairs of his administration transparent.

Urdu: مبصرین کا کہنا ہے کہ امریکی صدر نے عالمی سطح پر امریکہ کی گرتی ہوئی ساکھ کو بچانے کی کوششیں شروع کردی ہیں لیکن انھیں اس میں کامیابی ملنا بہت مشکل ہے کیونکہ جب تک امریکہ اسرائیل کی خونخوار حکومت کی حمایت پر کمر بستہ ہے تب تک اس سے کسی اچھے کام کی توقع نہیں کی جاسکتی اگر امریکہ دنیا میں اپنی ساکھ کو بچانا چاہتا ہے تو اسے اسرائیل کی حامیت سے دست بردار ہوجانا چاہیے اور اس کے جرائم میں شریک نہیں ہونا چاہیے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Critics say that the American President has started to make efforts to save America's declining credibility on a global level, but it is very difficult for him to succeed because as long as America is prepared to support Israel's bloodthirsty government, it can't be expected to do any good. If America wants to save its credibility in the world, then it should desist from supporting Israel and being an accomplice in its crimes.
Turk_Translation_2: The observers say that the American President has started making efforts to save the falling reputation of America on the international level, but it is very difficult for him to succeed in it, because as long as America is supporting the predator government of Israel, nothing good can be expected from her. If America wants to save its reputation, then it has to withdraw from supporting Israel and should not participate in her crimes.
Turk_Translation_3: According to analysts, the American president has started attempts to save America's falling image on the global level but it is difficult for him to be successful in this task. As long as America continues to support the murderous regime in Israel, one cannot expect anything good of it. If the America wants to save its image, it should keep itself away from supporting Israel and should not become part of its crimes.
Turk_Translation_4: Analysts are of the view that the efforts of the US President are aimed at saving America's deteriorating image in the world, but it will be extremely difficult for him to succeed in this task, because as long as the US continues to support the oppressive Israeli regime, nothing good can come of it. If the United States wants to save its reputation in the international community, it will have to end its support of Israel and refuse to be a partner in its crimes.

Urdu: ٹونی بلیئر اسلامی تنظیم حماس کو مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور
Turk_Translation_1: Tony Blair: Emphasis on the Need to Include Islamic Organization Hamas in Negotiations
Turk_Translation_2: Tony Blair emphasises Need to Include Islamic Organization Hamas in Conference
Turk_Translation_3: Tony Blair: Stresses inclusion of Hamas in talks
Turk_Translation_4: Tony Blair stresses inclusion of Hamas Islamic movement in dialogue

Urdu: مہر خبررساں ایجنسی برطانوی اخبار دی ٹائمز کے حوالے سے نقل کیا ہے کہ برطانیہ کےسابق وزیر اعظم ٹونی بلیئر نے مشرق وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں حماس کو شامل کرنے کی ضرورت پر زور دیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mehr News Agency has quoted from the British newspaper The Times that Britain's former Prime Minister Tony Blair has stressed the need to include Hamas in the Middle East peace process.
Turk_Translation_2: The news agency Mehr has copied with reference of the British newspaper, The Times, that the former Prime Minister of Britain has emphasized the need to include Hamas in the Middle East peace process.
Turk_Translation_3: Mehr News Agency has quoted British newspaper The Times as saying that Britain's former prime minister has stressed on the need for including Hamas in Middle East peace process.
Turk_Translation_4: Quoting British daily The Times, the news agency Mehr reports that former British prime minister Tony Blair has stressed the need to include Hamas in Middle East peace negotiations.

Urdu: اخبار کے مطابق ٹونی بلیئر نے کہا کہ یہ اہم ہے کہ ایک راستہ تلاش کیا جائے جس کے ذریعے حماس کو مشرقِ وسطیٰ کے امن عمل میں لایا جائے بلئر نے بش انظامیہ پر صرف محمود عباس سے بات کرنے اور حماس کو نظر انداز کرنے پر بھی شدید تنقید کی واضح رہے کہ مغربی ممالک نے حماس کی عوامی اور نظامی طاقت کو بھانپ کر اب اسے مذاکرات میں شامل کرنے کی بات کررہے ہیں جبکہ اس سے قبل وہ حماس کو ای دہشت گرد تنظیم سے تعبیر کرتے تھے ایسی دہشت گرد تنظیم جو اپنے وطن کا دفاع کررہی ہے اپنے گھر کو دوسروں کے قبضہ سے آزاد کرانے کی جد و جہد کررہی ہے جس کے گھر و وطن پر اسرائیل جیسی غاصب حکومت نے ساٹھ برسوں سے قبضہ جما رکھا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair said that it is important to find a way to bring Hamas into the Middle East peace process. Blair also strongly criticized the Bush Administration for only talking with Mahmoud Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should be noted that after estimating the popular support and military strength of Hamas, Western countries are now talking of including it in negotiations, whereas previously they understood Hamas to be a terrorist organization, one that is defending its homeland and striving to free its home from occupation by others, one whose home and homeland a usurper government like Israel has been occupying for sixty years.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair said that a way should be found through which Hamas should be brought into the peace process of the Middle East. Blair also strongly criticized the Bush administration for talking only to Mahmoud Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should remain clear that the Western countries, after assessing the public and administrative power of Hamas, are now talking about including it in the conference, whereas before this they used to call Hamas a terrorist organization; a terrorist organization which is defending its country and trying to emancipate its country from the grip of others, whose houses and country have been occupied for sixty years by a tyrannical government like that of Israel.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the newspaper, Tony Blair has said that it is important to find a way to include Hamas in Middle East peace process. Blair has also severely criticized the Bush administration to include only Mahmoud Abbas and ignoring Hamas. It should be noted that the western countries are now talking of including Hamas in the talks in view of its public and administrative influences whereas earlier they considered Hamas as a terrorist organization - a terrorist organization which is defending its land, struggling to liberate its homes from oppressor's control and whose home and land, for sixty years, have been under the illegal occupation of a usurper government like Israel.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the daily, Tony Blair said that it is important to find a way to include Hamas in the Middle East peace process. Blair strongly criticized the Bush Administration's policy of engaging Mahmud Abbas and completely ignoring Hamas. It is worth noting that Western countries have realized the public influence of Hamas and are now talking about including it in the dialogue process. Earlier, they called Hamas a terrorist organization - a terrorist organization that is defending its country, and is busy struggling to liberate its home from enemy occupation and free its houses and homeland from Israel's oppressive regime of occupation which has lasted for 60 years.

Urdu: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے تاجروں کا قتل، کوئٹہ میں مکمل ہڑتال
Turk_Translation_1: Murder of Balochistan Businessmen in Karachi, Strike in Quetta
Turk_Translation_2: Balochistan Businessmen Murdered in Karachi; Complete Strike in Quetta
Turk_Translation_3: Killing of Baloch Traders in Karachi, Complete Strike in Quetta
Turk_Translation_4: Killing of Baloch traders in Karachi; complete strike in Quetta

Urdu: کراچی میں بلوچستان کے چار تاجروں کی ہلاکت کے خلاف جمعرات کو کوئٹہ اور بعض دوسرے علاقوں میں مکمل ہڑتال کی گئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: In protest against the murder of four Balochistan businessmen in Karachi, on Thursday there was a strike in Quetta and several other areas.
Turk_Translation_2: A complete strike was observed on Thursday in Quetta and some other areas against the murder of four businessmen of Balochistan in Karachi.
Turk_Translation_3: Quetta and some other areas were on complete strike on Thursday in protest against the killings in Karachi of four traders from Balochistan.
Turk_Translation_4: A complete strike was observed on Thursday in Quetta and some other areas to protest the killing of four Baloch traders in Karachi.

Urdu: اِس دوران تمام کاروباری مراکز بند رہے جب کہ ٹریفک بھی معمول سے کم تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Through its duration, all places of business remained closed, while traffic was also less than usual.
Turk_Translation_2: During this, all business centers remained closed and the traffic was also less than usual.
Turk_Translation_3: All the business centers remained closed during this, while traffic was less than the usual.
Turk_Translation_4: All the business centers remained closed while traffic on the roads remained lighter than normal.

Urdu: احتجاجی ہڑتال کی اپیل انجمن ِ تاجران بلوچستان، پشتونخواہ ملی عوامی پارٹی اور جمعیت علمائے اسلام نے کی تھی، جِنہوں نے الزام لگایا کہ اِن تاجروں کو کراچی پولیس نے مبینہ فائرنگ سے اُس وقت ہلاک کر دیا جب وہ اپنی کار میں طارق روڈ پر اپنے گاڑیوں کے شوروم پہنچے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The call for a protest strike was made by Anjuman-e-Tajiran Balochistan; Pashtoonkhwa Milli Awami Party; and Jamiat Ulema-e-Islam, who accused Karachi police of killing these businessmen by allegedly firing when they reached their car showroom on Tariq Road in their car.
Turk_Translation_2: The appeal of the strike was made by Balochistan Traders Association, Pashtoonkhwah Milli Awami Party, and Jamiat-e-Ulema-e-Islam, who had alleged that these businessmen were allegedly killed with police firing when they had reached their auto showroom on Tariq Road in their car.
Turk_Translation_3: Strike in protest was called by Anjuman-e-Tajeran-e-Balochistan, Pakhtun-khwa Milli Awami Party and Jamiat Ulma-e-Islam. They accused that the Karachi Police allegedly shot the traders dead while they arrived by car to their car show room on Tariq Road.
Turk_Translation_4: The call for a protest strike was issued by the Balochistan Association of Trades, Pakhtoonkhwa Milli Awami Party and Jamiat Ulema-e Islam. They alleged that Karachi police opened fire on them on Tariq Road as they were arriving at their car showroom, killing the four.

Urdu: انجمنِ تاجران کے صدر عبد الرحیم کاکڑ نے مطالبہ کیا کہ واقع میں ملوث پولیس اہل کاروں کو گرفتار کرکے اُن کے خلاف کارروائی کی جائے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The president of Anjuman-e-Tajiran, Abdul Rahim Kakar, demanded that the police officers involved in the incident be arrested and action be taken against them.
Turk_Translation_2: The president of the Traders Association Abdul Rahim Kakar demanded that the police officials involved in the incident should be arrested and action should be taken against them.
Turk_Translation_3: President of Anjuman-e-Tajeran Abdur Rahim Kakar has demanded that police officials involved in the incident should be arrested and strict action taken against them.
Turk_Translation_4: Abdul Rahim Kakar, president of traders association, demanded that officers involved in the incident be arrested and that action be taken against them.

Urdu: تاہم اِس واقعے کے بارے میں فوری طور پر کراچی پولیس کا موقف سامنے نہیں آیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: However, the position taken by Karachi police regarding this incident has not yet come forth.
Turk_Translation_2: However, Karachi police did not give any statement about this incident.
Turk_Translation_3: However, no immediate stand of the Karachi Police regarding this incident has come forward.
Turk_Translation_4: Karachi police have not yet clarified their position.

Urdu: ہلاک ہونے والے چاروں تاجروں کا تعلق سرحدی شہر چمن سے تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: All four murdered businessmen were from the border town of Chaman.
Turk_Translation_2: All the four murdered businessmen belonged to the border city of Chaman.
Turk_Translation_3: All four traders that were killed belonged to the border town Chaman.
Turk_Translation_4: The four traders hailed from the border city of Chaman.

Urdu: ہڑتال کے موقعے پر حکومت کی جانب سے بڑے پیمانے پر سیکیورٹی کے انتظامات کیے گئے تھے اور شہر بھر میں اہم مقامات پر پولیس کے اہل کار تعینات تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: On the occasion of the strike, there were widespread arrangements for security made by the government, and police officers were posted at important locations all over the city.
Turk_Translation_2: At the time of the strike, security arrangements were made on a huge scale by the government, and police officials were deployed at the strategic points throughout the city.
Turk_Translation_3: Government had made large scale security arrangements for the strike and police officials had been stationed at important locations throughout the city.
Turk_Translation_4: The government made extraordinary security arrangements because of the strike and police personnel were deployed to all important locations in the city.

Urdu: اسرائیلی حملے میں حماس کا سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا
Turk_Translation_1: Hamas Senior Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Turk_Translation_2: Hamas Senior Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Turk_Translation_3: Senior Hamas Commander Killed in Israeli Attack
Turk_Translation_4: Senior Hamas commander killed in Israeli attack

Urdu: اسرائیل کے ایک فضائى حملے میں حماس کا ایک سینئیر کمانڈر ہلاک ہوگیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: One of the senior commanders of Hamas was killed in an aerial attack by Israel.
Turk_Translation_2: A senior commander of Hamas was killed in an Israeli air strike.
Turk_Translation_3: A senior commander of Hamas was killed in an Israeli air attack.
Turk_Translation_4: A senior commander of Hamas has been killed in an Israeli air strike.

Urdu: یہ غزہ کی پٹی میں اسرائیل کے ایک ہفتے سے جاری حملوں میں حماس کی دوسری اہم شخصیت کی ہلاکت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is the second important person to be killed in the Israeli attacks going on for one week now in the Gaza Strip.
Turk_Translation_2: This is the death of a second important personality of Hamas who has been killed during a week-long Israeli attack in Gaza Strip.
Turk_Translation_3: This is the second important Hamas personality killed Gaza Strip, in the Israeli attacks that have continued for a week.
Turk_Translation_4: This is the second killing of an important Hamas leader in the week-long Israeli offensive in the Gaza Strip.

Urdu: حماس کے عہدے داروں نے کہا ہے کہ ابو زکریا الجمال ہفتے کے روز غزہ سٹی کے مشرق میں واقع الشجاعیہ محلے میں ہلاک ہوگئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Hamas officials have said that Abu Zakaria al-Jamal died Saturday in the Al-Shujai'ya neighborhood located in the eastern part of Gaza City.
Turk_Translation_2: The office-bearers of Hamas said that Abu Zakaria Al-Jamal was killed on Saturday in the locality of Al-Shujaiyyah, situated in the east of Gaza City.
Turk_Translation_3: Hamas authorities have said that Abu Zakaria Jamal was killed on Saturday at Al-Shujaiah colony, east of Gaza City.
Turk_Translation_4: Hamas officials said that Abu Zakria Al-Jamal was killed in the Al-Shujia neighborhood east of Gaza City on Saturday.

Urdu: اسرائیل کے ایک اور فضائى حملے میں جمعرات کے روز حماس کے عالم نزار راعیّان ہلاک ہو گئے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Hamas religious scholar Nazar Rayan had been killed in another aerial attack by Israel on Thursday.
Turk_Translation_2: In another air strike from Israel on Thursday Alam Nazar Raiyyan of Hamas was killed.
Turk_Translation_3: In another Israeli air attack on Thursday, Hamas scholar Nazar Raiyan was killed.
Turk_Translation_4: In another Israeli air strike on Thursday, Hamas leader Alam Nazar Raiyan was killed.

Urdu: شام میں مقیم حماس کے جلا وطن لیڈر خالد مشعل انتقام لینے کا عزم ظاہر کیا ہے اور غزہ پر زمینی حملے کے خلاف اسرائیل کو خبردار کیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Khaled Meshaal, exiled Hamas leader residing in Syria, has expressed the determination to take revenge and has warned Israel against making a land attack on Gaza.
Turk_Translation_2: Living in Syria, the exiled leader of Hamas, Khaled Mashaal, has shown his determination of taking vengeance and has warned Israel against field attacks on Gaza.

Turk_Translation_4: The Hamas leader exiled in Syria, Khalid Meshaal has vowed to avenge the killing and warned Israel against a ground offensive in Gaza.

Urdu: غزہ کی سرحد پر اسرائیل کے ہزاروں فوجی اور ٹینک تعینات ہیں اور وہ فوج کشی کے احکامات کا انتظار کررہے ہیں۔

Urdu: امریکہ نے فائر بندی کی اپیل کی ہے۔ لیکن کہا ہے کہ غزہ پر فوج کشی کرنے یا نہ کرنے کے فیصلے کا انحصار اسرائیل پر ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: America has appealed for a cease-fire, but has said that the decision to invade Gaza or not depends on Israel.

Turk_Translation_4: The United States has appealed for a ceasefire, saying that it is up to Israel to decide whether or not to launch a ground offensive.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا ہے کہ امریکہ فائر بندی کے لیے کام کررہا ہے، لیکن کوئى یک طرفہ سمجھوتا قابلِ قبول نہیں ہوگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that America is working towards a cease-fire, but a one-sided commitment will not be acceptable.

Turk_Translation_1: However, one Hamas official has said that their organization plans to send a delegation to Egypt on Monday to focus on the most recent violence.

Turk_Translation_1: According to sources in the Office of Foreign Affairs, in addition to high government officials, Joseph Biden will also meet with military leader General Ashfaq Parvez Kayani.

Turk_Translation_1: In the meeting the President awarded him the honor of the Hilal-e-Pakistan for his role in establishing a close relationship between Pakistan and America.

Urdu: واضح رہے کہ جوزف بائیڈن نے گذشتہ سال امریکی سینٹ کی خارجہ تعلقات کمیٹی کے چیئرمین کی حیثیت سے سینیٹر رچرڈلوگر کے ساتھ مل کر ایک بل متعارف کرایا تھا جس میں پاکستان کے لیے آئندہ پانچ سالوں کے دوران امریکہ کی غیر فوجی امداد میں تین گنا اضافہ کرکے 7. 5ارب ڈالر کرنے کی سفارش کی گئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Last year Joseph Biden, as the American Senate's Foreign Relations Committee Chairman, along with Senator Richard Lugar, had introduced a new bill in which it was recommended that during the next five years America's non-military aid for Pakistan be tripled to 5.7 billion dollars.
Turk_Translation_2: It should remain clear that last year Joseph Biden, in the capacity of Chairman of the Foreign Relations Committee of the Senate, along with the Senator Richard Lugar, introduced a bill in which the non-military aid of America for Pakistan in the next five years was recommended to be increased by three-fold to make it 7.5 billion dollars.

Turk_Translation_4: It may be recalled that last year, Joe Biden, as chairman of US Senate's Foreign Relations Committee, along with Senator Richard Lugar, introduced a bill that recommended tripling military assistance to Pakistan to $5.7 billion over the next five years.

Urdu: وزیراعظم یوسف رضا گیلانی نے کہا ہے کہ امریکہ کے منتخب نائب صدر جو بائیڈن نے سابق صدر پرویز مشرف کی وردی اُتروانے  ’فوج کے سربراہ کا عہدہ چھوڑنے‘ میں اہم کردار ادا کیا ہے اور پاکستا ن میں جمہوریت کے لیے بھی جوبائیڈن نے خاصی مدد کی
Turk_Translation_1: Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani has said that America's Vice President-elect Joe Biden played an important role in ex-President Pervez Musharraf's removal of uniform and withdrawal from his position as Army Chief and Joe Biden helped greatly in the cause of democracy for Pakistan as well.
Turk_Translation_2: The Prime Minister of Pakistan Yousuf Raza Gilani has said that America's elected Vice President Joe Biden has played an important role in forcing the ex president Pervez Musharraf to get out of the uniform and 'quitting the post of army chief,' and has also helped in establishing democracy in Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gillani said that American Vice President Elect has played an important role in the former President Pervez Musharraf's decision to doff uniform and relinquish the charge of Chief of Army Staff and Joe Biden has also played an important part in the restoration of democracy in Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Prime Minister Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani has said that US Vice President Joe Biden played a vital role in forcing former President Pervez Musharraf to shed his uniform, "leave the office of army chief," and Biden also worked a lot toward democracy in Pakistan.

Urdu: ۔ یوسف رضا گیلانی نے یہ بیان کراچی شپ یارڈ پر صحافیوں سے بات چیت کرتے ہوئے دیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Yousaf Raza Gilani made this statement at the Karachi Shipyard when talking with reporters.
Turk_Translation_2: Yousuf Raza Gilani gave this statement while talking to the press at Karachi Shipyard.
Turk_Translation_3: Yousaf Raza Gillani gave this statement while speaking to media persons at Karachi Shipyard.
Turk_Translation_4: Gilani issued the statement while talking to reporters at the Karachi shipyard.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے کہا کہ جو بائیڈن "Pro - Pakistan" یا پاکستان کے حامی رہنما ہیں اور اُنھوں نے بطور امریکی سینٹ کی خارجہ امُور کمیٹی کے چیئرمین کے پاکستان کے لیے 15ارب ڈالر کی امداد دینے کا بل پیش کیا۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that Joe Biden is a "Pro-Pakistan" leader, supportive of Pakistan, and as Chairman of the American Senate's Foreign Affairs Committee he presented a bill to give 15 billion dollars in aid to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that Joe Biden is "Pro-Pakistan" or a leader who supports Pakistan, and he introduced the bill of a 15-billion dollar aid for Pakistan as Chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the Senate.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that Joe Biden is a "Pro-Pakistan" or a Pakistan supporting leader. In his capacity as Chairman of Foreign Affairs Committee of the Senate he presented a bill advocating $15 billion aid to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that Biden is "Pro-Pakistan" and, as chairman of US Senate Foreign Relations Committee, he presented a $15 billion assistance bill for Pakistan.

Urdu: پاکستانی حدود میں امریکی جاسوس طیاروں سے کیے جانے والے میزائل حملوں کی ایک بار پھر مذمت کرتے ہوئے وزیراعظم پاکستان نے کہا ایسے حملوں کی اجازت دینے کے بارےمیں اُن کا امریکی حکومت کے ساتھ کسی طرح کا معاہدہ نہیں ہے اور اُن کے بقو ل کیو نکہ یہ پاکستان کی خود مختاری کا معاملہ ہے اس لیے وہ ملکی حدود میں ایسے حملوں کی اجازت کسی طور نہیں دے سکتے
Turk_Translation_1: Again condemning the missile attacks by American spy planes within Pakistani borders, the Prime Minister of Pakistan said that he does not have any kind of agreement with the American government to give permission for these type of attacks and according to him, because this is a matter of Pakistan's sovereignty, he cannot permit such attacks within national borders under any circumstances.
Turk_Translation_2: Denouncing once again the missile attacks through American spy planes in the Pakistani territory, the prime minister of Pakistan said that he has no agreement with the American government to permit such types of attacks, and since, according to him, this is a matter of Pakistan's sovereignty, he cannot permit such types of attacks in the country's territory under any circumstances.
Turk_Translation_3: Condemning once again, the missile attacks by American drones inside Pakistani territory, Prime Minister of Pakistan reiterated that the government has not entered into a secret deal with America regarding the attacks and according to him since it is a matter of Pakistan's sovereignty, therefore, we can in no way permit America to carry out air strikes within the national territory.
Turk_Translation_4: Condemning the US drone attacks inside Pakistani territory, Prime Minister Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani said that his government has not made any agreement with the US to allow such attacks. He said that it is an issue of Pakistan's sovereignty and that he cannot allow such attacks inside Pakistani territory.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے اس اُمید کا اظہار بھی کیا کہ امریکہ میں نئی حکومت کے برسراقتدار آنے کے بعد امریکہ کی پالیسی میں بھی تبدیلی آئے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: He also expressed the hope that after the new government comes into power in America there will also be a change in America's policy.

Turk_Translation_3: He also expressed the hope that after the inauguration of the new President the American policy towards Pakistan would change.
Turk_Translation_4: He expressed his hope that US policy will be reviewed as the new US administration assumes power.

Urdu: یوسف رضا گیلانی نے کہاکہ حکومت نے بڑی کامیابی سے دہشت گردوں کو عام قبائلی سے الگ کیا ہے لیکن جاسو س طیاروں سے کیے جانے والے میزائل حملے حکومتی کوششوں کے لیے نقصان دہ ثابت ہوتے ہیں اور دہشت گرد پھرمقامی قبائل سے مل جاتے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Yousaf Raza Gilani said that the government has very successfully separated terrorists from common tribal members, but the missile attacks by spy planes are harmful to the government's efforts, so terrorists again join with local tribes.

Turk_Translation_3: Yousaf Raza Gillani maintained that government has very successfully managed to seperate ordinary civilians from the terrorists but the missile attacks by drones jeopardize government efforts and the terrorists once again team up with local tribes.
Turk_Translation_4: Syed Yousuf Raza Gilani said that the government has successfully managed to draw lines between the tribesmen and the terrorists, but missile attacks by drones prove to be devastating for government efforts and help the terrorists to penetrate the common population.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے کہا کہ بین الاقوامی برادری پاکستان کے اس موقف سے اتفاق کرتی ہے۔

Turk_Translation_4: He said that the international community agreed with Pakistan's position on this matter.

Turk_Translation_1: The Prime Minister also said that if any credible evidence is presented, then Pakistani forces will take action themselves in their own areas.

Urdu: ممبئی حملوں کے بارے میں وزیراعظم یوسف رضا گیلانی نے اپنا موقف دوہراتے ہوئے کہا کہ اگر بھارت شواہد فراہم کرے تو اُس کی بنیاد پر تفتیش کی جائے گی اور اگرکسی کے ملوث ہونے کے ثبوت ملے تو اُس کے خلاف ملکی قانون کے مطابق کاروائی کی جائے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Reiterating his stand about the Mumbai attacks, Prime Minister Yousaf Raza Gilani said that if India provides evidence, then an investigation will be conducted on that basis, and if proof of anyone's involvement is found, then action will be taken against that person according to national law.
Turk_Translation_2: Repeating his point of view on the Mumbai attacks, Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani said that if India offers proof, then on that basis, investigations will be done, and if proof is found of anyone's involvement, he/she will be prosecuted according to the law of the land.
Turk_Translation_3: Regarding Mumbai attacks, Prime Minister Yousuf Raza Gilani reiterated his stand that if India provides evidence then we will act on that basis and if anyone was found guilty then action will be taken against him as per the law of the land.
Turk_Translation_4: With regard to the Mumbai attacks, Prime Minister Gilani reiterated his stance that, if India provided evidence, Pakistan would carry out an investigation and, if anyone was found to be involved in the incidents, action would be taken under Pakistani law.

Urdu: بدھ کی صبح ایک جیپ میں سوار دو ڈی ایس پی ، ایک سب انسپکٹر اور دو کانسٹیبل پولیس ٹریننگ سینٹر کی طرف جارہے تھے کہ سریاب روڈ پر واقع ڈگری کالج کے قریب موٹر سائیکل پر سوار نامعلوم حملہ آوروں نے پولیس کی جیپ پر بلااشتعال فائرنگ شروع کر دی جس سے سب انسپکٹر مہدی اور کانسٹیبل صبغت اللہ اورنصراللہ موقع پر ہی ہلاک ہوگئے جب کہ ایک ڈی ایس پی حسن علی ہسپتال پہنچنے کے بعد دم توڑگئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: On Wednesday morning two DSPs, one Sub-inspector, and two Constables were riding in a jeep towards the Police Training Center when unidentified assailants on a motorcycle near Degree College on Sariab Road started firing without provocation on the jeep, as a result of which Sub-inspector Mehdi and Constables Sabghat Ullah and Nasar Ullah were killed on the spot while DSP Hassan Ali died after reaching the hospital.
Turk_Translation_2: On Wednesday morning, two DSP, one sub-inspector, and two constables were going towards the police training center in a jeep when near Degree College on Saryab Road, two unknown attackers on motorcycle opened unprovoked fire on the police jeep, due to which sub-inspector Mehdi and Constables Sibghatullah and Nasrullah died on the spot while one DSP, Hasan Ali, died after reaching the hospital.
Turk_Translation_3: On Wednesday morning two DSPs, one Sub-Inspector and two constables were going towards the Police Training Centre in a jeep. Near Degree College at Siryab Road, assailants on a motorcycle began unprovoked firing at the police jeep killing the Sub-Inspector Mehdi and constables Sibghatullah and Nasrullah on the spot while DSP Hasan Ali later died of injuries in the hospital.
Turk_Translation_4: On Wednesday morning, two DSPs, a sub-inspector and two police constables were heading to the Police Training Center in a jeep, when unknown assailants on a motorbike opened fire indiscriminately on the police jeep near Degree College on Saryab Road. Sub-Inspector Mehdi, constables Sibghatullah and Nasrullah died on the scene, while DSP Hassan Ali succumbed to his injuries at the hospital.

Turk_Translation_3: President George Bush in his final radio address has cautioned America to remain alert against enemy attacks.

Urdu: مسٹر بُش نے کہا کہ امریکیوں کے لیے ابھی تک سب سے بڑا خطرہ  دہشت گردوں کے کسی اور حملے کا امکان ہے۔ اور انہوں نے خبردار کیا کہ  ملک  کے دشمن صبر کے ساتھ انتظار کررہے ہیں اور وہ دوبارہ  وار کرنے پر تُلے ہوئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mr. Bush said that the biggest danger for Americans is still the possibility of another terrorist attack, and he warned that the country's enemies are waiting patiently and are determined to strike again.
Turk_Translation_2: Mr. Bush said that until now, the greatest danger for Americans is the possibility of some other terrorist attack. He warned that the enemies of the country are waiting patiently and that they are determined to launch another attack.
Turk_Translation_3: Mr. Bush said that the even now the biggest threat to Americans is the possibility of yet another attack by the terrorists. He warned that the enemies were waiting patiently, determined to strike again.
Turk_Translation_4: Mr. Bush said that biggest threat to Americans was another terrorist attack. He warned that the enemy is patiently waiting and is determined to strike the US.

Urdu: سُبک دوش ہونے والے صدر نے کہا  امریکہ کو لازماً کبھی  بھی اپنی حفاظت سے غافل نہیں ہونا چاہیئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The outgoing President said that American must never neglect its safety.
Turk_Translation_2: The retiring president said that America must never be negligent in its security.
Turk_Translation_3: The outgoing President said that America must not be negligent of its security.
Turk_Translation_4: The outgoing President said that the US should never be oblivious to its security situation.

Urdu: صدر بُش نے اگلے صدر بارک اوباما کے لیے بھی بہترین تمناؤں کا اظہار کیا، جو  منگل کے روز اپنے عہدے کاحلف اُٹھائیں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Bush also expressed best wishes for the next President Barack Obama who will take the oath of office on Tuesday.
Turk_Translation_2: President Bush has also expressed best wishes for the next president, Barack Obama, who will take the oath of office on Tuesday.
Turk_Translation_3: President Bush also extended best wishes to the next President Barack Obama who will take oath of office on Tuesday.
Turk_Translation_4: President Bush expressed his good wishes to the newly elected President Barack Obama, who is set to take the oath of office on Tuesday.

Urdu: نومنتخب صدر بارک اوباما نے ڈیموکریٹک پارٹی کی جانب  سے ہفتے کے ریڈیو پر اپنی تقریر  میں حلف برداری کی تقریب کی تاریخی اہمیت پر روشنی ڈالی۔
Turk_Translation_1: On behalf of the Democratic Party, President-elect Barack Obama shed light on the historical significance of the oath-taking ceremony in his radio speech on Saturday.
Turk_Translation_2: In his speech on Saturday's radio, on behalf of the Democratic Party, the newly elected president, Barack Obama, highlighted the historical importance of the inauguration ceremony.
Turk_Translation_3: The newly elected President Obama in his Saturday radio address highlighted the historical importance of the swearing-in ceremony.
Turk_Translation_4: In his radio speech on behalf of the Democratic Party on Saturday, President-elect Barack Obama highlighted the historic significance of his inauguration.

Urdu: انہوں نے کہا کہ  یہ تقریب ایک ایسی رسم ہے  جس کا ایک رہنما سے دوسرے رہنما کو اختیارات کی پُر امن منتقلی کی امریکی  عظمت کے ساتھ بہت گہرا تعلق ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that this ceremony has a deep connection with the great American custom of transferring authority peacefully from one leader to the next.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that this ceremony is a ritual that has a deep relationship between the peaceful transfer of power from one leader to another leader and the American grandeur.
Turk_Translation_3: He said that this is a ceremony wherein the American greatness and the peaceful transfer of power from one leader to the other are deeply related.
Turk_Translation_4: He said the ceremony signifies the great US tradition of a peaceful transfer of power from one leader to another.

Urdu: مسٹر اوباما  نے یاد دلایا کہ  دنیا بھر میں بہت سے لوگ یہ تصّور بھی نہیں کرسکتے کہ اُن کے رہنما خوں ریزی  یا کشمکش کے بغیر اختیارات سے دست بردار ہوجائیں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Mr. Obama reminded listeners that in the whole world there are many people who cannot even imagine that their leaders will relinquish power without bloodshed or struggle.
Turk_Translation_2: Mr. Obama reminded that in the whole world, many people cannot even imagine that their leaders will leave power without any bloodshed and resistance.
Turk_Translation_3: Mr. Obama recalled that people in several parts of the world cannot even imagine that their leaders will relinquish power without any bloodshed or conflict.
Turk_Translation_4: Mr. Obama recalled that people in most parts of the world cannot imagine that their leaders would relinquish power without bloodshed or confrontation.

Urdu: رائے ونڈ میں شریف برادران اور وفاقی وزیرِ داخلہ کی ملاقات، سیاسی و سیکیورٹی امور پر تبادلہٴ خیال
Turk_Translation_1: Sharif Brothers and Federal Interior Minister Meet in Raiwind, Exchange of Ideas on Political and Security Concerns
Turk_Translation_2: Sharif brothers and Federal Interior Minister Meet in Raiwind; Views Exchanged on Political and Security Affairs
Turk_Translation_3: Sharif Brothers, Federal Home Minister Meet at Raiwand; Political and Security Issues Discussed.
Turk_Translation_4: Meeting between Sharif brothers and federal interior minister at Raiwind; political security issues discussed

Urdu: حزبِ اختلاف کی سب سے بڑی اور پنجاب میں حکمراں جماعت ،پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کے سربراہ نواز شریف اور وفاقی وزیرِ داخلہ رحمٰن ملک کے مابین اتوار کے روز رائے ونڈ میں ملاقات ہوئی جِس میں پنجاب کے وزیرِ اعلیٰ شہباز شریف بھی موجود تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: On Sunday Nawaz Sharif, the leader of the opposition's largest and Punjab's governing party, Pakistan Muslim League N, met with Federal Interior Minister Rehman Malik in Raiwind. in which Punjab's Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif was also present.
Turk_Translation_2: A meeting was held between Nawaz Sharif, head of the largest party in opposition and the ruling party of Punjab, Pakistan Muslim League N, and the Federal Interior Minister Rehman Malik in Raiwind on Sunday in which the chief minister of Punjab, Shahbaz Sharif, was also present.
Turk_Translation_3: A meeting between the Federal Home Minister Rahman Malik and Nawaz Sharif, leader of the largest opposition party in the country and ruling party in Punjab Pakistan Muslim League N, was held on Sunday at Raiwand. The meeting was also attended by Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif.
Turk_Translation_4: A meeting was held between Nawaz Sharif, chief of the major opposition party at the center and ruling party in Punjab PML-N, and Federal Interior Minister Rahman Malik was held at Raiwind on Sunday. Punjab Chief Minister Shahbaz Sharif was also present at the meeting.

Urdu: مقامی میڈیا کے مطابق رحمٰن ملک ممکنہ طور پر پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی کی قیادت کا کوئی اہم پیغام لے کر آئے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to local media, Rehman Malik may have brought some important message for the leadership of the Pakistan People's Party.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the local media, Rehman Malik had possibly brought some important message from the leadership of the Pakistan Peoples Party.
Turk_Translation_3: According to local media, Rehman Malik had possibly brought a message from Pakistan People's Party leadership.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the media, Rahman Malik possibly brought/delivered an important message from the Pakistan Peoples Party.

Urdu: تاہم، ملاقات کے بعد صحافیوں سے گفتگو میں اِس حوالے سے رحمٰن ملک نے کوئی تفصیل نہیں بتائی اور صرف اتنا کہا کہ سیاسی امور کے حوالے سے اُنھوں نے اتفاقِ رائے کی سیاست کی بات کی ہے، اور ممبئی حملوں کے بعد کی صورتِ حال پر پی ایم ایل ن کی قیادت کو بریفنگ دی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: However, after the meeting when talking with reporters, Rehman Malik did not give any details in relation to this, only saying that, with regard to political concerns, he has talked about the politics of agreement and has given a briefing to the leadership of PML-N on the situation after the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_2: However, Rehman Malik did not give any details with reference thereof, while talking to the press after the meeting and only said this much that he talked only about politics of the agreement on opinions with reference to the political affairs, and has given a briefing about the situation after the Mumbai attacks to the leadership of PML N.
Turk_Translation_3: However, Rahman Malik did not give details of the meeting to the media. He only said that they discussed political reconciliation and briefed the PML-N leadership about the post-Mumbai attack situation.
Turk_Translation_4: However, Rahman Malik did not provide details in his media interaction following the meeting. He said that he spoke of the politics of reconciliation with regard to political issues and briefed the PML-N leadership on the post-Mumbai bombing situation.

Urdu: اُن کے الفاظ میں: ‘اب تک جتنی کارروائی ہوئی ہے اُس کے بارے میں معلومات فراہم کی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In his words, "I have provided information about all that the action that has taken place up until now.
Turk_Translation_2: In his words:'provided information about the proceedings as of now.
Turk_Translation_3: In his words: "Information has been provided about whatever action has been taken till now.
Turk_Translation_4: In his own words: "He provided information about the action taken thus far."

Urdu: نہ بھولیں کہ بڑی کارروائی پنجاب میں ہوئی ہے اور حکومتِ پنجاب نے کی ہے اور ابھی جو میں نے ٹیم تشکیل دی ہے اُس میں بھی پنجاب حکومت کی مدد کی ضرورت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Don't forget that a great deal of activity has taken place in Punjab by the government, and right now the team that I have put together also needs the help of the Punjab government."
Turk_Translation_2: Don't forget that a bigger operation was done in Punjab and was done by the Punjab Government, and for the team I have formed now, the Punjab Government's help is needed in that, too.
Turk_Translation_3: Do not forget that the main action was taken in Punjab and was taken by the Punjab Government and Punjab Government's help is also required in the team that I have formed now.
Turk_Translation_4: It is pertinent to mention that major action was taken by the Punjab Government in the province and the team which I have constituted now also needs the cooperation of Punjab Government.

Urdu: رحمٰن ملک نے کہا کہ ہر روز میڈیا کو تو نہیں بتایا جاتا ،لیکن پی ایم ایل ن کی قیادت سے روزانہ پیغاموں کا تبادلہ ہوتا ہے۔ اُدھر، پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کے ترجمان، پرویز رشید نے بھی گفتگو میں سیاسی امور کے حوالے سے کچھ بتانے سے گریز کیا اور محظ اتنا کہا کہ رحمٰن ملک صاحب نے جو بتانا تھا وہ بتا دیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Rehman Malik said that, although the media is not informed daily, messages are exchanged every day with PML-N leadership. Pervez Rashid, the spokesperson of Pakistan Muslim League N, also refrained from saying anything in reference to political concerns during conversation, only saying that Mr. Rehman Malik has told all that needed to be told.
Turk_Translation_2: Rehman Malik said that the media is not informed every day, but the messages are exchanged with the leadership of PML N every day. In the meantime, the spokesman of Pakistan Muslim League N, Pervaiz Rasheed, also avoided telling anything with reference to political affairs in his talks and merely said that Rehman Malik has said what was supposed to be said.
Turk_Translation_3: Rahman Malik said that media is not briefed everyday but messages are exchanged with PML-N leadership almost daily. On the other hand the spokesman for Pakistan Muslim League N, Pervez Rashid, also declined to give details of political issues discussed and said that Rahman Malik has said all he wanted to say.
Turk_Translation_4: Rahman Malik said that the media cannot be briefed every _____ but information is exchanged with PML-N leadership on daily basis. Meanwhile, PML-N Spokesman Pervez Rashid refrained from giving the details of the political issues discussed in the meeting, saying that Rahman Malik said what he had to say.

Urdu: واضح رہے کہ پاکستان مسلم لیگ ن کی قیادت سے مشیرِ داخلہ کی ملاقات ایسے وقت ہوئی ہے جب کہ صوبے کی گرما گرم سیاست میں حکومتِ پنجاب مخالف پی ایم ایل ق سے تعلق رکھنے والے 20سے زائد ناظمین نے گورنر پنجاب سلمان تاثیرکے ہمراہ پریس کانفرنس پی ایم ایل ن ،ناظمین کی طرف سے صوبائی حکومت کے اقدامات کی تنقید کو مسترد کرتے ہوئے پاکستان پیپلز پارٹی سے تعلق رکھنے والے گورنر پنجاب کی اِس معاملے میں شمولیت پر بھی اعتراض کرتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This meeting of the Interior Advisor with the leadership of Pakistan Muslim League N has taken place at a time in the province's heated politics when more than twenty nazims who belong to PML-Q, the opposition to the Punjab government, held a press conference with Punjab's Governor Salman Taseer PML-N not only rejects a criticism made by these nazims of the actions of the provincial government but also objects to the Governor's involvement in the matter of the press conference, who has connections with the Pakistan People's Party.
Turk_Translation_2: It should remain clear that the Interior Advisor has met with the leadership of Pakistan Muslim League N at a juncture when in the hot political scene of Punjab, more than 20 nazimeen, belonging to the Punjab government opposing PML Q, held a press conference with Governor of Punjab Salmaan Taseer. PML N is rejecting the criticism of nazimeen on the provincial government's actions while objecting to the involvement of the Governor of Punjab, who belongs to the Pakistan Peoples party, in this matter.
Turk_Translation_3: It should be noted that the meeting of Home Advisor with the PML-N leadership was held at a time when more than 20 anti-government PML-Q administrators held a press conference with Punjab Governor Salman Taseer and had rejected the criticism of the initiatives of Provincial Government by the PML-N, as well as objected to the involvement of Punjab Governor in this whole issue.
Turk_Translation_4: Interior advisor's meeting with PML-N leadership has come at a time when over 20 district administrators held a news conference with Punjab Governor Salman Taseer. The PML-N rejects criticism of the district administration of the provincial government's actions and has reservations about the Punjab governor, who is from PPP, becoming the party of the issue.

Urdu: اوباما کی تقریر پاکستان کے لیے خوش آئند ہے: صدر زرداری
Turk_Translation_1: Obama's Speech Holds Bright Prospects for Pakistan: President Zardari
