Urdu: پاکستانی صدر آصف علی زرداری نے امریکہ کے نئے صدر براک اوباما کے افتتاحی خطاب کا خیر مقدم کرتے ہوئے کہا ہے کہ اُن کی طرف سے مسلم دنیا کے ساتھ باہمی مفادات اور احترام کے تعلق کو آگے بڑھانے کی بات پاکستان اور اُس کے عوام کے لیے خوش آئند ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari, welcoming the inaugural speech of America's new President Barack Obama, has said that his remark about furthering a relationship with the Muslim world of mutual interests and respect holds bright prospects for Pakistan and its people.
Turk_Translation_2: Welcoming the inaugural address of America's new president, Barack Obama, Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari said that promoting the talks of mutual interest and relationship of respect with the Muslim world from his side is a good omen for Pakistan and its people.
Turk_Translation_3: Welcoming the inaugural address of new American president, Barack Obama, Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari said that his pledge to promote relations with the Muslims world on basis of mutual interests and respect is a welcome step for Pakistan and its people.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan's President, Asif Ali Zardari, welcomed the inaugural speech of new US President Barack Obama, who said that his commitment to promoting relations with the Islamic world on the basis of mutual interest and respect is a good omen for Pakistan and its people.

Urdu: بدھ کے روز جاری کردہ ایک بیان میں اُنھوں نے کہا کہ امریکی صدر کی طرف سے اعلیٰ نظریات اور اقدار کے عزم کا اعادہ دنیا بھر کے لوگوں کےلیے ایک بہتر مستقبل کی امید ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In a statement issued on Wednesday he said that high ideals and the return to a commitment to values is the hope for a better future for people all around the world.
Turk_Translation_2: He said in a statement, issued on Wednesday, that reiteration of great ideals and values by the American president is a hope for a better future for the people of the whole world.
Turk_Translation_3: In a statement released on Wednesday he said that the reiteration of his lofty commitment and ideas is hope for a better future for the people of the whole world.
Turk_Translation_4: In a statement issued on Wednesday, he said that the US President's resolve to work for lofty ideas and values provides hope for a better future for people worldwide.

Urdu: بیان کے مطابق صدر زرداری نے کہا کہ امریکہ پر عالمی برادری کے ساتھ مل کر بلاشبہ اکیسویں صدی میں امن، ترقی اور خوش حالی کی نئی راہیں تلاش کرنے کی اہم ذمے داری عائد ہوتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: According to the statement President Zardari said that, without a doubt, America, together with the global community, is charged with the important responsibility of finding new ways for peace, progress, and prosperity in the twenty-first century.
Turk_Translation_2: According to the statement, President Zardari said that America undoubtedly bears the important responsibility, with the incorporation of the international community, of finding new ways of peace, advancement, and prosperity in the twenty-first century.
Turk_Translation_3: According to the statement, President Zardari said, America undoubtedly has an important responsibility to work along with the international community to search for new avenues of peace, progress and prosperity in the 21st century.
Turk_Translation_4: In the statement, he said that the US undoubtedly has a responsibility to work with the world to find new avenues for peace, progress, and prosperity in the 21st century.

Urdu: واضح رہے کہ صدر اوباما نے منگل کے روز اپنے عہدے کا حلف اُٹھانے کے بعد افتتاحی خطاب میں کہا تھا کہ امریکہ مسلم دنیا کے ساتھ نئی  پیش رفت چاہتا ہے جو باہمی مفادات اور باہمی احترام پر مبنی ہو۔
Turk_Translation_1: On Tuesday, after taking the oath of office, President Obama had said in his inaugural speech that America wants to make a fresh start with the Muslim world based on mutual interests and mutual respect.
Turk_Translation_2: Let it be clear that President Obama had said on Tuesday in his inaugural address after taking the oath of his office, that America wants new advancements with the Muslim world that should be based on mutual interest and mutual respect.
Turk_Translation_3: It should be noted that in his inaugural address after taking oath on Tuesday, Obama said that America wants new progress in relations with the Muslim world based on mutual interests and mutual respect.
Turk_Translation_4: In his inaugural speech after being sworn in on Tuesday, the US president said that the United States wants a new relationship with the Muslim world based on mutual interest and respect.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے غریب ملکوں کے لوگوں کو یقین دلایا تھا کہ امریکہ اُن کے ساتھ مل کر کام کرے تاکہ وہاں سماجی ترقی ہو اور غربت میں کمی آئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He had reassured the people of poor countries that America should work with them so that there will be social progress there and poverty will be reduced.
Turk_Translation_2: He assured the people of poor countries that America should work with them so that social progress should take place there and poverty may be reduced.
Turk_Translation_3: He had assured people of the poor nations that America will work with them so that there will be social development and reduction in poverty.
Turk_Translation_4: He assured the developing world that the US would work with them to promote social development and to alleviate poverty.

Turk_Translation_1: Richard Holbrooke. Former ambassador for the United Nations Richard Holbrooke has been appointed as a special representative for Pakistan and Afghanistan.

Turk_Translation_3: Richard Holbrook: Richard Holbrook, former envoy to the UN, has been appointed as the special representative for Pakistan and Afghanistan
Turk_Translation_4: Former US ambassador to the UN Richard Holbrooke has been appointed as special representative for Pakistan and Afghanistan.

Turk_Translation_4: Holbrooke played a vital role in the Bosnia Herzegovina peace deal.

Turk_Translation_1: Holbrooke said that he is prepared to advise Obama about the concerns of Pakistan and Afghanistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Holbrooke said that he is ready to advise President Obama on the affairs of Pakistan and Afghanistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Holbrook said that he was ready to advise President Obama on Pakistan and Afghanistan matters.
Turk_Translation_4: Holbrooke said that he is ready to help President Obama with Afghanistan and Pakistan affairs.

Urdu: انھوں نے اضافہ کیا کہ یہ کام آسان نہیں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He added that this will not be easy an easy task.
Turk_Translation_2: He added that this task is not easy.
Turk_Translation_3: However, he added that this is not an easy task
Turk_Translation_4: He said that it is not an easy task.

Turk_Translation_1: He said that the histories of the two countries are extremely different.
Turk_Translation_2: He said that the history of both countries is completely different.

Turk_Translation_1: George Mitchell has been selected for the Middle East to try to breathe life into Arab-Israeli peace talks.

Urdu: وہ کہتے ہیں کہ ہمیں یہ دیکھ کرحیرت ہوئی کہ اس چیز کا لازمی طورپر اثر ہوتا ہے اور اس سے  یہ وضاحت ہوئی  کہ ورزش کی خراب کارکردگی کا دل کے آرام کے عمل سے کتنا تعلق ہوسکتا ہے۔

Urdu: پاکستان کے ساتھ فوری جنگ کے امکانات نہیں: بھارتی فوجی سربراہ
Turk_Translation_1: No Possibility of Immediate War with Pakistan: Indian Army Chief
Turk_Translation_2: No Chances of Immediate War with Pakistan: Indian Army Chief
Turk_Translation_3: No Chances of Immediate War with Pakistan: Indian Army Chief
Turk_Translation_4: No risk of immediate war with Pakistan: Indian army chief

Urdu: بھارتی بری فوج کے سربراہ جنرل دیپک کپور کا کہنا ہے کہ پاکستان کے ساتھ فوری جنگ کے امکانات موجود نھیں، تاہم ملک کا دفاع کرنے اور اُس کے مفادات کے تحفظ کو یقینی بنانے کے لیے قربانیاں دینے کے لیے ہمہ وقت تیار ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Indian Army Chief General Deepak Kapoor says that there are no possibilities of immediate war with Pakistan; however, to defend the country and ensure the protection of its interests, we are always ready to make sacrifices.
Turk_Translation_2: The chief of the Indian Army General Deepak Kapoor has said that there are no chances of an immediate war with Pakistan; however, to defend the country, and to assure the safety of its interests, we are ready at all times for giving sacrifices.
Turk_Translation_3: Chief of Indian army General Deepak Kapoor has rejected any possibility of an immediate war with Pakistan, however, he said that army was prepared to render sacrifices to defend the country and ensure the safety of its interest.
Turk_Translation_4: Indian Army Chief General Deepak Kapoor said that there was no possibility of immediate war with Pakistan. However, the army is always prepared to defend the country and protect its interests.

Urdu: جنرل کپور نے الزام لگایا کہ یقین دہانیوں اور ممبئی حملوں کے نتیجے میں  پاکستان پر بین الاقوامی دباؤ کے باوجود ، اُن کے الفاظ میں، پاکستان کی سرزمین پر دہشت گردی کا ڈھانچہ نہ صرف  جوں کا توں موجود ہے بلکہ سرگرم  ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: General Kapoor made the accusation that in spite of international pressure on Pakistan as a result of assurances and the Mumbai attacks - in his words - not only does the specter of terrorism remain intact in the land of Pakistan, it is active.
Turk_Translation_2: General Kapoor blamed that despite reassurances and pressure from the international community on Pakistan as a result of the Mumbai attacks, in his words, the infrastructure of terrorism is not only intact on Pakistani soil, but is also active.
Turk_Translation_3: General Kapoor alleged that even after assurances and international pressure on Pakistan in the wake of Mumbai attacks the terrorist infrastructure in Pakistan is not only intact but is active as well,
Turk_Translation_4: General Kapoor alleged that, despite international pressure on Pakistan and assurances following the Mumbai attacks, terrorist networks are not only present on Pakistani soil, but active as well.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے یہ بات سری نگر میں نامہ نگاروں سے گفتگو میں کی۔
Turk_Translation_1: He made this remark in Sri Nagar while speaking with reporters.
Turk_Translation_2: He said this while talking to news correspondents in Srinagar.
Turk_Translation_3: He said this while speaking to media correspondents in Srinagar.
Turk_Translation_4: He said this while talking to reporters in Srinagar.

Urdu: بھارتی بری فوج کے سربراہ نئی دہلی کے زیرِ انتظام کشمیر کی مجموعی حفاظتی صورتِ حال اور سرحدوں پر مسلح افواج کی تیاریوں کا جائزہ لینے کے لیے وادیِ کشمیر کے ایک روزہ دورے پر تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Indian Army Chief was on a one-day tour of the Valley of Kashmir to examine Kashmir's overall defensive situation, which is under management by New Delhi and the readiness of armed forces on the borders.
Turk_Translation_2: The chief of the Indian army was on a one-day visit to the valley of Kashmir to review the collective security situation and the preparations of the army on the borders in Kashmir under the New Delhi administration.
Turk_Translation_3: The Chief of Indian Army was on a one day visit to Kashmir Valley to take stock of the overall security situation in the New Delhi Administered Kashmir as well as to observe the preparation of armed forces along the border.
Turk_Translation_4: The Indian army chief was on a one-day visit to Kashmir Valley to assess the overall security situation in Indian-held Kashmir and the preparedness of the armed forces.

Urdu: اُن سے سوال پوچھا گیا کہ  میڈیا رپورٹوں کے مطابق  ممبئی حملوں کے بارے میں پاکستان نے بھارت کی طرف سے پیش کردہ ثبوتوں  کو  مسترد کردیا ہے،  اِس بارے میں اُن کا کیا تبصرہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: He was questioned whether he has any comment about how, according to media reports, Pakistan has rejected the evidence presented from India regarding the Mumbai attacks.

Turk_Translation_4: He was asked to comment on the media reports that Pakistan has spurned Indian evidence concerning the Mumbai attacks.

Urdu: جنرل کپور نے کہا کہ جنگ یا امن کے معاملات  کے فیصلے سیاسی  قیادت کیا کرتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: General Kapoor said that decisions regarding matters of war and peace are made by the political leadership.
Turk_Translation_2: General Kapoor said that the decisions on the matter pertaining to war and peace are taken by the political leadership.
Turk_Translation_3: General Kapoor said that the political leadership decides the matters of war or peace.
Turk_Translation_4: General Kapoor said that political leadership makes decisions dealing with matters related to war or peace.

Urdu: مبینہ طور پر پاکستان کی سرزمین پر دہشت گردی کے ڈھانچے کی موجودگی کا ذکر کرتے ہوئے، اُنھوں نے کہا کہ بھارتی فوج کا ایسے عناصر کے ساتھ مقابلہ ہوگا جو امن درہم برہم کرنے اور بھارت کو کمزور کرنے پر تُلے ہوئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Allegedly mentioning the specter of terrorism being present in the land of Pakistan, he said that the Indian Army will be competing against those elements that are determined to upset peace and weaken India.

Turk_Translation_3: Referring to the alleged presence of terrorist infrastructure on Pakistani soil, General Kapoor said that Indian army would fight such elements which are out to disturb the peace and weaken India.
Turk_Translation_4: Referring to the alleged presence of terrorist infrastructure on Pakistani soil, he said that India would confront any elements that are determined to disturb the peace and weaken India.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے کہا کہ بھارتی کشمیر کی سرزمین پر سات سے آٹھ سو تک جنگجو موجود ہیں جِن میں سے تقریباً پچاس فی صد غیر ملکی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: He said that in Indian Kashmir there are up to seven to eight hundred militants, of which approximately fifty percent are foreigners.

Turk_Translation_3: He said between 700 and 800 militants are present in the Indian Kashmir of which almost fifty peer cent are foreign militants.
Turk_Translation_4: He said that about 700-800 militants are present in Indian-held Kashmir, of which 50 per cent are foreigners.

Urdu: جنرل دیپک کپور نے کہا کہ  موسم میں بہتری کے ساتھ ہی پاکستان اور اُس کے زیرِ انتظام کشمیر سے دراندازی کی کوششوں میں ا ضافہ ہو سکتا ہے،تاہم  بھارت نے سرحدوں پر چوکسی بڑھا دی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: General Deepak Kapoor said that only with an improvement in weather can infiltration efforts can be increased by Pakistan and the part of Kashmir under its control; however, India has increased vigilance on the borders.

Urdu: اُنھوں نے بھارتی زیرِ انتظام کشمیر میں تعینات فوج کی تعداد میں تخفیف کے امکانات کویہ کہہ کر  رد کر دیا کہ ملک کی سلامتی کے  ساتھ سمجھوتا نہیں کیا جا سکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: He rejected the possibility of reducing the number of armed forces stationed in Indian-controlled Kashmir, saying that the country's safety cannot be compromised.
Turk_Translation_2: He rejected the possibility of reduction in the strength of the army deployed in the Indian-administered Kashmir by saying that the security of the country could not be compromised.
Turk_Translation_3: He rejected the call to reduce the military presence in the Indian-administered Kashmir saying that national security cannot be compromised.
Turk_Translation_4: He rejected the possibility of a reduction in Indian troop presence in Indian-held Kashmir, saying that national security cannot be compromised.

Urdu: اللہ دُنيا کی زبان مُبارک کرے اور باراک دُنيا کے لیے مُبارک ثابت ہوں،
Turk_Translation_1: May Allah bless what the world is saying and may Barack prove to be a blessing for the world.
Turk_Translation_2: May Allah bless the world opinion and Barack proves to be a blessing for the world
Turk_Translation_3: May prayers of the world come true and Barack proves a blessing to the world.
Turk_Translation_4: May the world say good things, and may Obama be good for the world!

Urdu: گو اُمّيد تو نہيں ہے پھر بھی ديکھتے ہيں پاکِستان اور امريکہ کے تعلُقات کِس حد تک اِس تبديلی کے تنيجے ميں ہمارے حق ميں ہوتے ہيں
Turk_Translation_1: Although there is no hope, but still, let's see to what extent Pakistan and America's relations turn in our favor as a result of this change.
Turk_Translation_2: although we are not hopeful, still let us see to what extent this change brings PakistaniAmerican relations to our favor
Turk_Translation_3: Although there is not much hope, but let us see how far the relations between Pakistan and America turn our way as a result of this change
Turk_Translation_4: Although there is no such hope, however, let us watch how far Pak-US relations shift in our favour as a result of this change.

Urdu: کہ باراک صاحب جو مارٹن لُوتھر کِنگ کے خوابوں کی تعبير ہيں دُنيا کو کيا تعبير ديتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: What reality would Barack, who is a reality of Martin Luther King's dream, give to the world.
Turk_Translation_2: as Barack Sahib is an interpretation of Martin Luther King's dreams, what interpretation he gives to the world.
Turk_Translation_3: Let us see how Mr. Barack, who himself is the realization of Martin Luther King's dreams, puts them into reality.
Turk_Translation_4: Let also watch what Barak (Obama), who himself is a realization of Martin Luther King's dream, does for the world.

Urdu: اوباما جنکے نام کا حصہ حسين بھي ہے، کا آج امريکی صدر کی حيثيت سے حلف اٹھانا جہاں ہر لحاظ سے تاريخی حيثيت کاحامل ہے وہيں تاريخ کاايک کڑا امتحان بھی ہے
Turk_Translation_1: As Obama, whose name also has Hussein as part of it, takes oath as the president of America today, it is in all ways not only an event of historical significance, but also a hard test of history,
Turk_Translation_2: Obama, a part of whose name is also Hussein, his taking an oath today as President of America is an historic event and also a difficult test for history
Turk_Translation_3: Oath-taking as President of America to-day by Obama, whose name also includes Hussein, is not only an historical event in all respects but also is a stern test in history
Turk_Translation_4: For Obama, who has the word "Hussein" as part of his name, taking the oath as President of the United States is historically important. At the same time, it is also a tough test.

Urdu: نہ صرف انکی اپنی ذات کيلیے بلکہ ان تمام لوگوں کيلیے جنہوں نے دل وجان سےسپورٹ کيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: not just for his own race, but for all those people who gave their full support.
Turk_Translation_2: not only for his own self, but also for all those who supported him with their heart and soul.
Turk_Translation_3: for him-self, but also for all of them who supported him wholeheartedly.
Turk_Translation_4: Not only for his race, but also for all of those who supported him.

Urdu: يہ امتحان ہوگا سفيدفام اکثريت کا بھی کے انکے لیے ايک سياہ فام کا ان پرحکومت کرنےکا دل سےقبول کرنا آسان کام نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This will also be a test for the white majority, for which taking a black as their president would not be easy to accept.
Turk_Translation_2: This will be a test for the white majority also, because it is not an easy task for them to accept from their hearts the government of a black man over them.
Turk_Translation_3: This is also a test for the white majority who may find it difficult to wholeheartedly accept a black person as their ruler.
Turk_Translation_4: Additionally, it will be a test for the white majority, as it is not easy for them, in their hearts, to accept being ruled by a black man.

Urdu: يہاں جنوبی ایشیا خاصکرمسلمانوں کو جوان سےاميديں لگائے ہوئے ہيں ياد رکھنا چاہئيے کہ وہ امريکہ کے صدر منتخب ہوئے ہيں اور اوباما کو ياد رکھنا چاہئيے کہ صدر امريکہ عملی طور پردنيا کا صدر ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Those people here in South Asia, especially Muslims who have attached hopes to him, should remember that he is the president of America, and Obama should remember that America's president is practically the president of the whole world.
Turk_Translation_2: Here, the people of South Asia, especially the Muslims, who have pinned hopes on him, should bear in mind that he has been elected as the President of America and Obama should keep in mind that the President of America is practically the president of the world.
Turk_Translation_3: People in South Asia, especially the Muslims, who have pinned their hopes on him should remember that he has been elected as the President of America and Obama should bear in mind that an American President is practically a President of the world.
Turk_Translation_4: Here, South Asians, and Muslims in particular, who have attached hopes to him, should remember that he has been elected as the US president. And, on his part, Obama should remember that the US president is practically the president of the world.

Urdu: اب سے کچھ دير بعد ايک ايسا شخص جس کے نسلی طور پر بھائی بند غلامی کا طوق پہنے اپني اپنی مادر وطن سے امريکہ لائے گئے تھے اور جنکے خون پسينے نے دورِ جديد کی سب سے طاقتور مملکت کی جڑوں کو سينچا ہے آج اسی نسلی امتیاز کی شکار قوم کا نمائندہ اسي امريکہ کا چواليسواں صدر کہلائےگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Today, a few moments from now, a representative whose racial brethren were brought in shackles from their native lands to America, who strengthened the roots of modern day's most powerful land with their hard work, who suffered racial biases, will become America's 44th president.
Turk_Translation_2: After a while from now, a person, the people of whose ethnic origin were brought to America as slaves from their respective homelands and who offered their sweat and blood to the roots of the world's most powerful modern state, today the representative of the same racially subjected nation will be called the forty-fourth President of this very America.
Turk_Translation_3: A little while from now, a man, whose racial brethren were brought from their respective homelands to America with the yoke of slavery around their necks and who had - nurtured the foundations of the most powerful nation of the modern era with their blood and sweat, will become the forty-fourth President of this very America representing the same racially marginalized community.
Turk_Translation_4: The United States will today have in its 40th president a person who comes from a race whose members were brought to the US as slaves and who greatly contributed to the development of the country, which is today counted as the most powerful nation. A member of the same racially-victimized community is poised to become the next US president.

Urdu: اس ایک شخص سے بہت سے لوگوں نے بہت سی توقعات وابستہ کر رکھی ہیں،
Turk_Translation_1: Many people have a lot of expectations from this one person.
Turk_Translation_2: Many people have pinned many hopes on this person
Turk_Translation_3: A lot many people have a lot of expectations from this man.
Turk_Translation_4: Many people have attached a great deal of hope to this person.

Urdu: اسکے چاہنے والوں پر لازم ہے کہ اس شخص سےغيرحقيقت پسندانہ اميديں نہ لگائيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: His supporters have an obligation to not attach unrealistic expectations to this man.
Turk_Translation_2: it is important for his fans not to repose unrealistic hopes from him.
Turk_Translation_3: It is necessary for those who love him not to pin unrealistic hopes on him.
Turk_Translation_4: His fans should not have unrealistic expectations for him.

Urdu: اگر اوباما دنيا ميں نسل، مذہب جيسی بنيادوں پر پھيلی نفرت کو کسی طور کم کرنےميں ہي کامياب ہوجائيں تو يہ اسکے چاہنے والوں کی جيت ہوگی۔
Turk_Translation_1: If Obama succeeds in somehow bringing down hatred based on race and religion and other such factors, it would be a victory of his supporters.
Turk_Translation_2: If Obama is able to emerge successful in some way in just alleviating the hatred spread in the world on the bases like religion and race, then this will be the success of his lovers.
Turk_Translation_3: If Obama can somehow reduce the hatred emanating from sources such as race and religion, it will be a victory for those who love him.
Turk_Translation_4: Even if Obama only succeeds in minimizing the race and religion-based discrimination to some extent, it should be counted as a victory for his supporters.

Urdu: اس تبدیلی سےجنوبی ایشیا پرکیا اثرپڑے گا اورکیا اس حوالےسےامریکی پالیسی میں معنی خیز تبدیلی کی توقع کی جا سکتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: How would this change affect South Asia and, in this regard, can some meaningful change be expected in the American policy?
Turk_Translation_2: What will be the effect of this change on South Asia and whether a meaningful change can be expected in American policy as a result of this change.
Turk_Translation_3: What impact will this change have on South Asia and can some meaningful change be expected in the American policy - due to this development.
Turk_Translation_4: What impact will this change have on South Asia? Can a meaningful change in US foreign policy be expected in this regard?

Urdu: پاکستان اور امریکہ کے تعلقات پر یہ تبدیلی کیسےاثرانداز ہوگی۔
Turk_Translation_1: How would this change affect the relations between Pakistan and America?
Turk_Translation_2: How is this policy going to impact Pakistani-American relations.
Turk_Translation_3: How will this change affect the relations between Pakistan and America.
Turk_Translation_4: What impact will this change have on Pak-US relations?

Urdu: ` (بی بی سي)
Turk_Translation_1: (BBC)
Turk_Translation_2: (BBC)'
Turk_Translation_3: (BBC)
Turk_Translation_4: (BBC)

Urdu: جنابِ من، اوباما ہو يا کوئی اور، پُوری دُنيا کی بابت پاليسی و تعلقات کی نوعيت کا تعين تو کھرب ہا پتي، با اثر، مضبوط اور اثر و رسوخ کی حامل يہودی لابی ہی کرتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: My dear, be it Obama or anyone else, it is the influential, strong, and the billionaire Jewish lobby that decides the kind of direction that the whole world's policy and relations would take.
Turk_Translation_2: My Lord, whether it is Obama or anybody else, only the billionaire, effective, strong and resourceful Jewish lobby determines the nature of policy and relationship regarding the whole world.
Turk_Translation_3: Dear Sir, whether it be Obama or someone else, - - the multi-billionaire, effective, strong and influential Jewish lobby determines the policy and nature of relations with the whole world.
Turk_Translation_4: Mister, it does not matter who the person is -- Obama or someone else, for it is the rich, strong and influential Jewish lobby alone that shapes the policy toward the world and the nature of relations.

Urdu: اور جہاں تک پاکستان کا تعلق ہے، حاليہ ممبئی دھماکوں کے سلسلے ميں بھارت، اسرائيل اور امريکہ تکون کا جارحانہ رويہ پوری دنيا کے سامنے ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And as far as Pakistan is concerned, the whole world can see the offensive attitude of India, Israel, and America's triangle about the recent Mumbai blasts.
Turk_Translation_2: And as far as Pakistan is concerned, in the context of recent Mumbai blasts, the aggressive attitude of the India, Israel and American triangle's is open to the whole world.
Turk_Translation_3: And as far as Pakistan is concerned, the aggressive behavior of Indian-Israeli-American triangle in connection with the recent Mumbai blasts is before the whole world to see.
Turk_Translation_4: As far as Pakistan is concerned, the critical stand of India, Israel, and even the US, is quite clear regarding the Mumbai attacks that took place recently.

Urdu: پاکستان بننے کے بعد بھی کافی عرصہ تک سوات کا تمام انتظام والی سوات کے ذمہ تھا جن کی باقاعدہ ايک فوج اور قانون تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: For a long time after Pakistan came into being, the responsibility for Swat remained in the hands of the Guardian of Swat, who had his own army and law.
Turk_Translation_2: Even after the creation of Pakistan, for a considerably long period of time, the administration of Sawat was the responsibility of Wali-e-Sawat who maintained a regular force and law.
Turk_Translation_3: For a long time even after the creation of Pakistan, the Wali of Swat was responsible for the administration of Swat with his regular army and law.
Turk_Translation_4: For a long time after the creation of Pakistan, the governor of Swat looked after all of the administrative affairs of Swat. He had his regular army and independent law.

Urdu: انہوں نے ايک معاہدے کے تحت سوات کا انتظام حکومت پاکسان کے سپرد کيا
Turk_Translation_1: He handed over the administration of Swat to the Pakistani government according to an agreement.
Turk_Translation_2: Under an agreement, he handed over the administration of Sawat to the Government of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: He handed over the administration of Swat to the government of Pakistan by a treaty
Turk_Translation_4: He had handed over the administration of Swat to the Pakistani government under an accord.

Urdu: مگر افسوس کہ ہماری حکومتوں نے سوات کے ساتھ سوتيلی ماں جيسا سلوک کيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: But sadly, our government treated Swat like a step mother.
Turk_Translation_2: but alas! our government treated Sawat like a stepmother.
Turk_Translation_3: but it's a pity that our governments accorded a step-motherly treatment to Swat.
Turk_Translation_4: However, it is a matter of regret that our governments have treated Swat like a stepmother.

Urdu: سوات ميں والی سوات کی حکومت کے خاتمے کے بعد سکولوں کی تعداد ميں بالکل بھی اضافہ نہيں ہوا
Turk_Translation_1: After the rule of the Guardian of Swat ended, there was no increase in the number of schools at all.
Turk_Translation_2: After Wali-e-Sawat's government was over, there has been no increase in the number of schools in Sawat
Turk_Translation_3: Neither there has been an increase in number of schools at all in Swat since abolition of rule by the Wali of Swat
Turk_Translation_4: As of the end of the governance of Swat's governor, the number of schools never increased there.

Urdu: اور نہ ہی وہاں کی تعمير و ترقی ميں دلچسپی لی گئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: And nobody took interest in the development and progress of the area.
Turk_Translation_2: and no interest was taken in the construction and development of that area.
Turk_Translation_3: nor any interest has been taken in the construction and development of Swat.
Turk_Translation_4: Also, no interest was taken in its development and prosperity.

Urdu: موجودہ دور ميں جو لڑکياں تعليم حاصل کررہی تھيں ان کی تعداد سابقہ دور سے کئی گنا کم ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The number of girls acquiring education today is far less than those who went to school in that period.
Turk_Translation_2: The number of girls currently getting an education is several times less than those who used to get education in the past.
Turk_Translation_3: The number of girls who have been getting education in the present era are many times lesser than these were in the previous era.
Turk_Translation_4: The number of girls who were attending school in recent times was several times lower than the number who used to study in the past.

Urdu: پاکستان کے صوبہ سرحد میں مقامی طالبان کی جانب سے تعلیمی اداروں کو نشانہ بنائے جانے کا سلسلہ جاری ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Local Taliban continues to target educational institutes in Pakistan's North West Frontier province.
Turk_Translation_2: The local Taliban continue to target educational institutions in NWFP, Pakistan
Turk_Translation_3: In the Frontier province of Pakistan, the series of targeting the educational institutes by the local Taliban is continuing.
Turk_Translation_4: Local Taliban continue to target educational institutions in Pakistan's Frontier Province.

Urdu: سب سے زیادہ سکول ضلع سوات میں تباہ کیے گئے ہیں جن میں سے زیادہ تر لڑکیوں کے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Highest number of schools have been destroyed in Swat District, of which the majority were girls' schools.
Turk_Translation_2: The maximum number of schools that have been destroyed, lie in Sawat District, most amongst them are girls schools.
Turk_Translation_3: The largest number of the schools, most of whom were for girls, have been destroyed in district Swat.
Turk_Translation_4: Most of the schools destroyed are in the Swat district. Among them, most are girls' schools.

Urdu: اتنا ہی نہیں طالبان نے سوات میں لڑکیوں کی تعلیم پر پابندی کا اعلان بھی کر دیا گیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Not just this, Taliban has also announced a ban on the education of girls in Swat.
Turk_Translation_2: Not only this, the Taliban have also announced a ban on the education of girls in Sawat.
Turk_Translation_3: Not being content with that, Taliban have also announced a ban on the education of girls in Swat.
Turk_Translation_4: Moreover, the Taliban have declared a ban on girls' education in Swat.

Urdu: ہزاروں طلباء و طالبات تعلیم کے حصول سے محروم ہو رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Thousands of male and female students are being deprived of education.
Turk_Translation_2: Thousands of male and female students are being deprived of education.
Turk_Translation_3: Thousands of boys and girls are being deprived of education.
Turk_Translation_4: As a result, thousands of students, both boys and girls, are being deprived of education.

Urdu: آپ کو کیا لگتا ہے کہ لڑکیوں کی تعلم ختم کر کے طالبان کیا حاصل کرنا چاہتے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: What do you think the Taliban are trying to achieve by stopping girls from getting educated?
Turk_Translation_2: What, in your opinion, the Taliban want to achieve by banning female education.
Turk_Translation_3: What do you think Taliban want to achieve by stopping the education of the girls?
Turk_Translation_4: In your opinion, what is Taliban's intention behind depriving girls of education?

Urdu: حکومت اب تک ان غیر قانونی اقدامات کو روکنے میں ناکام کیوں رہی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Why has the government been unsuccessful in putting an end to these lawless acts?
Turk_Translation_2: Why has the government so far failed to control these illegal measures.
Turk_Translation_3: Why has the government so far failed in checking these illegal acts?
Turk_Translation_4: Why did the government fail, until now, to curb these illegal activities?

Urdu: آپ کے خیال میں حکومت کو کیا کرنا چاہئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: What, in your opinion, should the government do?
Turk_Translation_2: What, in your opinion, should the government do.
Turk_Translation_3: What - do you reckon the government should do?
Turk_Translation_4: In your opinion, what should the government do?

Urdu: سوال يہ ہونا چاہيے کہ آئی ايس آئی اور پاکستانی ايجنسييوں کو کيا مليگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: The question should be, what would ISI and the Pakistani agencies get?
Turk_Translation_2: The question should be what the ISI and Pakistani agencies will get.
Turk_Translation_3: The question should be ; what will the ISI and the Pakistani agencies get?
Turk_Translation_4: The question that should be asked is what benefits the ISI and the Pakistani agencies will reap.

Urdu: کيونکہ سوات کے عوام کو اب يہ کھيل سمجھ آچکا ہے کہ فوج وہاں طالبان کے خدمت کے لیے ہے ان کو مارنے کے ليے نہیں ورنہ کرفيو میں ايک ہی رات پانچ سکول کيسے اڑائے جا سکتے ہیں کرفيو میں لوگوں کو ذبح کر کے شہر کے مین چوک میں کيسے لٹکايا جاسکتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Because, the people of Swat now understand the game, which is that the army is there to serve the Taliban and not to hurt them. Otherwise, how could five schools be blown up in one night during a curfew, or how could people be slaughtered and hung at the main square of the city while the curfew was still on?
Turk_Translation_2: Because the people of Sawat have clearly understood now the game that the army is there to serve the Taliban and not for killing them, otherwise how can five schools be blasted in a single night during curfew and how can the people be hanged in the main city crossing after cutting their throats during curfew.
Turk_Translation_3: Because the people of Swat have now understood this game that the army is there to serve the Taliban and not to kill them. Otherwise how five schools could be blown up in one night despite the curfew and how people could be slaughtered and hung in the central square of the city during the curfew hours?
Turk_Translation_4: The people of Swat have now understood this game, which is about serving the Taliban, not killing them. Otherwise, how could five persons have been killed in one night in a state of curfew? How could people could have been hanged in the main street of the city after being butchered?

Urdu: سوات میں جب حکومت کي رٹ ہي قائم نہیں ہونے دي جا رہي تو ايسےمیں حکومت ان غیر قانونی اقدامات کو روکنے میں کيونکر کامياب ہو؟
Turk_Translation_1: If the government is not being allowed to establish its rule in Swat, then how can the government succeed in putting an end to these activities that are against the law?
Turk_Translation_2: When the government authority is not being allowed to be established in Sawat, then in these circumstances how can the government be successful in controlling these illegal measures?
Turk_Translation_3: How can the government succeed in checking these illegal activities when it is not being allowed to establish its writ in Swat?
Turk_Translation_4: Since the government failed to implement its law in Swat, then how it can succeed in preventing these illegal actions?

Urdu: اب سوال يہ برآمد ہوا کہ جب مسلح فوج، جديد وآتشیں اسلحہ، جدید ٹيکنالوجی و جاسوسی نظام وغيرہ سب کچھ حکومت کے پاس ہے تو يہ چار طالبان قابو کيوں نہیں ہو رہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Now the question is raised that when the government has an army, modern and powerful weapons, modern technology and spying system etc., then why can these four Taliban not be controlled?
Turk_Translation_2: Now the question arises when the government has the army, the latest weapons, the modern technology and surveillance system, then why are they unable to control a few Taliban?
Turk_Translation_3: So the question is that the government has everything including armed forces, modern weapons, modern technology and the intelligence system, etc., then how come it cannot control handful of Taliban?
Turk_Translation_4: The question is that, while the government agencies possess everything from armed forces, modern firearms, and modern technology to spy systems, why can't these outnumbered Taliban be controlled?

Urdu: اسکا جواب تو يہی ہے کہ ان کے سر پر کسی ’خفيہ پير‘ کا ہاتھ ہے کہ نہ تو ان کا اسلحہ ختم ہوتا ہے اور نہ ہي يہ پکڑے جاتے ہیں
Turk_Translation_1: The answer to this is that they have the protection of some "secret benefactor," which enables them to neither run out of weapons nor get caught.
Turk_Translation_2: The only answer to this question is that they are being protected by some unknown power because neither their ammunition gets exhausted nor they get caught
Turk_Translation_3: The answer can only be that they have the blessing of some 'secret saint' so neither they run out of ammunition nor they get caught
Turk_Translation_4: The answer is that they are supported by some 'hidden power', as neither are their weapons turned over, nor are they caught.

Urdu: حاصل کلام يہ کہ يہ طالبان اپنے کالے کرتوتوں کے ذريعہ ’عالمي سامراج‘ کا کام آسان کر رہے ہیں
Turk_Translation_1: The essence of the whole discussion is that the Taliban, because of their own misdeeds, are making the work of the "imperialists of the world" easy.
Turk_Translation_2: the gist of the issue is that these Taliban, with their wicked deeds, are facilitating the job of international powers
Turk_Translation_3: and the conclusion is that the Taliban are making the job of 'international imperialism' easy through their dark acts.
Turk_Translation_4: In a nutshell, the Taliban are facilitating the actions of a global imperial power through their evil deeds.

Urdu: اب سے پندرہ سال قبل افغانستان ميں جنگ جاری تھی
Turk_Translation_1: Fifteen years ago, war was on in Afghanistan.
Turk_Translation_2: There was war going on in Afghanistan fifteen years ago
Turk_Translation_3: Fifteen years ago, there had been a war in Afghanistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Fifteen years ago, there was war in Afghanistan.

Urdu: آئی ايس آئی طالبان کو کنٹرول کر رہی تھی جبکہ مدد مقابل شمالی اتحاد تھا جس کو روس،بھارت اور ايران مدد ديتے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: ISI was controlling the Taliban, while in opposition were the Northern Alliance, who were being helped by Russia, India, and Iran.
Turk_Translation_2: ISI was controlling the Taliban, whereas the rival was Northern Alliance which was supported by Russia, India and Iran.
Turk_Translation_3: The ISI was controlling the Taliban and the opponents were the Northern Alliance who were being supported by Russia, India and Iran.
Turk_Translation_4: The Taliban were controlled by the ISI, while the rival Northern Alliance was supported by Russia, India and Iran.

Urdu: پھر اچانک حالات بدلے طالبان کے کرتوت سامنے آنے لگے
Turk_Translation_1: Then suddenly the situation changed and the Taliban's bad behavior was exposed.
Turk_Translation_2: Then suddenly the circumstances changed and the Taliban's evil agenda started coming to light
Turk_Translation_3: Then the situation changed and the sins of Taliban began to surface
Turk_Translation_4: All of a sudden, the situation changed. And, all of the actions of the Taliban became clear.

Urdu: اور آئی ايس آئی کو بھی امريکا سے ڈالروں کی آفر آگئی چنانچہ سابقہ دوست دشمن بن گۓ۔
Turk_Translation_1: And ISI also got an offer of dollars from America, which changed the old friends into enemies.
Turk_Translation_2: and ISI also got dollars offer from America, and as such, former friends became enemies.
Turk_Translation_3: and the ISI too was offered dollars by the Americans so the former friends became enemies.
Turk_Translation_4: Also, the ISI was offered dollars by the US. Hence, the friend turned to foe.

Urdu: اب صورت حال يہ ہے کہ جنگ اب بھی جاری ہے مگر پکستان ميں مدد کرنے والے بھی وہی ہيں ايران ،بھارت اور روس
Turk_Translation_1: Now the situation is that the war is still on but the countries providing aid in Pakistan are the same - Iran, India, and Russia.
Turk_Translation_2: The current situation is that the war is still continuing but in Pakistan supporters are the same e.g. Iran, India and Russia
Turk_Translation_3: Now the situation is that the war is still raging but in Pakistan; the helpers are the same: Iran, India and Russia
Turk_Translation_4: In the current situation, the war is still going on. But, the supporters in Pakistan are the same: Iran, India and Russia.

Urdu: جب تک انسان میں یہ احساس پیدا ہ نہ و کہ غلط اور صحیح کیا ہوتا ہے تب تک انسان غلطی کرتا ہی رہتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Unless a person realizes what is right and what is wrong, they continue to err.
Turk_Translation_2: Unless a man starts feeling the difference between right and wrong, he will continue to make mistakes.
Turk_Translation_3: As long as a man does not develop a sense of right and wrong, he continues to err.
Turk_Translation_4: A person keeps committing mistakes as long as he fails to distinguish between what is right and what is wrong.

Urdu: مثال کے طور پر ایک چور جب چوری کرنے کے لیے جاتا ہے اگر اس کو اُس وقت یہ خیال آجائے کہ ’چوری کرنا اچھی بات نہیں اور چوری ایک لعنت ہے، اس میں سزا بھی ہے اور وہ خدا سے ڈرتا ہو‘تو وہ انسان چوری نہیں کرے گا
Turk_Translation_1: For instance, if someone goes to steal and realizes at that moment that "theft is not a good thing and it's a curse, it entails punishment and they are also afraid of God," they would not steal.
Turk_Translation_2: For example, when a thief attempts a theft, and at that time he gets a feeling that 'theft is not a good thing and it is a curse and involves punishment and he fears God' then he will not commit theft
Turk_Translation_3: For instance, when a thief sets out to commit a theft but realizes in time that 'theft is not good; it is a curse; he will be punished and he also fears God', then he won't commit theft.
Turk_Translation_4: For example, if a thief realizes that theft is a bad habit and a curse, and that it brings punishment and the wrath of God, then this realization will serve as an effective deterrent for him, and he will not proceed with his plan of theft.

Urdu: اسی طرح سے جب تک اسرائیل کو یہ احساس نہ ہو جائے کہ میں غلط کرتا ہوں اور معصوموں کا خون بہا رہا ہوں اور اس کو اس کی سزا ملے گی تب تک وہ غزہ میں معصوموں کے خون کے ساتھ ہولی کھیلتا رہے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Similarly, until Israel realizes that it is wrong and it is killing innocent people and that it will be punished for it, it will recklessly continue shedding the blood of innocents in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_2: in a similar way unless Israel develops a feeling that it is doing wrong and killing innocent people and will be punished for this until that time Israel will continue to play with the blood of innocent people in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_3: Similarly, as long as Israel does not realize that it has been committing something wrong by spilling the blood of the innocent people and rendering itself to punishment, it will continue to play havoc with the lives of the innocent people in Gaza.
Turk_Translation_4: Similarly, as long as Israel fails to realize that it is doing wrong by killing innocent people, and that it will be punished for doing so, it will continue to shed the blood of innocents in Gaza.

Urdu: آداب!
Turk_Translation_1: Greetings!
Turk_Translation_2: Greetings!
Turk_Translation_3: Hello!
Turk_Translation_4: Greetings!

Urdu: سوال يہ کہ جنگ، مسلح تحريک، دہشتگردی مسائل کا حل ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: The question is that is war, an armed movement, and terrorism a solution to problems?
Turk_Translation_2: The question is if war, armed struggle, terrorism are the solutions to problems?
Turk_Translation_3: The question is: Do war, an armed movement and terrorism offer solution to the problems?
Turk_Translation_4: The question is: are war, armed struggle or terrorism solutions to the problems?

Urdu: اگر نہيں تو پھر وہ کونسا نسخہء کيميا ہےجو مسائل کےحل کی طرف لے جاتا ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: If not, then what is the secret formula that can guide to a solution of these problems?
Turk_Translation_2: If not, then what is the chemical formula that leads towards the solution of the problems?
Turk_Translation_3: If not, then what is that magical formula which would lead to solution of the problems?
Turk_Translation_4: If not, then what is the useful prescription that may potentially lead to solving the problem?

Urdu: يہ درست کہ جنگ، متشدد راستہ مسائل کو حل نہيں کرتا بلکہ ان ميں مزيد ’برکت‘ ڈالتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: It's true that war or an armed struggle does not solve any problems; it rather increases them.
Turk_Translation_2: It is true that war and terrorist methods do not solve problems but increase them.
Turk_Translation_3: It is correct that war and violent means do not settle problems, rather they aggravate them.
Turk_Translation_4: It is correct that war and the path of violence do not solve problems. On the contrary, they further complicate them.

Urdu: فلسطين، افغانستان، عراق کو اپنی تحريکوں کی کاميابی کيلیے اسی ماڈل کو اختيار کرنا چاہئيے جو جنوبی افريقہ ميں نيلسن منڈيلا نےاختيار کيا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: In order for Palestine, Afghanistan, and Iraq to be successful in their political process they should follow the same model that Nelson Mandela employed in South Africa.
Turk_Translation_2: For the success of their movements, Palestine, Afghanistan and Iraq should follow the same model that Nelson Mandela adopted in South Africa.
Turk_Translation_3: Palestine, Afghanistan and Iraq should follow the same model for success of their movements which was adopted by Nelson Mandela in South Africa.
Turk_Translation_4: In order for their movements to be successful, Palestine, Afghanistan and Iraq should opt for the model implemented by Nelson Mandela in South Africa.

Urdu: يعنی مسلح جدوجہد سے زيادہ اخلاقی وسياسی جدوجہد اور ’نفسي جہاد‘ کرنا۔
Turk_Translation_1: This means engaging in a struggle that is more political and moral instead of armed, and requires reconciliation.
Turk_Translation_2: This means more than an armed struggle pursuing the path of moral and political struggles and 'self jihad.'
Turk_Translation_3: That is, - instead of armed struggle, they should opt for moral and political struggle and '' self-control.
Turk_Translation_4: Morals, political struggle and Jihad against oneself should be given more of a chance than armed struggle.

Urdu: کشميريوں کا اليکشن ميں حصہ لينے سے نظر آتا ہے کہ انہوں نےاس نقطہء کو قبول کر ليا ہے۔

Urdu: کوئی احمد نژاد سے کہے کہ تم ہی پہل کر دو کيوں کے بی بی سی کے فورم ميں تمہاری بہادری کے بڑے چرچے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Someone should suggest to Ahmadi-nejad to take the first step as he is famous for his fearlessness in the BBC forum.
Turk_Translation_2: Someone should ask Ahmadinejad to take a first step because he is popular with the BBC forum for his valor.
Turk_Translation_3: Someone should ask Ahmadinejad to take initiative because a lot is being said about his bravery on BBC forum.
Turk_Translation_4: It would be better if somebody would suggest to Ahmadinejad to take the initiative, as his courage is much appreciated on the BBC forum.

Urdu: قيام امن اور انساني حقوق کی ذمہ داری صرف عربوں پر، يا مسلمانان عالم پر ہی عائد نہیں ہوتی بلکہ يہ اقوام عالم کا فرض ہے کہ ظلم کے خلاف آواز اٹھائیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Maintaining peace and taking care of human rights is not just the responsibility of the Arabs or the Muslim world; it is the duty of all the countries to raise their voice against injustice.
Turk_Translation_2: The responsibility for the establishment of peace and human rights not only rests with Arabs or Muslims of the world, it is also the responsibility of the entire international community to raise its voice against aggression.
Turk_Translation_3: Responsibilities relating to maintenance of peace and human rights do not devolve upon Arabs or the Muslims of the world alone, rather it is duty of the international community to raise their voice against cruelty.
Turk_Translation_4: The responsibility of establishing peace and human rights does not fall on the Arabs or Muslims of the world alone. Rather, it is the duty of the nations of the world to raise a voice against injustice.

Urdu: يہ اندوہناک واقعہ بش کے اب تک کیے گۓ گناہوں ميں سب سے بد ترين ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This sad incidence is the worst among the sins committed by Bush.
Turk_Translation_2: This horrific incident is the nastiest of all the sins Bush has committed so far.
Turk_Translation_3: This horrific incident is the deadliest of the sins committed by Bush so far.
Turk_Translation_4: This dreadful incident is the worst of the sins Bush has yet committed.

Urdu: جس طرح پاکستان و انڈيا میں 30 جون يعنی مالی سال ختم ہونے سے پہلے سرکاری اداروں ميں لوٹ مار ہوتی ہے بالکل اسی طرح امريکی انتظاميہ نے اپنے اختتام سے پہلے اسرائيل کو گرين سگنل ديا ہے کہ جو مرضی چاہے کرگزرو۔
Turk_Translation_1: American administration has given a green signal to Israel indicating that it can do whatever it wants, just like looting and plundering is done in government organizations in Pakistan and India when the financial year ends on June 30.
Turk_Translation_2: As happens in India and Pakistan, financial corruption starts in government institutions before the close of the fiscal year on 30 June. In exactly similar style, the American administration, before the close up of its government, has given the green light to Israel to do whatever it has a desire to do.
Turk_Translation_3: Just like corruption and plundering is let loose in government departments in Pakistan and India, by 30th of June, i.e. the end of a fiscal year, the American administration, before its dissolution, has given Israel the green signal to do whatever may please it.
Turk_Translation_4: The US administration has given Israel the green light to do whatever it wishes, just as government institutions in India and Pakistan freely indulge in the worst form of corruption before June 30 -- i.e. before the end of the fiscal year, each year.

Urdu: ایک طرف امریکہ کہتا ہے کہ جنگ بندی کی کوشش کی جائیگی،

Urdu: دوسری طرف اقوام متحدہ قرارداد پر قرارداد منظور کر رہی ہے، لیکن عملی طور پر دونوں نے کچھ نہیں کیا، اس کا ایک ہی مطلب نکلتا ہے کہ مسلمانوں کو کچلنے کے لیے اقوام متحدہ بھی برسر پیکار ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: On the other, the United Nations is passing resolution after resolution, but really, both have not done anything. Only one conclusion can be drawn and that is the United Nations is also determined to crush the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_2: on the other hand, the United Nations is passing resolution after resolution but in practice both have done nothing. This only means that the UN is also trying to crush the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_3: on the other hand, the United Nations is passing one resolution after another but nothing has been done practically. This leads one to reach the only conclusion that the United Nations is also working to crush the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_4: On the other, the United Nations has been passing resolution after resolution. However, both have done nothing practically on the ground -- a matter that sends only one signal -- that the United Nations is also prepared to ruin Muslims.

Urdu: تمام مسلم ممالک کو اقوام متحدہ کی رکنیت فوری طوری پر ختم کر دینی چاہیے اور اپنی عالمی تنظیم کی بنیاد ڈالنی چاہیے۔
Turk_Translation_1: All Muslim countries should discontinue their membership in the United Nations and lay the foundation for their own international organization.
Turk_Translation_2: All the Muslim countries should immediately withdraw their membership of the UN and lay the foundation of their own international organization.
Turk_Translation_3: All the Muslim countries should immediately cancel their membership of the United Nations and form an international organization of their own.
Turk_Translation_4: All Muslim countries should withdraw their membership from the United Nations immediately, and should form a global body of their own.

Turk_Translation_1: We have many instances where America and United Nations just made promises and passed resolutions. It was only the Muslims who suffered.

Turk_Translation_3: We have many examples before us where America and the United Nations have only made pledges and passed resolutions but the loss has been suffered by Muslims alone.
Turk_Translation_4: We have several examples where the US and the United Nations make promises and pass resolutions, but Muslims just continue to suffer.

Turk_Translation_4: The favorite expression of the people making these anti-Islam comments is "extremism."

Urdu: ليکن انتہا پسند کون ہے اس کا اندازہ آپ اوپر کے تبصرے سے بخوبی لگاسکتے ہيں جس ميں ايران کے خلاف لکھنے پر تقريباً کفر کا فتوا لگا ديا گيا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: But from the discussion above, you can easily guess who the extremist is; in it, writing against Iran has virtually been decreed as blasphemous.
Turk_Translation_2: but who is extremist can be easily judged from the above comments in which writing against Iran has almost been considered to be an act of blasphemy.
Turk_Translation_3: But who is the extremist? You can easily surmise from the comments above in which someone has virtually been declared a non-Muslim for writing against Iran.
Turk_Translation_4: But, the question is: who's the real extremist? That can more easily be determined from the comments mentioned above, which label writing against Iran as disloyal.

Urdu: ہمارے مسلمانوں کو کب سمجھ آئےگی کہ دجال کا مقابلہ تلوار سے نہيں ہوسکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: When will our Muslim brethren understand that the sword cannot be used to vanquish tyranny?
Turk_Translation_2: When will our Muslims understand that fighting with Dejal is not possible by sword.
Turk_Translation_3: When will our Muslim brethren understand that the evil-doers cannot be combated with sword.
Turk_Translation_4: When will we Muslims realize that Dajjal (an evil figure in Islamic eschatology) cannot be fought with the sword?

Urdu: اسرائيل کی بمباری ميں نہتے لوگوں کو ديکھ کر دل خون کے آنسو نہ روئے تو کيا کرے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Watching Israel bomb unarmed people, is that not a heart-wrenching experience?
Turk_Translation_2: Looking at the bombing by Israel on unarmed people prompts our hearts to do what else other than to cry?
Turk_Translation_3: One cannot help shedding tears of blood over the deaths of unarmed civilians in Israeli bombing?
Turk_Translation_4: The Israeli bombings targeting unarmed people are making us shed tears of blood. What else can we do?

Urdu: مگر بنيادی قصور اس فساد اور قتل و غارت کا ہے جسے ہم جہاد کا نام دے کر اسلام کے خوبصورت چہرے پرکالک ملنے کی کوشش کرتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Fundamentally, the blame can be placed on this conflict, murder, and destruction which we call Jihad, and thereby besmirch the beautiful name of Islam.
Turk_Translation_2: But the basic fault lies with that violence and killings to which we give the name of jihad and try to tarnish the beautiful face of Islam.
Turk_Translation_3: But the basic fault lies with the sedition and bloodshed that is our misnomer for jihad and by doing so we try to tarnish the beautiful face of Islam.
Turk_Translation_4: But the main fault lies in the acts of corruption and killing that we call "Jihad," thus damaging the image of Islam.

Urdu: جب فلسطينيوں کی اکثريت اسرائيل کے وجود کو تسليم کرچکی تو حماس کو کيا ضرورت کہ وہ راکٹ اسرائيل پر داغے يا خودکش حملے کروائے۔
Turk_Translation_1: When the majority of Palestinians have accepted the existence of Israel, then why does Hamas attack Israel with rockets or target it with suicide bombers?
Turk_Translation_2: When a majority of Palestinians have accepted the existence of Israel, then why is Hamas firing rockets on Israel and sponsoring suicide bombings.
Turk_Translation_3: When the majority of the Palestinians has recognized Israel, why does Hamas have to fire rockets into Israel or conduct suicide attacks?
Turk_Translation_4: When the majority of Palestinians have already recognized Israel, what is the use of Hamas's firing rockets or carrying out suicide attacks against Israel?

Urdu: دونوں اطراف کے رويے انسانيت سوز ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The attitudes of both sides are not humanitarian.
Turk_Translation_2: An inhumane attitude exists on both sides.
Turk_Translation_3: The behavior by both sides is inhuman.
Turk_Translation_4: The behaviour of both sides is inhumane.

Urdu: امريکہ اور اقوام متحدہ کا کردار پھر ہميں اسرائيل کے مظالم کی حمایت کرتا نظرآيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Once again we see America and the United Nations supporting the injustices of Israel.
Turk_Translation_2: The American and the UN roles are again seen as the supporters of Israeli brutality.
Turk_Translation_3: The role of America and the United Nations again appeared to us as being supportive to Israeli atrocities.
Turk_Translation_4: Again we notice that the US and the United Nations are playing a role that supports the injustices perpetrated by Israel.

Urdu: اللہ تعاليٰ مُسلِم اُمّہ کو ايک ہونے کی توفيق دے ،آمين،
Turk_Translation_1: May Allah grant the Muslim global community the will to be united, Amen.
Turk_Translation_2: May Allah empower the Muslim Ummah to become united, Ameen
Turk_Translation_3: May Allah let the Muslims be united. Amen.
Turk_Translation_4: May Allah unite the Muslim Ummah! Amen!

Urdu: اور اصل دہشت گردوں کو دہشت گردی کی اس تکليف دِہ کارروائی کو دہشت گردی کے خِلاف مُہِم کا نوبل پرائِز دينے کا بھی سوچيں کہ آخِر اصل کام تو وُہی کر رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: And the real terrorists using these painful acts of terrorism against terrorism should be considered for a Nobel prize as, after all, they are the ones doing the real work.
Turk_Translation_2: and think about awarding the Nobel Prize to the real terrorists for terming this painful terrorist activity as a campaign against terrorism, because they are the real masterminds.
Turk_Translation_3: and consider bestowing the Nobel Prize for the war on terror to the real terrorists on this painful act of terrorism because they are the ones doing the actual work.
Turk_Translation_4: May they (Muslim Ummah) think about giving a prize for carrying out the difficult task of combating terrorism to the real terrorists, because they are the ones who are doing the real job.

Urdu: ورنہ کيا اِتنے بڑے پيمانے پر دہشت گردی بغير کِسی وڈے سردار کی پُشت پناہی کے مُمکِن ہے اور يہ تاريں ہِلانے والے کون ہيں سبھی جانتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Otherwise, how is terrorism on such a large scale possible without the backing of some bigwig? And everyone knows who the people pulling these strings are.
Turk_Translation_2: How can such large-scale terrorist activities be carried out without the backing of a big leader and everyone knows how the people behind this game.
Turk_Translation_3: Otherwise, is it possible to do acts of terrorism at such a large scale without the backing of some powerful lord? And everyone knows who holds the strings.
Turk_Translation_4: Otherwise, is terrorism of such a magnitude possible without the backing of some big leader? Everybody knows who stands behind it (terrorism).

Urdu: تو ايسے ميں اِس کو آسان زبان ميں دادا گيری ہی کہا جاتا ہے کہ کر لو جو کرنا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: So, simply put, this is called gangsterism - do whatever you please.
Turk_Translation_2: And in such circumstances it is called 'might is right' in a simple language to do whatever you can do.
Turk_Translation_3: This can then be said to be hoodlumism. i.e. do whatever you can.
Turk_Translation_4: In simple words, they may be termed as behaving like Big Brother.

Urdu: زبردست کا ٹھينگا سر پر مارے بھی اور رونے بھی نا دے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Hit on the head with full force and then don't even let weep over it. Inflicting all-around abuse and won't let you complain either.
Turk_Translation_2: They beat us and we aren't even allowed to cry.
Turk_Translation_3: The powerful man beats and then does not let the victim weep.
Turk_Translation_4: The powerful strikes the weak, and, at the same time, doesn't allow him to weep.

Urdu: زخميوں کے لیے دوائياں، مرنے والوں کے لیے کفن اور پيسہ دے تو رہے ہيں عرب حکمران اور پوچھا جا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Arab leaders are giving medicines to the injured, coffins for the dead, and money, and the question is being raised:
Turk_Translation_2: Arab rulers are sending medicine for the injured, coffins and money for those who died and it is being asked.
Turk_Translation_3: The Arab rulers are providing medicines for the injured and shrouds for the dead and money as well but it is still being asked:
Turk_Translation_4: Arab rulers are giving money and medicine for the injured and burial supplies for the dead.

Urdu: اسرائیلی حملے، کیا ہونا چاہیے؟
Turk_Translation_1: what should be done about Israeli attacks?
Turk_Translation_2: What should be done about Israeli attacks?
Turk_Translation_3: Israeli attacks, what should happen?
Turk_Translation_4: People are asking what should be done about Israeli offensives.

Urdu: مسئلہ دراصل يہ ہے کہ تمام مسلم ممالک کے سربراہان بشمول سعودی فرمارواں خوابہ غفلت ميں سوئے ہوئے ہيں نہ ان کی فوج ہے اور نہ ہی کوئی دفاعی پلان بس يہ سمجھتے ہيں کہ امداد دے کر ان کی ذمہ داری پوری ہوگئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: The actual problem is that the leaders of all Muslim countries, including the Saudi kings, are in a dream world, and neither do they have an army nor a defense plan. They think that by providing aid, they have fulfilled their responsibility.
Turk_Translation_2: The real issue is that all heads of Muslim states including the rulers of Saudi Arabia are gripped in deep ignorance. They have neither any army nor a defense plan. They just assume that by providing relief goods their responsibility is over.
Turk_Translation_3: The problem actually is that the rulers of all the Muslim countries, including the Saudi king are in a slumber. Neither they have any army nor any defense plan. And they assume that by offering aid, they have done their duty.
Turk_Translation_4: In fact, the problem is that the leaders of Muslim countries, including the Saudi rulers, are sleeping. They neither have an army nor a defense plan. They believe they have fulfilled their duties by merely donating relief materials.

Urdu: انہيں فوری طور اسرائيل کے خلاف عملی اقدام کرنا چاہیے۔
Turk_Translation_1: They should immediately take some practical steps against Israel,
Turk_Translation_2: They should immediately take practical steps against Israel.
Turk_Translation_3: They should at once take practical steps against Israel.
Turk_Translation_4: They should take practical measures against Israel immediately.

Urdu: جيسے يورپی ممالک و امريکا کے پيٹرول کی بندش مگر افسوس ان ميں۔
Turk_Translation_1: like stopping the supply of petroleum to America and the European countries, however regretfully they
Turk_Translation_2: For example, a ban on petrol for European countries and America but sadly in them.
Turk_Translation_3: Like an embargo on petrol for the European countries and America. But alas!
Turk_Translation_4: For example, by imposing an oil embargo on European countries and America.

Urdu: تمام بہن بھائيوں کو سلام!
Turk_Translation_1: Greetings to all sisters and brothers!
Turk_Translation_2: Greetings to all sisters and brothers!
Turk_Translation_3: Salaam to all brothers and sisters!
Turk_Translation_4: Greetings to all brothers and sisters!

Urdu: ميرے خيال ميں مشکل کی اس گھڑی ميں حماس کو امن کے نام پر اپنی جدوجہد ترک کرنے کا مشورہ دينا ہزاروں بيواؤں اور لاکھوں يتيوں کے ساتھ نا انصافی اور انہيں ناکام ثابت کرنے کے مترادف ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In my opinion, during these difficult times, suggesting that Hamas give up its struggle in the name of peace would be unfair to the thousands of widows and millions of orphans, and would be akin to failing them.
Turk_Translation_2: In my opinion, in this hour of trial, giving suggestion to Hamas to give up its efforts in the name of peace is like doing injustice to hundreds of thousands of widows and orphans, and it is like proving that they are a failure.
Turk_Translation_3: I think in this hour of adversity, suggesting Hamas to stop its struggle in the name of peace will be sheer injustice to thousands of widows and millions of orphans and will be equivalent to their failure.
Turk_Translation_4: I feel that advising Hamas, at this critical juncture, to give up its struggle in the name of peace, is synonymous with injustice to thousands of widows and hundreds of thousands of orphans, and to neutralize their efforts.

Urdu: اسرائيل اور اس کے حامی اگر اپنی فرعونيت کے عروج پر ہيں تو عنقريب موسيٰ بھی ان کے گھر ميں پيدا ہوگا کيونکہ يہی قانون قدرت ہے امريکا اور اسرائيل کے اقدامات مسلمانوں ميں خود کش بمبار پيدا کرنے ميں کھاد کا کام کر رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: If Israel and its supporters are pretending to be like the Pharaohs, then soon Moses will be born among them because this is the law of Nature. The steps that America and Israel are taking are the propagators of suicide bombers among the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_2: If Israel and its supporters have crossed all boundaries of injustice, then the law of nature is that Moses will emerge from their own ranks. American and Israeli measures are acting like fertilizer for creating suicide bombers amongst the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_3: If Israel and its allies are at the height of their pharaoh like vanity, a Moses too will be born in their home shortly because such is the law of nature. The steps taken by America and Israel are working as a catalyst for producing suicide bombers in the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_4: If Israel and its supports have reached the height of pharohism, then a Moses will emerge in their homes soon, as this is the rule of nature. American and Israeli actions are nurturing suicide bombers among Muslims.

Urdu: جو طاقت کے نشے ميں بدمست ہاتھيوں کو سمجھ نہيں آ رہا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Which these elephants, intoxicated with power, cannot understand.
Turk_Translation_2: Due to a false confidence in power, they are unable to understand this reality.
Turk_Translation_3: And these elephants who are intoxicated by power are unable to understand it.
Turk_Translation_4: This is a fact that people obsessed with power cannot understand.

Urdu: ابو عبداللہ پاکستان
Turk_Translation_1: Abu Abdullah Pakistan
Turk_Translation_2: Abu Abdullah, Pakistan
Turk_Translation_3: Abu Abdullah Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Abu Abdullah, Pakistan

Urdu: اب حماس اور اسرائيل کو صلح کر لينی چاہيے تاکہ خون و خرابہ بند ہو۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now Hamas and Israel should make peace so that this bloodshed comes to an end.
Turk_Translation_2: Hamas and Israel should now reconcile so that bloodshed is stopped.
Turk_Translation_3: Hamas and Israel should strike peace now so that the bloodshed may stop.
Turk_Translation_4: Hamas and Israel should now enter into reconciliation in order to end the cycle of bloodshed.

Urdu: محمد سرفراز، پيرس، فرانس
Turk_Translation_1: Muhammad Sarfaraz, Paris, France.
Turk_Translation_2: Mohammad Sarfraz, Paris, France
Turk_Translation_3: Muhammad Sarfraz, Paris, France.
Turk_Translation_4: Mohammad Sarfraz, Paris, France.

Urdu: بالکل بجا فرمايا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Absolutely correct.
Turk_Translation_2: Correctly said.
Turk_Translation_3: absolutely correct.
Turk_Translation_4: Rightly said.

Urdu: فرض کر ليتے ہيں کہ حماس واقعتاً ہي سو فيصدی حق سچ پر ہے اور ’ظُلم‘ کے خلاف ’جہاد‘ کر کے بارگاہ الہي ميں ’سرخرو‘ ہونا چاہتی ہے تو پھر بھی کم ازکم اسے اتنا تو ضرور معلوم ہونا چاھيے کہ نيکی سے اگر بسے بسائے گھر اجڑنے لگيں تو پھر نيکی نيکی نہيں رہ جاتي۔
Turk_Translation_1: Let us suppose that Hamas is 100 percent right, and that by conducting Jihad against oppression, it wants to obtain high esteem in the presence of God. Even so, it should at least realize that if good deeds cause the destruction of flourishing communities, then they do not remain a good deeds.
Turk_Translation_2: Let us suppose that Hamas' point of view is based on 100% truth, and by doing jihad against aggression, they wish to come up with flying colors before Allah, then at least they must know that if as a result of this good action well-settled houses are deserted, then this will no longer remain a good deed.
Turk_Translation_3: Lets us suppose that Hamas is hundred percent right in its cause - and wants to win Divine 'approval' by launching 'jihad' against the 'barbarity', even then it must know that if such virtuous acts start destroying happily living families, it no longer remains a virtue.
Turk_Translation_4: Let us suppose that Hamas is one hundred percent correct, and seeks to earn God's favor by fighting a holy war against injustice. Nevertheless, they must know, at the very least, that if their holy acts contribute to making many families homeless, then what is the use of such holy acts?

Urdu: جو لوگ خدا سے محبت، اس کے رسول سے محبت، اور اپنے دين سے محبت کا دعویٰ کرتے ہيں، انسان سے محبت کرنا انکا جزو ايمان ہوتا ہے!
Turk_Translation_1: For those who claim to love God, his Prophet, and their religion, the love of humanity is an essential part of their beliefs.
Turk_Translation_2: Those who love God and His Prophet and claim to have love for their faith then love for human beings must also be a part and parcel of their faith!
Turk_Translation_3: The love of humanity is a part of their faith for those who claim to love God, His Prophet, and their religion!
Turk_Translation_4: Loving human beings is part of the belief of those who claim they love God, His prophet and their religion.

Urdu: گويا مسلمانوں کے بعد جتنےبھي 'اہل کتاب' دنيا ميں بستے ہيں،ان کو صفحہ ہستی سے مٹا دينا اللہ کا حکم ہے
Turk_Translation_1: As if subsequent to the coming of Muslims, Allah has ordered all those who follow the Judeo-Christian scriptures to be wiped off the face of the earth.
Turk_Translation_2: As if leaving the Muslims alone, all 'those believing in Allah's book' and living on this earth should be exterminated is the command of God
Turk_Translation_3: So, it is God's commandment to wipe out all those on whom 'divine books' were revealed from the face of the earth except Muslims.
Turk_Translation_4: It's as if Allah has ordered the cleansing of all Ahle-Kitab (believers in divine books) other than Muslims from the face of the earth.

Urdu: نجيب الرحمان سائکو، *لاہور* [P@KI$T@N]
Turk_Translation_1: *Najeeb-ur-Rehman Saiko*, Lahore [P@KI$T@N]
Turk_Translation_2: *Najeeb-ur-Rehman Sieko, *Lahore [P@KI$T@N]
Turk_Translation_3: Najeeb-ur-Rehman Psycho, *Lahore [P@KI$T@N]*
Turk_Translation_4: Najeebur Rahman Saeko, Lahore, Pakitan.

Urdu: جی نہيں مٹادينے کا حکم نہيں ہے بلکہ انہيں اسلام کی دعوت دينے کا حکم ہے
Turk_Translation_1: No, the order is not for them to be wiped off; rather they should be invited into Islam.
Turk_Translation_2: No, the command is not to exterminate them but to invite them to accept Islam
Turk_Translation_3: No, the commandment is not to wipe them off but to preach Islam to them.
Turk_Translation_4: No, it has not been ordered to cleanse them, but rather to invite them (to Islam).

Urdu: مگر جولوگ مزہب کے خلاف سازشيں کريں ان کے خلاف جہاد کا حکم ہے
Turk_Translation_1: But Jihad has been ordered against those who scheme against the religion.
Turk_Translation_2: but for those people who conspire against religion, it has been commanded to do jihad against them
Turk_Translation_3: But jihad is ordered against those who hatch plots against the religion.
Turk_Translation_4: However, it has been ordered to wage Jihad against those who hatch conspiracies against the religion.

Urdu: ان لوگوں سے اسوقت تک لڑا جاۓ جب تک وہ سازشيں ختم نہ کرديں - ليکن اس کا يہ مطلب ہر گز نہيں ہے کہ جيکٹ پہن کر مجمعے ميں پھٹ جائيں-
Turk_Translation_1: These people should be fought until they give up scheming. But this does not at all mean that one should wear a jacket and blow oneself up in a crowd.
Turk_Translation_2: fighting against those should be continued till they stop conspiring. But that in no way means to wear a jacket and explode in a gathering.
Turk_Translation_3: They should be fought against until they stop hatching the plots. But it does not mean that one should wear a jacket and detonate it in a crowd.
Turk_Translation_4: Such people should be fought until they stop hatching conspiracies, though in a manner that is never careless.

Urdu: بھائیو، مصموم بچوں کے قاتل کا انجام ہی تباہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Brothers, the end of the murder of innocent children is destruction.
Turk_Translation_2: Brothers, the murderer of innocent children will eventually face destruction.
Turk_Translation_3: My brothers, the ultimate end of the murderer of the innocent children is destruction.
Turk_Translation_4: Brothers, the fate of the killers of innocent children is destruction.

Urdu: مگر ميرے دوستوں سے گزارش ہے کہ کل اسرائيلیوں کو سر چھپانے کی جگہ نہیں تھی، آج وہ اتنے مضبوط ہوگئے کہ دنيا ميں کسی کی نہیں مانتے کيونکہ يہودی سب ايک ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: However, I want to suggest to my friends that the same Israelis who yesterday could find no refuge, today have become so strong that they listen to no one because they are united.
Turk_Translation_2: But I want to tell my friends that Israelis who were without a shelter yesterday have become so strong today that they do not care for anybody, because the Jews are all united.
Turk_Translation_3: But I beg to say to my friends that these Jews who did not have a shelter in the near past have become so strong that they do not listen to anyone in the world now because they are united.
Turk_Translation_4: However, I would like to point out that the Israelis had no place to live in the past. Today, there are so powerful that they don't listen to anyone in the world. The reason is that they are united and one.

Urdu: نہ ان ميں شعيہ، نہ سنی، بس سب يہودی ہيں اور انہوں نے ہر ميدان ميں ترقی کی ہر چيز بنائی۔
Turk_Translation_1: They have no such differences as Shia, and Sunnis; they are all just Jews, and they have progressed and have been creative in every field.
Turk_Translation_2: There are no Shias or Sunnis in their ranks. They are all Jews and have progressed in all fields.
Turk_Translation_3: They are neither Shia nor Sunni. All are Jews. And they have taken every step to progress in all walks of life.
Turk_Translation_4: They have no sects, like Shia or Sunni. They are all Jews. They have made all means of development and progress in all fields.

Urdu: اس کے برعکس 55 اسلامی ملکوں کا کيا حال ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: In contrast, what is the condition of the 55 Islamic countries?
Turk_Translation_2: Contrary to this what is the condition of the 55 Muslim countries?
Turk_Translation_3: On the contrary, look at the conditions of the 55 Islamic states?
Turk_Translation_4: In contrast, what is the condition of the 55 Islamic countries?

Urdu: ہر ميدان ميں پیچھے اور اب يہ عالم ہے کہ اتنے بےبس ہوگئے ہیں کہ دشمن ان کو مار رہے ہيں اور وہ موت کا انتظار کر رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Lagging behind in every field, and now the situation is that they have become so helpless that the enemy is relentlessly beating them, and they await death.
Turk_Translation_2: They are lagging behind in all fields and they have become so helpless at this stage that enemies are beating them and they are waiting for death.
Turk_Translation_3: They are lacking in every field. And now the situation is that they have become so helpless that the enemies are killing them and they are waiting for death.
Turk_Translation_4: They are backward in all spheres. Now, they are so helpless that enemies are killing them and they are waiting for their death.

Urdu: ضرورت اس امر کی ہے کہ تمام مسلم ممالک یکجا ہو جائیں اور مل کر اسرائیل کے خلاف لاحۂ عمل تیار کریں۔
Turk_Translation_1: There is a need for all Muslim countries to unite and together prepare a strategy against Israel.
Turk_Translation_2: The need of the hour is that all Muslim countries should get together and formulate a strategy against Israel.
Turk_Translation_3: It is needed that all the Muslim countries unite and prepare a strategy against Israel.

And as long as Yassin and Arafat were not removed from the way, it was impossible.
