Turk_Translation_3: Our Pakistani electronic and print media, in particular some Urdu newspapers and columnists are second to none in exaggerating due to 'Muawiya like spite' while covering or writing about the increasing extremism and terrorism over here.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistani electronic and print media -- and particularly a few Urdu newspapers and columnists -- have now mastered this art. They are obsessed with the coverage of extremism and terrorism.

Urdu: کہا ہے اقوام متحدہ جو بظاہر تو انسانی حقوق اور امن کی باتيں کرتا ہے ليکن مسلمانوں پہ ظلم اور جبر کی انتہا ہوتی ہے اور ان کی منہ سے يہی الفاظ سننے کو ملتے ہیں کہ حماس حملے بند کرے کب تک يہ دوغلی پاليسی چلے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: Where is the United Nations, which on the face of it speaks of human rights and peace, but when intense force and injustice is inflicted on Muslims, it just repeats the same thing, that Hamas should stop its attacks? Till when will this inconsistent policy continue?
Turk_Translation_2: =Where is the United Nations, who apparently talks about human rights and peace, but brutality and aggression against the Muslims reaches at its peak, and we hear these very words from them asking Hamas to end fighting for how long will this dual policy continue to operate.
Turk_Translation_3: =Where is the United Nations that apparently talks of human rights and peace but when Muslims are subjected to the intense cruelty and suppression, the only words that we hear from their mouths relate to their demand to Hamas to stop the attacks. For how long, will this dual policy go?
Turk_Translation_4: Where is the United Nations, which talks about peace and human rights? Muslims are subjugated to the worst form of injustice. It only urges Hamas to stop attacks. For how long will this policy of double standards be pursued?

Urdu: مسلمان پہ اتنا ظلم کيوں ہو رہا ہے اگر امريکہ جيسے لوگ ان يہوديوں کی پشت پناہی چھوڑ دے تو اللہ تعالی نے صاف فرمايا ہے کہ يہ قوم ذليل ترين قوم کی زندگی گزارے گا اور يہ قوم کبھی ٹھيک زندگی نہيں گزار سکتے تو اگر ہمت ہے امريکہ والو تو ان کی پشت پناہی چھوڑدو اور ديکھنا پھر کہ ان کی نصيب کي زندگي-
Turk_Translation_1: Why such oppression of Muslims? If people like America stop backing the Jews, Allah has clearly said that this nation would spend the life of a disgraced nation, and this nation can never live normally. So, Americans, if you have the guts, stop supporting them and then see their fate.
Turk_Translation_2: Why is so much brutality being committed against the Muslims if people like America cease to back the Jews then Allah has clearly said that they will live the life of a humiliated nation, and this nation can never live a right life then Americans! If you have courage, then quit backing them and then see the life of their fortune.
Turk_Translation_3: Why are the Muslims being subjected to so much cruelty? If countries like America stop backing these Jews, God has plainly told that this nation will live the meanest form of life and this nation can never live normally. So, O People of America, stop backing them and then you will see what fate holds for them.
Turk_Translation_4: Why are injustices against Muslims perpetrated? If the US stops backing the Jews, then they will live in humiliation, as Allah has said. They can never lead a life of respect and dignity. Americans, stop backing them, and you will see what kind of life they live.

Urdu: دنيا کے نام نہاد منصفوں اور امن کے نام پر قتل وغارت گری کرنے والوں کو يہ بات اچھی طرح سمجھ لينی چاھيے کہ دنيا ميں امن صرف اور صرف انصاف دينے سے ھي قائم ھوسکتا ھے ناکہ نا انصافی اور نسل کشی سے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The so-called arbiters of the world, and those who kill and destroy others in the name of peace, should clearly understand that peace can only be established in the world by being just, and not by being unfair and through genocide.
Turk_Translation_2: The so-called judges of the world and those who justify killings in the name of peace must clearly understand that peace in the world can only be established by dispensing justice and not through injustice and ethnic cleansing.
Turk_Translation_3: The so-called arbitrators of justice and those who murder and plunder in the name of peace should mind this fact that the peace in this world can be established only through justice, and not through injustice and genocide.
Turk_Translation_4: The so-called advocates of justice and those committing the acts of murder and destruction in the name of peace should understand well that peace can only be established by delivering justice in the world, not by perpetrating injustice and killing human beings.

Urdu: اگر نسل کشی سے ھی کسی قوم کو ختم کيا جا سکتا اوراپنی مرضی کے نتائج حاصل کيے جا سکتے تو ھٹلر کے اقدامات کے بعد يہوديوں کا نہ صرف وجود برقرار ھونا بلکہ ايک طرح کا عروج آج ناممکن ھوتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: If genocide was a sure way to eliminate a whole race and have one's way, not only would the Jews have not existed after the steps that Hitler took, but their rise today would have been impossible.
Turk_Translation_2: If the acquisition of the intended result would have been possible through the elimination of a particular human race by mass genocide, then there would have been no Jews left alive after the measures that Hitler took and their rise today would have been impossible.
Turk_Translation_3: If a nation could be wiped out by genocide only and the desired results could be achieved, the very existence and glory of the Jews today would not have been possible after Hitler's actions.
Turk_Translation_4: If killing was the only way to cleanse a particular community and to achieve the desired goals, then after Hitler's holocaust, it would have been impossible for the Jews to remain in existence and to achieve the progress they have actually made.

Urdu: بقول شاعر
Turk_Translation_1: As a poet says,
Turk_Translation_2: In the words of a poet
Turk_Translation_3: As a poet has said
Turk_Translation_4: According to the poet,

Turk_Translation_1:

Turk_Translation_2: Blood is an ink which when drops becomes everlasting
Turk_Translation_3: And blood congeals when it trickles down
Turk_Translation_4: Blood is blood after all; when it runs on the ground, it becomes hard.

Urdu: اب کون کِسے بتائےگا کہ دہشت گردی کيا ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Now who will explain to whom the meaning of terrorism?
Turk_Translation_2: Now who will tell who what is terrorism?
Turk_Translation_3: Who would tell now what is terrorism?
Turk_Translation_4: Who can say what terrorism is? And how it will be told?

Urdu: کيا يہ سب دہشت گردی کے زُمرے ميں نہيں آتا کيُوں صِرف اپنا ہی درد سب کو اپنا لگتا ہے
Turk_Translation_1: Does everyone not come under the category of terrorism? Why does everyone only feel their own pain?
Turk_Translation_2: Does this all not come under the definition of terrorism; why everyone feels only his own pain
Turk_Translation_3: Does all this not fall under the category of terrorism? Why does everyone feels only one's own pain?
Turk_Translation_4: Doesn't all of this fall under the category of terrorism? Why does everyone only feel his own pain?

Urdu: دُوسرے لوگ کيا اِنسان نہيں ہوتے يا پھر مُسلمانوں کا خُون ہی اِتنا ارزاں ہو گيا ہے اِتنے معصُوموں کا خُون کيا سُرخ رنگ کا نہيں تھا
Turk_Translation_1: Are other people not human? Or is it that the blood of Muslims has now become so cheap? Wasn't the blood of so many innocents red?
Turk_Translation_2: are other people not human beings or the blood of the Muslims have become so cheap; was the blood color of so many innocents not red.
Turk_Translation_3: Are the others not human beings or the blood of the Muslims is worth so little? Was the blood of all the innocents not red?
Turk_Translation_4: Are others not human beings, or has the blood of Muslims alone become so cheap? Was the blood of so many innocent people not red?

Urdu: اور اب کہيں سے بھی کوئی تعزيتی پيغام کيُوں نہيں آرہا؟
Turk_Translation_1: And now why doesn't a condolence message come from anywhere anymore?
Turk_Translation_2: and why aren't any messages of condolence coming from anywhere now?
Turk_Translation_3: Why is no one sending messages of condolence now?
Turk_Translation_4: Why do no messages of condolence come from any corner?

Urdu: ممبئی حملوں کی کارروائی ميں نے ايسے ديکھی تھی جيسے ميرے اپنے گھر ميں يہ آگ لگی ہو کہ اِنسانوں کا دُکھ ديکھا نہيں جاتا اور کيا يہ دُکھ کِسی کو نظر نہيں آتا کاش مُسلمان ايک ہو کر سوچيں کُچھ
Turk_Translation_1: I watched the Mumbai attack operations as if my own house was on fire. It is not easy to watch human suffering and this suffering is not visible to anyone? I wish Muslims could unite, and then think.
Turk_Translation_2: I saw the happenings of the Mumbai attacks just as if my own home had caught fire, that the pains of human beings cannot be seen and does nobody not see this pain; May it so happen that the Muslims start thinking 'unitedly!'
Turk_Translation_3: I watched the Mumbai attacks as if my own house was on fire because I can't see the grief of human beings. - And who cannot see this grief? Would that the Muslims could - think about that on the same lines.
Turk_Translation_4: I watched the operations after the Mumbai attacks as if my own house was engulfed with fire, because the pain of human beings can't be ignored. Does no one feel this pain? All Muslims should be united and speak in one voice.

Urdu: سڑک پر پڑی لاشيں، بے يارومددگار زخمی اور خون ميں ڈوبے معصوم چہرے مذمت کس طرح کريں کہ الفاظ نہيں مل رہے-
Turk_Translation_1: How to protest the corpses lying on the road, unattended injured, and innocent faces soaked in blood; cannot find words.
Turk_Translation_2: Dead bodies lying on the road, helpless injured and innocent faces dipped in a bloodbath, how to condemn, as we don't have words for this.
Turk_Translation_3: Dead bodies lying on the road, the helpless injured and blood-stained innocent faces, how do we condemn when we are lost for words.
Turk_Translation_4: I can't find the words to express my condemnation of this scene of dead bodies, helpless injured people and killed innocents, all lying in the street.

Urdu: مسلمانوں کی بے بسی پر رونا آرہا ہے کہ ايک طرف بھارت ميں لوگ مارے جاتے ہيں تو ساری دنيا پاکستان پر بنا ثبوت کے چڑھ دوڑتي ہے کہ کارروائی کرو ورنہ ہم کريں گے
Turk_Translation_1: Feel like crying over the helplessness of Muslims. On the one hand, whenever people are killed in India, the whole world starts blaming Pakistan without any proof, asking it to take action, otherwise they will take the initiative.
Turk_Translation_2: We feel like weeping on the helpless state of the Muslims, as on one hand, when people are killed in India, the whole world rushes towards Pakistan without proof, urging to take action, or otherwise they will take action themselves
Turk_Translation_3: I am brought to tears by the helplessness of the Muslims because when on the one hand, the people get killed in India, the whole world pushes Pakistan without any proof to take action or they shall take action themselves
Turk_Translation_4: You can't keep from shedding tears after seeing the helplessness of Muslims. On the one hand, when people are killed in India, the whole world condemns Pakistan and pushes it to carry out operations, or to be ready for operations against it.

Urdu: اور دوسری طرف اسرائيل سرعام مسلمانوں کی نسل کشی کررہا ہے اور دنيا خاموش يہ ناقابل برداشت ہے
Turk_Translation_1: On the other, Israel is openly conducting genocide of the Muslims, and the world is silent. This is unbearable.
Turk_Translation_2: on the other hand, Israel is openly eliminating the Muslims and the world is silent; this is unbearable.
Turk_Translation_3: and on the other hand, Israel is conducting blatant genocide of the Muslims and the world is silent; this is unbearable
Turk_Translation_4: But on the other, Israel is openly cleansing itself of Muslims and the whole world is keeping silent. It can't be tolerated.

Urdu: -خدا کے پاس دير ہے اندھير نہيں اور جب يہ اندھير نگری ختم ہوگی تو۔
Turk_Translation_1: God acts on his own timetable, and when he does, to end this lawlessness-
Turk_Translation_2: With Allah, there is a delay but no injustice, and when this brutality will end, then--
Turk_Translation_3: God's Mill grinds slow but sure -, and when this darkness of disappointment will end then..
Turk_Translation_4: God's response may come late, but He is not in the dark.

Urdu: امريکہ کے ہوتے ہوئے اسرائيل کی سالميت کوخطرہ ايک مذاق ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: While America exists, a threat to Israel's existence should be considered a joke.
Turk_Translation_2: In the presence of America, danger to Israel's stability is a joke.
Turk_Translation_3: Any threat to Israel's existence in the presence of America is a joke.
Turk_Translation_4: As long as America is there, it is a joke to say that Israel's security is in danger.

Urdu: رہی بات انتخابات کی تو بر سر اقتدار عوامی پذيرائی کے لیے اس طرح کی کارروائياں کريں اس ميں کوئی شک نہں خاص کر اسرائيل جيسی رياست باقی بارک اوبامہ کی بات تو تاريخ گواہ ہے آج تک کوئی امريکی حکمران پاليسی کے خلاف نہيں گيا اور نہ جائےگا سامراج گورا ہو يا کالا ہے وہ سامراج ہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: As far as the elections are concerned, those in power will take such measures as to please the people, and without a doubt especially a state like Israel. As far as Barack Obama is concerned, history is a witness that no American president to date has gone against the ruling policy, and this will not even happen. An imperialist, whether black or white, is an imperialist.
Turk_Translation_2: As far as election is concerned for earning public popularity, the people in power may carry on with this type of activity, no doubt in that, particularly the state of Israel; and as far as Barack Obama is concerned, history stands witness to the fact that until today, no American leader went against the policy and will not do so in the future; imperialism being black or white makes no difference at all.
Turk_Translation_3: As far as the elections are concerned, the rulers may undoubtedly engage in this kind of activities to win public support, particularly in case of a state like Israel. And as far as Barack Obama's factor is concerned, history stands testimonial to the fact that neither any American ruler has ever gone against the policy nor he will. Imperialism, whether black or white, is after all imperialism.
Turk_Translation_4: As far as the elections are concerned, there is no doubt that the ruling class, particularly in Israel, carries out such operations in order to win people's support. Regarding Barak Obama, history is witness to the fact that no American ruler has ever gone -- nor will one ever go -- against the established policy, regardless of whether the ruler is black or white.

Urdu: فورم ميں جاری بحث سے يہ واضح ہوتا ہے کہ بےنظير کی وفات کا دکھ ہر کسی کو ہے مگر بحیثيت سياستدان ان کی کوتاہيوں کو نظر انداز نہيں کيا گيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: The ongoing debate in the forum shows that everyone is sad about Benazir's demise. However, considering her as a politician, her failings have not been ignored.
Turk_Translation_2: The current discussion in the forum indicates that everyone feels pain for the death of Benazir, but as a politician, her mistakes have not been overlooked.
Turk_Translation_3: It is clear from the ongoing discussion on the forum that everyone is sad over the death of Benazir but her shortcomings as a politician have not been overlooked.
Turk_Translation_4: The ongoing discussions on the forum reflect the fact that everyone is feeling the pain of Benazir's death. However, her faults as a politician cannot be overlooked.

Urdu: يہ بات بحث طلب ہے کہ بےنظير نے جمہوريت کی خاطر جان دی يا اقتدار کی خاطر۔
Turk_Translation_1: It is being debated whether Benazir gave away her life for democracy or to gain power.
Turk_Translation_2: Whether Benazir give her life for democracy or for the government is still a debatable question.
Turk_Translation_3: It is debatable if Benazir sacrificed her life for democracy or for government.
Turk_Translation_4: It should be discussed whether or not Benazir sacrificed her life for the sake of democracy or in pursuit of power.

Urdu: اگر جمہوريت عزيز تھی تو امريکی کليئرنس اور ڈيل ہونے تک کہ دس سال جمہور کو مشرف کی آمريت ميں کيوں چھوڑے رکھا؟
Turk_Translation_1: If democracy was dear to her, then why was she free for ten years until a deal was made to obtain American clearance under Musharraf's authoritarian rule?
Turk_Translation_2: If she had a love for democracy, then why did she wait for ten years until American clearance and finalization of a deal while leaving democratic institutions to be looked after by Musharraf's dictatorship?
Turk_Translation_3: If democracy was dear to her, why did she leave the public at the mercy of Musharaf's dictatorship for ten years till she got American clearance and struck the deal?
Turk_Translation_4: If democracy was so dear to her, then why did she leave the people under Musharraf's dictatorship for 10 years until the American clearance and deal happened?

Urdu: بے نظير تب پاکستان نہيں آئيں جب آمريت زدہ عوآم کو ضرورت تھي بدقسمتی سے وہ تب پاکستان آئيں جب انھيں مقدمات سے بریت اور اقتدار کی يقين دہانياں کروائی گئيں
Turk_Translation_1: Benazir did not come to Pakistan when the people subject to authoritarianism needed her. Unfortunately, she came to Pakistan after being acquitted in law suits and when she was assured of her power.
Turk_Translation_2: Benazir did not come to Pakistan at a time when people affected with dictatorship needed her, but unfortunately she came only when sureties of clearance from court cases and power were given.
Turk_Translation_3: Benazir did not come to Pakistan when people under the dictatorship needed her. Unfortunately she came to Pakistan when she had been promised acquittal from all cases and access to power.
Turk_Translation_4: Benazir did not return to Pakistan at the time when the people who were reeling under the dictatorship needed her most. Unfortunately, she returned to Pakistan only when the cases against her were cleared and she was assured of power.

Urdu: تاريخی بندے کو اٹھا اٹھا کر جو الزام تراشی وتنقيد کی جا رہی ہے اس پر تو کوئی کچھ کہنے والا ہی نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: There is no one to respond to the blame and criticism constantly being leveled at a historical figure.
Turk_Translation_2: There is no one to raise any voice against the criticism and allegations being leveled upon an historic person.
Turk_Translation_3: There is no one to defend the historical figure who is being criticized unnecessarily.
Turk_Translation_4: Nobody says anything about the allegations and criticisms that are made about the historical person.

Urdu: ثناء خان
Turk_Translation_1: Sana Khan.
Turk_Translation_2: Sana Khan
Turk_Translation_3: Sana Khan
Turk_Translation_4: Sana Khan

Urdu: کچھ چيزيں نظرانداز کي جاتي ہيں يہ سوچ کر کہ ان کا کچھ نہيں ہو سکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Some things are just ignored because one feels that nothing can be done about them.
Turk_Translation_2: Certain things are ignored on the grounds that nothing can be done about them.
Turk_Translation_3: Some things are overlooked because nothing can be done about them.
Turk_Translation_4: Some things are overlooked because nothing can be done about them.

Urdu: ايک اور قاری
Turk_Translation_1: Another reciter.
Turk_Translation_2: another reader
Turk_Translation_3: Another reader
Turk_Translation_4: Another reader

Urdu: محترم/ محترمہ شايد آپ نے تاريخ صرف پاکستان ميں نہيں بلکہ (سر) کے بارے ميں اپنے چار دوست ممالک اور سات دوسرے ممالک ميں بھی پڑھ ليں شايد سائيکو صاحب کی بات آپ کو ٹھيک لگے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Dear Sir/Madam, Perhaps you did not just read the history of (Sir) in Pakistan, but also in four friendly countries and seven other countries. Perhaps you agree with Mr. Saiko.
Turk_Translation_2: Respectable Mr./Ms. perhaps you read the history about (Sir) not only in Pakistan but also in four friendly countries and seven other countries perhaps you may agree with Sieko Sahib.
Turk_Translation_3: Mr/Madam, perhaps you had better study history written in four friendly countries and seven other countries and not merely rely on history in Pakistan then you will probably agree with Mr. Psycho.
Turk_Translation_4: Sir/ma'am, perhaps you have studied the history, not only in Pakistan, but in four friendly countries and seven other countries. Perhaps you will agree with Mr. Saiko's opinion.

Urdu: طارق اياز
Turk_Translation_1: Tariq Ayaz.
Turk_Translation_2: Tariq Ayaz
Turk_Translation_3: Tariq Ayaz
Turk_Translation_4: Tariq Ayaz

Urdu: 'نہ ہو طبيعت ہي جن کي قابل وہ تربيت سے نہيں سنورتے
Turk_Translation_1: Those who are not talented will not benefit from training.
Turk_Translation_2: 'Those who are unfit in training cannot make them skillful
Turk_Translation_3: 'Those who don't have innate disposition, don't learn from training
Turk_Translation_4: Those whose nature is not straight can't be groomed.

Urdu: ہوا نہ سرسبز رہ کے پاني ميں عکس سروِ کنار جو کا '
Turk_Translation_1: The image of cypress trees did not appear green in the water.
Turk_Translation_2: despite in water, barely a bud didn't turn green'
Turk_Translation_3: The reflection of the tree won't become green no matter how long the tree stands at the edge of the stream'
Turk_Translation_4: Though the wheat plant stands in water, its shadow can't be green.

Urdu: برطانيہ نے ان کو کبھي بھي ايک نہيں ہونے ديا اور ہندو مسلم تنازع ايجاد کيا جس کی نشوونما سرسيد نے کي۔
Turk_Translation_1: Britain never allowed them to unite and concocted a Hindu-Muslim feud, which was nurtured by Sir Syed.
Turk_Translation_2: The United Kingdom did not allow them to become united and invented the Hindu Muslim conflict, which was groomed by Sir Syed.
Turk_Translation_3: Britain never allowed them to be one and invented Hindu-Muslim dispute which was nurtured by Sir Syed.
Turk_Translation_4: Britain never let them unite. It created a Hindu-Muslim dispute, which was promoted by Sir Sayyad.

Urdu: سائکو
Turk_Translation_1: Saiko.
Turk_Translation_2: Sieko
Turk_Translation_3: Psycho
Turk_Translation_4: Saiko

Urdu: کتنی بے رحم ہے ہماری قوم اپنے اور اپنی پارٹی کی شان ميں قصيدے لکھتے وقت تو اندھے ہوتے ہی ہيں ليکن اب تو ہر تاريخی بندے دانشور کو اٹھا اٹھا کر جو الزام تراشی اور تنقيد کی جا رہی ہے اس پر تو کوئی کچھ کہنے والا ہی نہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: How cruel are our people; blindly writing odes to celebrate themselves and their party, and no one to defend the historical figures and intellectuals who are being accused and criticized willy-nilly.
Turk_Translation_2: Our nation is so unkind that they become blind while writing praises about themselves and in the honor of their parties, but now every historical person is being subjected to so much allegations and criticism, and no one is raising their voices against this.
Turk_Translation_3: How merciless is our nation. They write panegyrics for themselves and also for the glory of their party blindly. But now every historical figure and intellectual is being blamed and criticized and there in no one to raise voice against it.
Turk_Translation_4: How cruel our people are! They blindly praise themselves and their party. However, nobody comes forward to reply to the criticisms and allegations made against every intellectual history has ever known.

Urdu: بہت کرلی ترقی ہم لوگوں نے۔
Turk_Translation_1: We have made entirely too much progress.
Turk_Translation_2: we have made enough progress.
Turk_Translation_3: we have made enough progress.
Turk_Translation_4: We have achieved much progress.

Urdu: ثناء خان
Turk_Translation_1: Sana Khan.
Turk_Translation_2: Sana Khan
Turk_Translation_3: Sana Khan
Turk_Translation_4: Sana Khan

Urdu: کچھ چيزيں نظرانداز کي جاتي ہيں يہ سوچ کر کہ ان کا کچھ نہيں ہو سکتا - جس طرح کتابيں لاد دينے سے گدھا عالم نہيں ہو جاتا -
Turk_Translation_1: Some things are just ignored, thinking that nothing can be done about them, like loading books on a donkey does not turn it into a scholar.
Turk_Translation_2: Certain things are ignored, considering that nothing can be done about them. In a similar way, loading books on the back of a donkey cannot make it learned.
Turk_Translation_3: Some things are overlooked because they cannot be helped. Like, an ass won't become a scholar simply by carrying a book load.
Turk_Translation_4: Some things are overlooked because nothing can be done about them, the same as an ass can't be counted among literates merely because books are loaded over it.

Urdu: اگرچہ ممبئی حملے کے بعد پاکستان اور بھارت کے درمیان جاری مذاکراتی عمل میں خلل پیدا ہوا ہے تا ہم پاک بھارت کو یہ مذاکرات جاری رکھنا چاہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Even if the ongoing dialogue between Pakistan and India has been disturbed after the Mumbai attacks, both countries should continue the dialogue.
Turk_Translation_2: Although in the wake of Mumbai attacks a deadlock has occurred in the continuing consultations processes but Pak-India should keep these consultations ongoing.
Turk_Translation_3: Although there has been a break in the ongoing dialogue process between Pakistan and India in the wake of the Mumbai attack, Pak-India should nevertheless continue this dialogue.
Turk_Translation_4: In the aftermath of the Mumbai attacks, the Pakistani-Indian dialogue has come to a standstill. However, Pakistan and India should continue these talks.

Urdu: اگر جنگ کی بات کریں گے تو دونوں طرف سے انسانی جانوں کا نقصان ہو گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: If they think of going to war, then both sides will lose human lives.
Turk_Translation_2: If they will talk about war, then there will be loss of human lives on both sides.
Turk_Translation_3: If we talk of war, there will be loss of human lives on both sides.
Turk_Translation_4: If they talk about war, it will cost human lives on both sides.

Urdu: بھارت کا کہنا ہے کہ ممبئی حملے میں پکڑا گیا پاکستان شہری ہے اور اس نے اردو میں ایک خط بھی پاکستان کو لکھ کر بھیجا ہے لیکن دوسری طرف بھارت نے پہلے جب اس شدت پسند کو پکڑا تو کہا کہ یہ کوئی بہت بڑا انجینئر ہے لیکن اس کے بعد انہوں نے اسے صرف چار جماعت پاس قرار دیا دیکھنے کی بات یہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: India says that the person they arrested for the Mumbai attacks is a Pakistani national and he had also sent a letter in Urdu to Pakistan. However, it is significant to note that initially, when Indian authorities arrested this extremist, they claimed that he was an accomplished engineer, but later they said that his education was only at the fourth grade level, something to be determined.
Turk_Translation_2: India says that the person caught in the Mumbai attacks is from Pakistan, and he has also written and sent a letter to Pakistan in Urdu, but on the other hand, when India got hold of this extremist, they said that he is a highly-qualified engineer, but later on, they said that he is educated only up to four class. This is strange.
Turk_Translation_3: India has said that the man captured in the Mumbai attack is a Pakistani citizen who has sent a letter to Pakistan in Urdu, but on the other hand, when India arrested this extremist, they said that he was some senior engineer but now they say that he is educated only up to level 4. This is noticeable.
Turk_Translation_4: India says the person who was caught during the Mumbai attacks is a Pakistani citizen, and that he wrote a letter in Urdu and sent it to Pakistan. However, when India had captured him, India had said he was a senior engineer. Later on, India said he had passed only fourth standard. These statements need to be scrutinized.

Urdu: سب سے پہلے تو بھانا صاحب اور فورم کےتمام مسيحی دوستوں کو کرسمس کی مبارک۔
Turk_Translation_1: First of all, Merry Christmas to Mr. Bahana and all the Christian friends of the forum.
Turk_Translation_2: First of all, Merry Christmas to Bhana Sahib and all Christian friends of this forum.
Turk_Translation_3: First of all, Christmas greetings to Mr. Bhana and all other Christian friends on the forum.
Turk_Translation_4: First of all, Merry Christmas to Mr. Bhana and all of our Christian friends on the forum!

Urdu: فورم کےساتھيوں: سائيکو صاحب، اے رضا، بہن ثنا، بہن شاہدہ اکرم اور سب کو آداب۔
Turk_Translation_1: Forum friends: Mr. Saiko, A. Raza, Sister Sana, Sister Shaihda Akram and everyone, greetings.
Turk_Translation_2: Greetings to forum friends, Sieko Sahib, A Raza, sister Sana, sister Shahida Akram and all.
Turk_Translation_3: The mates on forum: my regards to Mr. Psycho, A. Raza, sister Sana, sister Shahida Akram and the rest.
Turk_Translation_4: Forum friends: Greetings to Mr. Saiko, Mr. A Raza, Sister Sana, Sister Shahida Akram and everybody!

Urdu: ہم سب جنگ کے شعلے نہيں بلکہ امن کے پھول چاہتے ہيں!
Turk_Translation_1: We do not want the flames of war, rather the flowers of peace.
Turk_Translation_2: All of us need flowers of peace and not flames of war!
Turk_Translation_3: We want the flowers of peace and not the flames of war!
Turk_Translation_4: We don't want the fires of war, but flowers of peace.

Urdu: جنگ تو خود ہی ايک مسئلہ ہے
Turk_Translation_1: War itself is a problem.
Turk_Translation_2: War is itself a problem
Turk_Translation_3: War is a problem in itself
Turk_Translation_4: War in itself is a problem.

Urdu: جنگ کيا مسئلوں کا حل دے گی
Turk_Translation_1: What problems will war solve?
Turk_Translation_2: War cannot give solution to problems
Turk_Translation_3: How can war provide solution to the problems
Turk_Translation_4: How can war solve problems?

Urdu: آگ اور خون آج بخشے گی
Turk_Translation_1: Today it will result in fire and blood.
Turk_Translation_2: Today it will generate blood and fire
Turk_Translation_3: It will bestow fire and blood today
Turk_Translation_4: Fire and blood will deliver today.

Urdu: بھوک اور احتياج کل دے گی
Turk_Translation_1: Tomorrow it will result in hunger and depravation.
Turk_Translation_2: Tomorrow it will give hunger and poverty
Turk_Translation_3: It will yield hunger and poverty tomorrow
Turk_Translation_4: Hunger and necessity will deliver tomorrow.

Urdu: اس ليے باشعور انسانوں
Turk_Translation_1: This is why, thoughtful people,
Turk_Translation_2: and, therefore wise people
Turk_Translation_3: Therefore, O conscious people
Turk_Translation_4: So, oh the wise men!

Urdu: جنگ ٹلتی رہے تو بہتر ہے
Turk_Translation_1: it is better if we keep war at bay,
Turk_Translation_2: it is better to postpone the war
Turk_Translation_3: As long as the war is avoided, it is good
Turk_Translation_4: It is better if war does not occur.

Urdu: آپ کے اور ہمارے آنگن ميں
Turk_Translation_1: in your yard and ours.
Turk_Translation_2: In yours and our courtyards
Turk_Translation_3: In your and our courtyard
Turk_Translation_4: It is better if the candle keeps

Urdu: شمع جلتی رہے تو بہتر ہے
Turk_Translation_1: It's better if we light a candle.
Turk_Translation_2: better light continue to stay
Turk_Translation_3: It would be better if the light of peace keeps on burning
Turk_Translation_4: giving light to your house and ours.

Urdu: بھارت امريکہ تعلقات اب کافی گہرے ہوچکے ہيں اور بھارت يقيناً جانتا ہے کہ وقت پڑنے پر امريکہ پاکستان کو کھلم کھلا دھوکہ ديگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: America's relations with India have become quite strong, and India surely knows that if the time comes, America will openly betray Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: India-America relations have become sufficiently deeper, and India certainly understands that in the hour of need, America will openly deceive Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: India-America relations have strengthened very deep now and India certainly knows that America will openly betray Pakistan in the hour of need.
Turk_Translation_4: Relations between India and the US have now become very deep. India knows for sure that the US will cheat Pakistan openly whenever it needs to do so.

Urdu: يہی امريکہ کی پرانی تاريح بھی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is also evident from American history.
Turk_Translation_2: This is the old history of America.
Turk_Translation_3: The old history of America also proves this.
Turk_Translation_4: This is the past history of the US.

Urdu: جب کہ بھارتی حملہ کی صورت ميں امريکہ کو اپنے مقاصد بھی حاصل ہونگے اور خرچ بھی بھارت کا ہوگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: And in the case of an Indian attack, America will achieve its goals while India will foot the bill.
Turk_Translation_2: Whereas in the case of the Indian attacks, America will achieve its objectives, and that, too, at the Indian cost.
Turk_Translation_3: Whereas in case of an Indian attack not only will the American interests be met but also India will bear all the expenses.
Turk_Translation_4: If India attacks, the US will achieve its goals, while India will bear the expenses.

Urdu: پاکستان کو چاہیے کہ واضح اعلان کرے کہ ہم پہل نہيں کريں گے مگر جارحيت کی گئی تو پھر صلح امن اور جنگ بندی کی بات اس وقت تک نہيں ہوگی جب تک بھارت کو مکمل تباہ يا اس پر قبضہ نہيں کر ليا جاتا چاہے اسکے لیے ہم خود کيوں نہ تباہ ہو جائيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan should make it clear that we would not initiate war, but if an invasion takes place, then discussion of treaty, peace, and ceasefire will not take place until India is completely destroyed or occupied, even if this means our own destruction.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan should clearly announce that we will not be the first to attack, but in case of aggression, the talks for peace, reconciliations and ceasefire will take place only when we have either completely destroyed India or have occupied it, no matter if we ourselves get completely destroyed.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan should make a clear announcement that it would not strike first but if any aggression is carried out, there will be no talk of reconciliation, peace and ceasefire until either India is completely destroyed or occupied, even if it may cause destruction to ourselves as well.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan should openly declare that we will not be the first to start war. However, in the case of aggression, we will not talk about peace and ending war until India is completely destroyed or occupied, even though we ourselves will be destroyed in the process.

Urdu: يہی اسلامی تاريخ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is Islamic history.
Turk_Translation_2: This is the Islamic history
Turk_Translation_3: This is the Islamic history.
Turk_Translation_4: This is the history of Islam.

Urdu: اس قرارداد سے پہلے ہی پاکستانی عوام اور فوج نے جو پيغام دينا تھا وہ دے ديا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Even before this resolution came to pass, the Pakistani people and army have conveyed whatever message they wanted to.
Turk_Translation_2: Even before this resolution, the Pakistan army and the public has already conveyed the message that they wanted to pass on.
Turk_Translation_3: Even before this resolution, the message that the Pakistani people and the military had to convey has been conveyed.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan's people and army have sent the message the wanted, even before this resolution.

Urdu: ممبی حملوں کی تلافی ميں غير معمولی سفارتی و عسکری فوائد کے حصول کی بھارتی کوششيں اسے متاثر سے زيادہ شاطر فريق بنا رہی ہيں جبھی تو ابتدائی سخت عالمی رد عمل کے برعکس اب دنيا نے پاکستان پر دباو کم کر ديا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: India's efforts to gain undue diplomatic and military advantage as a compensation for the Mumbai attacks have made it appear to be a clever, rather than effective, party. This is why, after the initial strong international reaction, now the world has reduced its pressure on Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Indian efforts in seeking compensation for the Mumbai attacks in terms of extraordinary diplomatic and military benefits indicate that it is crying more than it was originally affected that is why contrary to initial strong international reaction, the world has now released pressure on Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: India's attempts to gain military and diplomatic benefits in compensation for the Mumbai attacks has been portraying it more as a cunning party than the affected one. That is why the world community has lessened its pressure on Pakistan after harsh initial reaction.
Turk_Translation_4: In reaction to the Mumbai attacks, India has been trying to reap the unusual diplomatic and military benefits. While projecting itself as a victim, it has acted wisely in exploiting these attacks. That's why the global pressure on Pakistan has now decreased despite strong global reaction initially.

Urdu: بھارت کے غير ضروري شور شرابے کو خاطر ميں نہ لاتے ہوئے اقوام متحدہ کا پاکستان کی کوششوں پر اطمينان کا اظہار اور انٹر پول کے سربراہ کا پاکستانی کوششوں کو سراہنا بھارت کي ضرورت سے زيادہ سفارت کاري کا ’سائيڈ افيکٹ‘ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Ignoring the needless fuss created by India, the United Nations expression of satisfaction over Pakistan's efforts and Interpol's President's commendation of Pakistani efforts are the fallout of India's diplomatic efforts, rather than its need.
Turk_Translation_2: The United Nations paying no heed to needless Indian cries and expressing satisfaction over Pakistan's efforts, and the Head of Interpol praising Pakistan's efforts, are the 'side effects' of India's unnecessary diplomatic efforts.
Turk_Translation_3: Without taking note of India's unnecessary hullabaloo, the expression of satisfaction over Pakistan's efforts by the United Nations and the appreciation by the Interpol's head of Pakistani efforts is the 'side-effect' of India's over enthusiastic diplomacy.
Turk_Translation_4: Without taking the note of the unnecessary Indian hype, the United Nations has expressed its satisfaction over the Pakistani efforts. The Interpol chief has also praised these efforts. Such international praise is the 'side effect' of India's unnecessary diplomacy.

Urdu: اس بات پر تو کوئی دو رائے نہیں کہ یہ ایک بہت ہی بہیمانہ فعل ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: There is no disagreement that this act is an extremely corrupt act.
Turk_Translation_2: There are no two opinions that this is a severe brutal act.
Turk_Translation_3: There are no divided opinions on the fact that this is a very cruel act.
Turk_Translation_4: Indisputably, this is a very inhumane act.

Urdu: لیکن سوال یہ ہے کہ جب ہزاروں طالبان پیر سمیع اللہ کے گاوں پر حملہ آور ہوئے تھے تو پاکستانی فوج کہاں تھی اور کیا کر رہی تھی؟
Turk_Translation_1: But the question is, when thousands of Taliban attacked the village of Peer Samiullah, where was the Pakistani army, and what was it doing?
Turk_Translation_2: But the question is that when thousands of Taliban attacked the village of Pir Samiullah where was the Pakistan army at that time and what it was doing?
Turk_Translation_3: But the question is that when thousands of Taliban attacked the village of Pir Samiullah, where was the Pakistan army and what was it doing?
Turk_Translation_4: The question is, where was the Pakistani army and what was it doing when thousands of Taliban attacked Peer Samiullah's village?

Urdu: کیا فوج کا احتساب نہیں ہونا چاہیے کہ ایک سال میں انہوں نے وہاں کیا کیا؟
Turk_Translation_1: Should the army not be held accountable for whatever it did out there in a whole year?
Turk_Translation_2: Should the army not be held accountable for what they did during the one-year stay over there?
Turk_Translation_3: Should the army not be held accountable for what it has done there in one year?
Turk_Translation_4: Shouldn't the army be held accountable for what they did during the one-year period they spent there?

Urdu: ہر روز جو ہزاروں کی تعداد میں وہ مارٹر اور توپ کے گولے برساتے ہیں ان سے کتنے طالبان مارے جاتے ہیں؟
Turk_Translation_1: How many Taliban are being killed by the thousands of mortars and bombs that they drop everyday?
Turk_Translation_2: How may Taliban are killed with thousands of mortar and gun shells that the army sprays each day?
Turk_Translation_3: How many Taliban are killed by thousands of mortar and heavy artillery shells they fire every day?
Turk_Translation_4: How many Taliban are killed with the mortars and tank artillery they fire by the thousands on a daily basis?

Urdu: میں آئی ایس آئی سے اپیل کرتا ہوں کہ خدارا طالبان کی سرپرستی چھوڑ دیں اور ہمیں جنت نظیر سوات میں امن سے رہنے دیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: I appeal to ISI that they should stop patronizing the Taliban and let us live in peace in the heavenly Swat,
Turk_Translation_2: I appeal the ISI please for God's sake leave patronizing Taliban and let us live in peace in the beautiful valley of Sawat
Turk_Translation_3: I appeal to the ISI that they, for God's sake, stop patronizing the Taliban and let us live in our Heavenly Swat in peace.
Turk_Translation_4: I appeal to the ISI to please stop sponsoring the Taliban; let us live peacefully in heavenly Swat.

Urdu: اور یہ جعلی آپریشن بند کردیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: and put an end to this fake operation.
Turk_Translation_2: and close up this bogus operation.
Turk_Translation_3: And stop this fake operation.
Turk_Translation_4: And stop this fake operation.

Urdu: اقوام متحدہ ميں وہ دن دور نہيں جب پاکستان ميں فوجی مداخلت کی قرارداد ايسے ہی پاس ہوجائےگی جيسےجماعت الداعوۃ کےخلاف پاس ہوئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: The day is not far away when a United Nations resolution relating to armed intervention in Pakistan will pass just like the way one was passed against Jamat-ud-Daawa.
Turk_Translation_2: That day is not far when a UN resolution for armed intervention in Pakistan will be passed in a similar way as has been in the case of Jamaat Al-Dawa.
Turk_Translation_3: The day is not far now when a resolution about military intervention in Pakistan will be passed in the United Nations in the same manner as it was passed against Jama'at-ud-Dawah.
Turk_Translation_4: One day the United Nations will pass a resolution regarding military intervention in Pakistan, the same as it has done against Jamat-u-Al Dawah.

Urdu: رياض احمد فاروقی
Turk_Translation_1: Riaz Ahmed Faruqi.
Turk_Translation_2: Riaz Ahmad Farooqi
Turk_Translation_3: Riaz Ahmad Farooqi
Turk_Translation_4: Riyaz Ahmed Farooqui

Urdu: اول تو ہمارے شدت پسند اور انکے حمايتي ہی اپنے خلاف کارروائی کے لیے تمام ثبوت اور جواز مسلسل فراہم کیے جا رہے ہيں اور خاکم بدہن، جس دن بھي ايسي کوئی قرارداد پيش ہوئی تو پورے امکانات ہيں کہ اقوام متحدہ ميں کوئی بھي آواز ہمارے حق ميں نہ اٹھےگي،
Turk_Translation_1: To begin with, our extremists and their supporters themselves are constantly providing proofs and reasons for action against themselves, and whenever such a resolution is passed, there is a great possibility that no one will raise their voice at the United Nations in support of us.
Turk_Translation_2: First of all, our extremists and their supporters are themselves continuously providing all proofs and justifications for action against them, and it is clear that whenever such a resolution is presented in the United Nations, no voice will be raised in our favor,
Turk_Translation_3: Our extremists and their supporters are continuously providing all the proofs and justifications for action against them and, may I have soil in my mouth for saying such a cursed thing, the day such a resolution is tabled, there is every likelihood that no one will support us in the United Nations,
Turk_Translation_4: First of all, our extremists and their supporters themselves are providing all the evidence and justification for actions against them. It is quite possible that once such a resolution is proposed, not a single voice in the UN will be on our side.

Urdu: اور بالفرض اس قرارداد کے پاس ہونے ميں دير ہوئی تو امريکہ کی مثال سامنے رکھتے ہوئے کوئی نہ کوئی طاقت اپنی مدد آپ کے تحت ہي چڑھ دوڑے گي۔
Turk_Translation_1: And even if there is some delay in the passing of the resolution, one country or another will follow the example of America and attack us on their own.
Turk_Translation_2: and if the passing of such a resolution gets delayed, then any of the powers following the example of America will run over us on the basis of self-help.
Turk_Translation_3: and suppose there is some delay in the passage of such a resolution, some powerful country, following the precedent set by America, will launch an attack by itself.
Turk_Translation_4: Supposedly, if the adoption of such a resolution is delayed, some power like the USA will unilaterally attack it.

Urdu: پير سميع اللہ کی شخصيت اور کارناموں سے ہميں واقفيت اور معلومات نہيں کہ اس کی سرگرمياں کيا تھيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: We do not have much familiarity with the personality and achievements of Peer Samiullah and we do not have information about what his activities were.
Turk_Translation_2: We are not aware and have no information about the personality and achievements of Pir Samiullah.
Turk_Translation_3: We have no knowledge of the personality and the achievements of Pir Samiuallah and of his activities.
Turk_Translation_4: I don't know what Peer Samiullah was like as a person, nor do I know about his achievements.

Urdu: شايد وہ کوئی انقلابی نہيں تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Probably he was not a revolutionary.
Turk_Translation_2: Perhaps he was not a revolutionary.
Turk_Translation_3: Perhaps he was not a revolutionary.
Turk_Translation_4: Perhaps he was not a revolutionary.

Urdu: جس طرح کامريڈ چے گويرا، نواب اکبرخان بگٹی، ڈاکٹر نجيب اللہ اور ہزاروں انقلابيوں کی لاشوں کی بےحرمتی دشمن کے ہاتھوں ہوئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The way Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Dr. Najibullah, and the bodies of thousands of dead revolutionaries have been desecrated at the hands of the enemies.
Turk_Translation_2: The matter in which the dead bodies of Comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Bugti, Doctor Najeebullah and several thousand other revolutionart were insulted by enemies.
Turk_Translation_3: Just as the dead bodies of comrade Che Guevara, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Dr. Najeeb Ullah and thousands of other revolutionaries have been defiled by the enemies.
Turk_Translation_4: Even though the dead bodies of comrade Che Goera, Nawab Akbar Khan Bugti, Dr. Najeebullah and thousands of revolutionaries were handled with disrespect by their enemies,

Urdu: وہ تو مر کر بھی امر ہوتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: They are immortal even after death.
Turk_Translation_2: They are alive even after death.
Turk_Translation_3: They are immortal even after their death.
Turk_Translation_4: they are immortal even after their death.

Urdu: ليکن يہاں تو ايک بين الاقوامی گيم کھيلا جارہا ہے، يہاں وحشت اور درندگی سے عوام کو خوفزدہ کر کے حکمرانی کی جا رہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: But here, an international game is being played. Here, people are being ruled by fear, inculcated through barbarism and bestiality.
Turk_Translation_2: But here an international game is being played and, the people are being ruled by making them afraid of terror and brutality.
Turk_Translation_3: But an international game is being played here. The people are being ruled by terrifying them through barbarity and brutality.
Turk_Translation_4: But the case here is different. An international game is being played here. People are being terrorized so that they can be controlled.

Urdu: تاکہ جواز پيدا کيا جا سکے کہ اگر ہم نہ ہونگے تو ايسے وحشی اور درندے آکر حکومت پر قبضہ کرينگے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is to justify their rule; that is, if they do not rule then such barbarians and beasts will rule.
Turk_Translation_2: A justification is being created that if we are not here, then the terrorists and fanatics will take over the reign of government.
Turk_Translation_3: So that a justification may be created that if we are not here, these beasts and brutes will take over the government.
Turk_Translation_4: And in order to justify remaining in power.

Urdu: دین کے نام پر نام نہاد اسلام پسندوں کی یہ حرکت بےحد قابل مذمت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This act, which has been performed by Islamists in the name of religion, is highly condemnable.
Turk_Translation_2: This act of these so-called Islam lovers in the name of religion is highly deplorable.
Turk_Translation_3: This act of the so-called Islamists in the name of Islam is extremely condemnable act.
Turk_Translation_4: This action by Islamists in the name of religion is deplorable.

Urdu: ان انتہا پسندوں کے حامیوں کو امریکہ کے ظلم تو دکھائی دیتے ہیں لیکن اس جیسی بہیمانہ حرکتوں پر افسوس کرنے کی بجائے وہ ان کو قبائلی روایات کا نام دے ک صاف کنی کترا جاتے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The supporters of these extremists can see the tyranny of America, but instead of feeling sorry about such acts, they excuse them by labeling them as tribal customs.
Turk_Translation_2: The supporters of these extremists can see the aggressions of America, but instead of cutting a sorry figure on brutal actions like this one, they give it the name of a tribal culture and in this way change track.
Turk_Translation_3: The supporters of these extremists can see the American atrocities but rather than expressing grief over such cruel acts, they evade the responsibility in the name of tribal customs.
Turk_Translation_4: The supporters of these extremists see the injustices perpetrated by the US. However, they ignore their own inhumane actions without expressing any remorse. Instead, they merely describe them as tribal traditions.

Urdu: کھبی قبائلی روایات کا لبادہ اوڑ کر کبھی اسلام کا نام لے کر ہونے والی اس طرح کی بہیمانہ کارروائی کا جواز کسی صاحبِ دل کے پاس تو نہیں ہو سکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: No sensitive person can cover such a brutal act in the name of tribal customs, or in the name of religion.
Turk_Translation_2: A person with a good heart cannot provide justifications for this type of brutal act, neither under the umbrella of tribal culture nor in the name of Islam.
Turk_Translation_3: No kind-hearted person has any justification for such a cruel act disguised in the tribal customs or perpetrated in the name of Islam.
Turk_Translation_4: A man of reason cannot justify such inhumane actions, which are sometimes carried out in the guise of tribal traditions and at other times carried out in the name of Islam.

Urdu: میرے خیال میں ہماری فوج کے لوگ ان لوگوں سے ملے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: I think people from our armed forces are in cahoots with them.
Turk_Translation_2: In my opinion, our army is supporting these people.
Turk_Translation_3: In my opinion, the personnel of our army are collaborating with them.
Turk_Translation_4: I think my army has an understanding with them.

Urdu: وہ ایسا کہ جب یہ لوگ نقل حرکت کرتے ہیں تو اس میں اتنا ٹائم تو لگنا ہے، اسے پکڑنے کے لیے اتنا ٹایم تو ہوگا لیکن وہ موقع پر پہنچنا تو دور وہ اگر وہاں ہوتے بھی تو وہاں سے رفو چکر ہوتے ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: When these people move from one place to another, it takes some time, during which they can be captured. But the army leaves the place, even if it's there, let alone capturing them during their movement.
Turk_Translation_2: It is because when these people move, it surely takes time. There is enough time to arrest them, but they run away - even if they are present at the occasion, let alone reaching the spot.
Turk_Translation_3: This is proven by the fact that when these people move, the movement would at least take so much time that that they could be arrested. But let alone reaching the spot, these people even if they are in vicinity, flee the place.
Turk_Translation_4: Because it is understandable that it may take time for the army to move there and nab them. But, how can they manage to flee even if the army is present there.

Urdu: کیا یہ لوگ اتنے بہادر ہیں کہ وہ پچاس ستر آدمیوں کو یرغمال کرتے ہیں اور ہماری فوج ہاتھ پہ ہاتھ رکھے اس کو تماشائی کی طرح دیکھتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Are those people so fearless that they keep 50 to 70 people as hostages and our army watches the show?
Turk_Translation_2: Are they so brave that they hold fifty, seventy people as hostages, and our army watches them as a spectator doing nothing.
Turk_Translation_3: Are these guys so powerful that they can take fifty to seventy men hostage and our army keeps watching the spectacle idly?
Turk_Translation_4: Are they brave enough to kidnap 50-70 people? The army merely keeps watching as a spectator.

Urdu: وہ بھی اللہ کے بندے ہیں اور فوج بھی۔
Turk_Translation_1: They are creatures of Allah, and so is our army.
Turk_Translation_2: Both the army and these people are Allah's creation.
Turk_Translation_3: They are humans as is the army.
Turk_Translation_4: Both kidnappers and army men are human beings.

Urdu: صاف ظاہر ہے کہ دال میں کچھ کالا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: It's clear that there is something fishy going on.
Turk_Translation_2: It is evident that something is black at the bottom.
Turk_Translation_3: It is evident that there is something fishy.
Turk_Translation_4: It is quite clear that there is something else going on behind the scenes.

Urdu: ملائيت، آمرِ زمانہ ضياءالحق کي حقيقتاً آمريت کے دور سے خدا کی رحيمی اور کريمی کی صفات اجاگر کرنے کے برعکس طرح طرح کے عذابوں اور عبرتوں کے تذکروں سے مذہب کے نام پر خوف ودہشت کی جو فضاء قائم کرتی نظر آتی ہے اس ميں لاش لٹکنانے کے واقعہ کے علاوہ انکا لٹريچر اور ’مرنے کے بعد کيا ہوگا‘ جيسی کتابيں بھی خوف ودہشت پيدا کرتی ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The great dictator of his time, Zia-ul-Haq, due to his authoritarianism, instead of highlighting the compassionate and merciful attributes of God, created an atmosphere of fear and terror for the faith through the discussions of the variety of forms of God's wrath and punishments. The incidence of the hanging corpse and books titled "What Will Happen After Death" produce fear and terror.
Turk_Translation_2: The religious scholars since the truly dictatorial regime of dictator of the world Zia-ul-Haq, contrary to projecting God's attributes of kindness and affection, have been creating an atmosphere of fear and terror by telling countless stories of punishments and admonitions in the name of religion, in which the incident of hanging dead bodies and additionally their literature and books like 'What will happen after death' are also creating fear and terror.
Turk_Translation_3: Since the era of true dictatorship of Zia-ul-Haq, the Mullahism has been creating such an atmosphere of fear and terror in the name of religion by its descriptions of the various kinds of exemplary punishments and torture rather than highlighting the mercy and love of God. Besides, the incident of hanging of the corpse, their literature and books like 'What will Happen after the Death' strike terror in the hearts.
Turk_Translation_4: Since the time of the dictator Ziaul Haq, who was the real dictator, Mullahism has been reminding us about different types of punishments and telling wise stories in the name of religion, creating an atmosphere of terror. Instead they should have highlighted qualities of God such as mercy. Incidents like hanging dead bodies (on trees) and their literature, like the book titled "What will happen after death?," also create a sense of terror and fear.

Urdu: اور يہ لوگ محض دنياوي حلوہ مانڈہ اور جاہ و جلال کي غرض سے اس خوف ودہشت کو بطور آلہ يا ھتھيار کےاستعمال کر رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: And these people are using fear and terror as the tools for obtaining worldly profits, gains, and grandeur.
Turk_Translation_2: And with a purpose to gain worldly prestige, these people are using fear and terror as a tool.
Turk_Translation_3: And these people are using this fear and terror as a weapon merely to get the wealth and status of this world.
Turk_Translation_4: These people have been exploiting terror as a means of achieving status for themselves in this world.

Urdu: ’واعظو!
Turk_Translation_1: Waazu!
Turk_Translation_2: 'O' religious speakers!
Turk_Translation_3: 'O Preachers
Turk_Translation_4: Mullahs!

Urdu: آتشِ دوزخ سے جہاں کو تم يہ ڈرايا ہے
Turk_Translation_1: You are the one who planted the fear of hell fire among all.
Turk_Translation_2: You frightened the world so much from the hell fire
Turk_Translation_3: You have so terrorized the world by the fires of hell
Turk_Translation_4: You have cautioned others about hell fire.

Urdu: کہ خود بن گئے ڈر کي صورت‘
Turk_Translation_1: You became the face of fear itself.
Turk_Translation_2: That your face turned into the face of fear'
Turk_Translation_3: That you have become fear incarnate'
Turk_Translation_4: However, you yourselves have become an image of terror.

Urdu: حيرت ہوتی ہے جب يہ کہا جاتا ہے کہ يہ کام کسی مسلمان کا نہيں ہو سکتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: It's amazing when it is said that this cannot be the work of a Muslim.
Turk_Translation_2: It surprises us when it is said that this cannot be the activity of a Muslim.
Turk_Translation_3: It surprises me when it is said that this cannot be a Muslim's deed.
Turk_Translation_4: I feel strange when it is said that this is not the work of a Muslim person.

Urdu: ہم خود اپنی ہی تاريخ سے نابلد ہيں يا مصلحتاً چشم پوشی کر جاتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: We are ignorant of our own history, or we intentionally do not want to face it?
Turk_Translation_2: We are ignorant of our own history or intentionally avoid it.
Turk_Translation_3: We are either ignorant of our history or overlook it for the sake of convenience.
Turk_Translation_4: We don't know about our own history, or we hide the fact intentionally.

Urdu: وصال پيغمبر کے بعد انکار بيعت پر دخترِ رسول کا بند دروازہ کس نے نظر آتش کيا اور ان کے شوہر کو گلے ميں رسی ڈال کون گھسيٹ لے چلا تھا؟
Turk_Translation_1: After the demise of the Prophet, due to the refusal to take the oath of allegiance, the door to his daughter's house was set fire, and who put a noose around her husband's neck, and dragged him around?
Turk_Translation_2: As a result of a refusal to offer allegiance after the death of the Prophet, who burned down the closed door of the daughter of God's Messenger and, who dragged her husband after putting a rope around his neck?
Turk_Translation_3: Who burnt the door of the house of the Prophet's daughter when she refused to the oath of allegiance and who dragged her husband by tying a rope in his neck?
Turk_Translation_4: Who set fire to the door of the Prophet's daughter after his death? And, who dragged her husband with rope around his neck?

Urdu: کيا وہ کہيں باہر سے آئے تھے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Were they outsiders?
Turk_Translation_2: Did they come from somewhere outside?
Turk_Translation_3: Had they come from somewhere outside?
Turk_Translation_4: Were they outsiders?

Urdu: مدينہ پر فوج يزيد کي يلغار اور سانحۂ کربلا کيا ہنود و يہود کا کيا دھرا تھا؟
Turk_Translation_1: Was the attack of the army of Yazeed on Madina, or the incidence of Karbala the work of the Hindus or the Jews?
Turk_Translation_2: Were Yazid's army attack on Medina and the incident of Karbala the acts of Hindus and Jews?
Turk_Translation_3: Were the attack on Madina by Yazeed's army and the tragedy of Karbala perpetrated by Hindus and Jews?
Turk_Translation_4: Were the attacks on Medina by Yazeed's army and the incident in Karbala carried out by Indians and Jews?

Urdu: حقائق تسليم کیے بغير محرکات دور ہوئے ہيں نہ ہي سدباب ہوا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Without accepting the truth, the motives have neither been understood, nor have they been addressed.
Turk_Translation_2: Without accepting facts, neither motives can be eliminated nor remedies made.
Turk_Translation_3: Without accepting the facts, we can neither quash the motives nor can we provide redress.
Turk_Translation_4: Without admitting the facts, motives have never been addressed.

Urdu: بی بی سی والو دوغلی پالسی بند کرو۔
Turk_Translation_1: BBC, end your two-faced policy!
Turk_Translation_2: Those running BBC should stop dual policy.
Turk_Translation_3: O BBC people, stop this dual policy.
Turk_Translation_4: BBC! Stop pursuing your policy of using a double standard.

Urdu: اس موضوع سے زيادہ بہتر سپر ہٹ عنوان: ’بش کو جوتے پڑنے جائز تھے يا ناجائز؟
Turk_Translation_1: A better topic than this: "Was it appropriate to hit Bush with shoes or not?"
Turk_Translation_2: More super hit topic than this: 'Was throwing shoes on Bush right or wrong?'
Turk_Translation_3: A better, super hit title on this subject: 'was shoe-flinging at Bush justified or not?
Turk_Translation_4: The headline which reads "Hurling shoe at Bush - permissible or not?" is much better than this topic.

Urdu: ‘ ہونا چاہئیے تھا
Turk_Translation_1: Should it have happened?
Turk_Translation_2: should have been
Turk_Translation_3: should have been'
Turk_Translation_4: It should be there.

Urdu: طاھر چوھدری، جاپان
Turk_Translation_1: Tahir Chaudhry, Japan.
Turk_Translation_2: Tahir Chaudhry, Japan
Turk_Translation_3: Tahir Chaudhary, Japan.
Turk_Translation_4: Tahir Chowdhary, Japan

Urdu: يار کچھ شرم کر ايک انسان کو قبر سے نکال کر کھمبے سے لٹکا ديا گيا اسليے کہ اس نے ظلم کے خلاف آواز اٹھائی، اور آپ کو باکس آفس کے موضوع کی پڑی ہوئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Friend, show some shame. A man was dug out of a grave and hanged on a pole because he raised his voice against injustice, and all you can think of is the topic of the box office.
Turk_Translation_2: My friend, feel a little bit of shame a person was taken out from the grave and hanged with a pole merely because he raised his voice against aggression, and you are interested more in box office topic.
Turk_Translation_3: Friend, feel some shame. A man's body was exhumed and suspended to the pole only because he had raised his voice against cruelty. And you are worried about titles for box office?
Turk_Translation_4: My dear, for shame. You are talking about Box Office, while the dead body of a person was taken out of his grave and hung on a pole because he had raised his voice against injustice.

Urdu: آپريشن شيردل کی کاميابی کے ليے اور بارڈر کی دوسری طرف سے آپريشن لائن ہارٹ کی کاميابی کا انحصار اس بات پر منحصر ہے کہ عام لوگوں کي رائے کس کے حق ميں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: For Operation Lionheart's success, and its success on the other side of the border depends on which side the common people are inclined to support.
Turk_Translation_2: The success of Operation Sherdil - and, on the other side of the border, the victory of Operation Lion Heart - depends on whom the general public opinion supports.
Turk_Translation_3: The success of the Operation Sherdil and of Operation Lionheart on the other side of the border depends on how favorable is the public opinion regarding them.
Turk_Translation_4: The success of Operation Sher-e-Dil and Operation Lion Heart from across the border depends on public opinion.

Urdu: يہ اقدام امريکی اور پاکستانی ايجنسيوں کا ہی ہے اور پير صاحب اس سازش کا شکار ہوئے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is the work of American and Pakistani agencies and friend Peer has been a victim of their scheme.
Turk_Translation_2: This is the work of American and Pakistani intelligence agencies and Pir Sahib has fallen prey to this conspiracy.
Turk_Translation_3: This act has been perpetrated by the Pakistani and American agencies and Pir sahib has fallen prey to this conspiracy.
Turk_Translation_4: This initiative has been undertaken by American and Pakistani agencies. Peer Saheb has fallen prey to this conspiracy.

Urdu: اس فورم ميں اب سارے تبصرے طالبان مخالفت پر مبنی ہونگے کيونکہ خفيہ والے طالبان ميں کاميابی سے شامل ہو چکے ہيں اور وہ اقدامات کر رہے ہيں جو عام لوگوں کی رائے بدل سکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: All the comments made in this forum now will be against the Taliban, because secret agents have successfully infiltrated the ranks of the Taliban and are taking steps to change public opinion.
Turk_Translation_2: On this forum, now all commentaries will be anti-Taliban, because intelligence agencies' persons have successfully entered in the Taliban ranks, and they are taking such measures that can alter general public opinion.
Turk_Translation_3: From now on, all the comments on this forum will be anti-Taliban because the agents of the secret services have successfully penetrated Taliban and are conducting such actions as can change the common man's opinion.
Turk_Translation_4: All comments in this forum will now focus on opposing the Taliban, because intelligence people have now joined the Taliban and are taking steps that may change public opinion.

Urdu: ميں تو صرف يہ پوچھنا چا ہو نگا کہ جب ايک پورے دن تک يہ لاش لٹکتی ری تو فوج والے کيا کر رہے تھے کيا وہ صرف عام لوگوں کو نشانہ بنانے کيلے وہاں بيھٹے ہيں جو بيان بھی کچھ اسطرح کرتے ہيں’طالبان کے ٹھکانوں پر بمباری، مکان پرگولہ گرنےسے 2 بچے اور انکی ماں ’ہلاک‘۔
Turk_Translation_1: What I would like to ask is that while this dead body was hanging there for a whole day, what were the soldiers doing there? Do they only sit there to target civilians? And then the way they issue a statement like this - "Taliban hideouts attacked, a mother and her three kids killed when the house was bombed."
Turk_Translation_2: I would just like to ask that, when, for a full one day this dead body remained hanging, then what the army people were doing there; are they sitting there only to target the general population. They give statements like this: 'Bombing on Taliban hideouts, shelling on house kills 2 children and their mother'.
Turk_Translation_3: I would just like to ask what was the army doing when this dead body kept hanging from the pole for the whole day? Are they sitting there just to target the common people? Their statements are like, 'shelling on the hideouts of the Taliban, 2 children and their mother killed by a shell hitting the home'.
Turk_Translation_4: The dead body kept hanging for a whole day. I have just one question to ask. Where was the army? What were the soldiers doing? Is their only job to target the common man? Their statements read as: 'Taliban positions bombed, 2 children, their mother killed'.

Urdu: کيا انہں اس چوک کے بارے ميں پتہ نہيں تھا؟
Turk_Translation_1: Did they not know about this square?
Turk_Translation_2: Were they not aware of this crossing?
Turk_Translation_3: Did they not know about this square?
Turk_Translation_4: Didn't they know about that place?

Urdu: يا تماشہ ديکھ رہے تھے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Or were they watching the show?
Turk_Translation_2: Or they were watching a game?
Turk_Translation_3: Or, were they watching the spectacle?
Turk_Translation_4: Or they were merely watching like spectators?

Urdu: ہم ہاتھ جوڑ کر منت اور التجا کرتے ہيں کہ خدا کيلیے يہ گيم بند کر ديجيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: We plead and beg for God's sake, put an end to this game.
Turk_Translation_2: We request you to please close this game for the sake of God.
Turk_Translation_3: We humbly request and plead that for God's sake, stop this game.
Turk_Translation_4: We request humbly and with folded hands that this game be stopped, for God's sake.

Urdu: آخر آپ کے اوپر بھی ايک حکمران ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Lest you forget there is also someone who is watching over you.
Turk_Translation_2: After all, there is a Ruler above you, as well.
Turk_Translation_3: After all, there is one Ruler above you too.
Turk_Translation_4: There is a ruler (God) above you!

Urdu: بی بی سی کی طرف سے پوچھا گیا سوال معقول ہو نہ ہو لکھنے والوں کی سطحیت دیکھ کر افسوس ہوتا ہے، مثلاً یہ سوال کسی نے نہیں پوچھا کہ سوات میں موجود تیس ہزار فوج کیا کرنے گئی ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: A question was put forth by BBC whether appropriate or not, but the superficiality of it was disheartening. For instance, no one asked the question as to what the 30,000 armed troops in Swat have gone there to accomplish.
Turk_Translation_2: Even if the question asked by the BBC is rational or irrational, we feel sorry to observe the superficial knowledge of writers, for example no one asked the question that, what was the objective before thirty thousand soldiers went to Sawat?
Turk_Translation_3: Whether or not the question asked by BBC was appropriate, the credulity of the writers hurts. For instance, no one asked why had this thirty thousand strong army gone to Swat?
Turk_Translation_4: It does not matter whether the question asked by the BBC is reasonable or not. However, the low standard of the comments is regrettable. For example, nobody asked what 30,000 army men were doing in Swat...

Urdu: جو فوج کے مددگار طالبان سے لڑنے والوں کی لاشیں دن بھر کھمبوں پر لٹکتی رہتی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The corpses of those who fight the Taliban and support the army dangle all day long from the poles.
Turk_Translation_2: Those who help the army and fight the Taliban, their dead bodies keep hanging with street poles the whole day.
Turk_Translation_3: That the corpses of those who support the army and fight Taliban remain hanging from poles all day long.
Turk_Translation_4: while the dead bodies of those helping the army and fighting the Taliban were hanging on poles,

Urdu: سواتی عوام کے ساتھ سبز قدم پاکستانی فوج نے جو کیا سو کیا، لیکن میڈیا بشمول بی بی سی نے بھی دنیا کو اصل حقیقت سے لاعلم رکھ کر اچھا نہیں کیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Whatever was done to the people of Swat by the cursed Pakistani army they did. But the media, including the BBC, did not do any good by hiding the truth from the world.
Turk_Translation_2: Whatever treatment the people of Sawat received from the army was not respectable, but the media, including the BBC, has done no good by keeping the real fact away from the world.
Turk_Translation_3: Even if we overlook what the ill-omened Pakistan army did to the Swati people, the media including BBC has done no good by hiding the facts from the world.
Turk_Translation_4: let alone what the Pakistani army did to the people of Swat. However, even the media, including the BBC, kept the world in the dark with regard to the real facts. In doing so, they did not do the right thing.

Urdu: پاکستانی فوج ڈرامہ کررہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The Pakistani army is staging a play.
Turk_Translation_2: The Pakistan army is playing a game.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan army is play-acting.
Turk_Translation_4: The Pakistani army is staging a drama.

Urdu: سوات کا بچہ بچہ کہ رہا ہے کہ یہ ایک خونی ڈرامہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Every child of Swat is saying that this is a bloody drama.
Turk_Translation_2: Everyone in Sawat says that this is a bloody drama.
Turk_Translation_3: Every child of Swat is saying that this is a gory play.
Turk_Translation_4: Every child in Swat would say that it is a bloody one.

Urdu: خدارا بس کریں ڈرامہ۔
Turk_Translation_1: For God's sake, end the drama.
Turk_Translation_2: Please stop it, for God's sake.
Turk_Translation_3: For God's sake, stop this drama.
Turk_Translation_4: Stop this drama, for God's sake!

Urdu: ان طالبان نے مسلمانوں کا نام ہی خراب کر ديا۔
Turk_Translation_1: These Taliban have given Muslims a bad name.
Turk_Translation_2: These Taliban have tarnished Muslims' name.
Turk_Translation_3: These Taliban have tarnished the reputation of the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_4: The Taliban have destroyed the image of Muslims.

Urdu: پوری دنيا ميں اگر سچے مسلمان ان کو مسالمان نہيں کہتے تو ان کے علاقے ميں ان دہشت گردوں کو جگہ کيوں ملتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: If true Muslims in the whole world do not consider them Muslims, then why do these terrorists find refuge in their own area?
Turk_Translation_2: If in the whole world, true Muslims do not consider them Muslim then why they allow terrorists to live in their areas.
Turk_Translation_3: If all the true Muslims of the world don't call them as Muslims, how can then these terrorist find safe havens in their lands?
Turk_Translation_4: If Muslims all over the world had not accepted them as Muslims, they would not have found a foothold anywhere.

Urdu: جو بےغيرت بن جاتے ہيں جن سے محنت مزدوری نہيں ہوتی بندوق اٹھا کے ان کے گروپ ميں شامل ہوتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Those who have become shameless, who do not want to work hard, get guns and join their groups.
Turk_Translation_2: Those who are unconcerned about their self respect and cannot do hard work, they take a gun and join their group.
Turk_Translation_3: Those who lack all sense of honor and can't work hard take up the gun and join these groups.
Turk_Translation_4: Those who have no shame and can't work to earn a living take to guns and join their group.

Urdu: اسلام بندوق يا تلوار کے زور سے نہيں آيا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Islam did not come about by force using a gun or a sword.
Turk_Translation_2: Islam did not come through the force of gun or sword.
Turk_Translation_3: Islam has not flourished because of gun or sword.
Turk_Translation_4: Islam was not spread with the gun or the sword.

Urdu: شرم کرو۔
Turk_Translation_1: You should be ashamed.
Turk_Translation_2: Feel ashamed.
Turk_Translation_3: Shame, shame.
Turk_Translation_4: For shame.

Urdu: اس کا جواز نہ کسي مذہب ميں ہے نہ کسي خانداني روايات ميں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The answer to this cannot be found in any religion or any family tradition.
Turk_Translation_2: It has no justification, neither in any religion nor in any family tradition.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither any religion nor any family traditions provides its justification.
Turk_Translation_4: Neither any religion nor any family tradition allows for it.

Urdu: بشمول بی بی سی ساری ميڈيا طالبان اور قبائل کے متعلق مختلف ذرائع سے اپنے تبصرے کرتے ہيں
Turk_Translation_1: The whole media, including the BBC, is speculating about the Taliban and the tribes using different sources.
Turk_Translation_2: The whole media, including BBC broadcasts commentaries on the subject of the Taliban and tribes through different sources
Turk_Translation_3: All the media including BBC comment through various sources on Taliban and the tribes.
Turk_Translation_4: All media outlets, including the BBC, comment about the Taliban and tribes.

Urdu: ليکن حقيقی صورت حال کا کسي کو پتہ ہي نہيں کہ صحيح صورت حال ہے کيا يہ تو ہم جانتے ہہیں کيونکہ ہم قبائلی ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But nobody knows what the actual situation is. We know, because we ourselves are tribesmen.
Turk_Translation_2: but no one knows what is the real situation, we are the only people who have knowledge of this because we are tribal.
Turk_Translation_3: But no one knows what the actual position is. We know it because we are the tribal people.
Turk_Translation_4: But, none of them is aware of the real situation. Only we know what the real situation is, because we are tribal people.

Urdu: مختصرا يہ کہ يہ ايک کھيل ہے جسميں سی ائی اے، را، موساد اور ہمارا اپنا ائی ايس آئی شامل ہيں نہ کوئی طالب ہے نہ قبائلی يہ ان اداروس کے پيداکردہ شرپسند عناصر ہيں جو اسلام، طالبان، مدارس، پشتون قوم، قبائل اور قبائلی روايات کو بدنام کر رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: In short, this is a game in which the CIA, RAW, Mosad, and our own ISI are involved. There are no Taliban or tribesmen; there are terrorist who have been created to give a bad name to Islam, Taliban, Madrasahs, Pashtun people, tribes and the tribal customs.
Turk_Translation_2: In brief, this is a game in which the CIA, RAW, Mossad and our own ISI are participating; there is no Taliban or tribe; these troublemakers have been created by these institutions and they are tarnishing Islam, Taliban, Islamic religious schools, the Pushtoon nation, tribes and tribal traditions.
Turk_Translation_3: In short, this is a game that involves CIA, RAW, Mossad, and our own ISI. There is neither any Talib nor any tribesman. These mutineers are the creation of these agencies and are now casting a slur upon Islam, Taliban, madrassahs, Pakhtun nation, tribes and the tribal customs.
Turk_Translation_4: In short, this is a game being played by the CIA, RAW, Mossad, and our ISI. There is neither any Taliban, nor any tribal. These are bad elements created by these agencies, and they are giving a bad name to Islam, Taliban, madrassas, Pashtuns, tribes, and tribal traditions.

Urdu: اس حرکت سے سب مسلمانوں کے سر شرم سے جھک گئے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This behavior has brought shame to the Muslims.
Turk_Translation_2: As a result of this deed, the heads of all Muslims have bowed down with shame.
Turk_Translation_3: The heads of all the Muslims are bowed in shame over this act.
Turk_Translation_4: This action has made all Muslims feel ashamed.

Urdu: ميں ايم کيو ايم کے قائد الطف حسين کو اے اين پی اور پي پی پی کی قيادت کو سلام پيش کرتا ہوں جو اس کينسر کے خلاف يعنی طالبان کے خلاف بات کرتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: I salute MQM's chief Altaf Husain, ANP, and PPP, who are speaking up about this cancer. i.e. the Taliban.
Turk_Translation_2: I solute MQM leader Altaf Hussain and the leadership of ANP and PPP who raise voice against this cancer i.e. Taliban.
Turk_Translation_3: I salute the MQM leader Altaf Hussein and the leadership of ANP and PPP who talk about this cancer, namely Taliban.
Turk_Translation_4: I greet the leader of MQM, Altaf Hussain, and the leader of ANP and PPP, who speak out against this cancer -- i.e., against the Taliban.

Urdu: يہ کينسر ضياالحق کی پيداوار ہے، وہ خود تو گئے مگر پاکستان کو بھی تباہ کر گئے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This cancer is a product of Zia-ul-Haq. He died, but ruined Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: This cancer is the creation of Zia-ul-Haq, who himself died, but with that also destroyed Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: This cancer is the product of Zia-ul-Haq. He himself departed but also destroyed Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: This cancer was created by Ziaul Haq. He is no more, but he has destroyed Pakistan too.

Urdu: مگر ميں پراميد ہوں کہ موجودہ قيادت اس کينسر کو ختم کر لے گی۔
Turk_Translation_1: But I am hopeful that the present leadership will eliminate this cancer.
Turk_Translation_2: But I am hopeful that the present leadership will be able to put an end to this cancer.
Turk_Translation_3: But I am hopeful that the present leadership will be able to expunge this cancer.
Turk_Translation_4: However, I am optimistic that the current leadership will be able to treat this cancer.

Urdu: ہندوستان نے ممبئی حملوں کے بعد کہا کہ ان حملوں کے پیچھے پاکستان کے بعض شدت پسند عناصر کا ہاتھ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: India, after the Mumbai attacks, has declared that a few extremist elements from Pakistan were involved in them.
Turk_Translation_2: After the Mumbai attacks, India has alleged that these strikes were backed by some extremist elements in Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: After the Mumbai attacks, India said that some Pakistani extremists had a hand in these attacks.
Turk_Translation_4: After the Mumbai attacks, India said Pakistani extremists were behind the attacks.

Urdu: پاکستان نے ان الزامات کی تردید کی اور کہا کہ وہ تفتیش میں ہندوستان کی ہر ممکن مدد کرے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan has refuted these allegations, saying that it will provide as much help to India in the investigations as it can.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan refuted these allegations and said it will extend all help to India in investigation.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan refuted these claims and said that it will extend all possible help to India in the investigation process.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan rejected these allegations, saying it would extend all possible assistance to India to investigate the attacks.

Urdu: ہندوستان نے کہا کہ اس نے پاکستان کو ایک فہرست دی ہے جس میں ان بیس مشتبہ شدت پسندوں کے نام دیئے ہیں، جو ہندوستان کو مطلوب ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: India has stated that it has given a list of twenty suspected terrorists to Pakistan who are wanted by India.
Turk_Translation_2: India said that it has given a list of the names of 20 suspected extremists to Pakistan who are wanted by India.
Turk_Translation_3: India said that it had given Pakistan a list containing the names of 20 suspected extremists who were wanted by India.
Turk_Translation_4: On its part, India said it had submitted a list to Pakistan containing the names of suspected extremists wanted by India.

Urdu: اب پاکستان نے کہا ہے کہ اس فہرست میں شامل جیشِ محمد کے سربراہ مولانا مسعود اظہر نظربند نہیں ہیں اور ان کے بارے میں حکومت پاکستان کو کوئی معلومات نہیں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now Pakistan has said that Jaish-e-Mohammad's leader Maulana Masood Azhar, who is also included in this list, has not been detained and the Pakistani government has no information about him.
Turk_Translation_2: Now Pakistan has said that the head of Jaish-e-Muhammad, Maulana Masood Azhar included in this list is not under house arrest and the Government of Pakistan does not know the whereabouts of this person.
Turk_Translation_3: Now Pakistan has said that Maulana Masood Azhar, the leader of Jaish Muhammad, who is included in this list is not under house arrest and the Pakistan government has no information about him.
