Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan said that Maulana Masood Azhar, one of the individuals on the list, was not under arrest and that the Pakistani government had no information about him.

Urdu: اس سے پہلے پاکستان کے صدر آصف علی زرداری نے اس تاثر کو مسترد کیا کہ مغربی خفیہ اداروں اور بھارتی حکومت نے پاکستان کو ممبئی حملوں سے متعلق شواہد فراہم کیے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Earlier, Pakistan's president Asif Ali Zardari dismissed the impression that western secret service agencies and the Indian government have provided proofs about the Mumbai attacks to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Earlier the President of Pakistan, Asif Ali Zardari refuted the impression that Western intelligence agencies and the Indian government have provided Pakistan with evidence with respect to the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_3: Earlier, the Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari dismissed the impression that the western secret agencies and the Indian government had provided evidence regarding the Mumbai attacks to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistani President Asif Ali Zardari had already rejected the notion that western intelligence agencies and the Indian government had provided Pakistan with evidences related to the Mumbai attacks.

Urdu: صدر زردرای نے اجمل قصاب کے بارے میں کہا کہ یہ ابھی ثابت نہیں ہوا کہ وہ پاکستانی ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: President Zardari said that whether Ajmal Kasab is from Pakistan or not hasn't been proved yet.
Turk_Translation_2: Referring to Ajmal Qasab, President Zardari said it has not yet been proven whether he is a Pakistani national.
Turk_Translation_3: President Zardari said about Ajmal Qasab that it had not so far been proved that he was a Pakistani.
Turk_Translation_4: Regarding Ajmal Kasab, President Zardari said it was not yet proved that he was a Pakistani.

Urdu: اسی دوران وزیراعظم منموہن سنگھ نے پاکستان کو خبردار کیا ہے کہ اس کے ساتھ بھارت کے تعلقات تب تک بہتر نہیں ہوسکتے جب تک وہاں کی سر زمین کو دہشت گردی کے لیے استعمال کیا جاتا رہے گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Meanwhile, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh has warned Pakistan that its relations with India cannot improve while it keeps using India's land for terrorist activities.
Turk_Translation_2: Meanwhile, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh warned Pakistan that Indian relations with Pakistan cannot improve as long as their land is being used for terrorism purposes.
Turk_Translation_3: Meanwhile, Prime Minister Manmohan Singh has warned Pakistan that its relations with India won't improve as long as its land is used for the terrorism purposes.
Turk_Translation_4: Meanwhile, Prime Minster Manmohan Singh warned Pakistan that India's relations with it could not be improved as long as the Pakistani territories were being used for terrorism.

Urdu: اور تازہ ترین پیش رفت میں انڈیا کر کرکٹ ٹیم نے پاکستان کا دورہ منسوخ کر دیا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And in the recent developments, the Indian cricket team has cancelled its tour to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: And in the latest development, the Indian cricket team has cancelled its tour of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: And in the most recent update, the Indian cricket team has cancelled its tour to Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: In the latest development, India's cricket team has cancelled its tour to Pakistan.

Urdu: کیا ان سیاسی واقعات کا کھیلوں پر اثر پڑنا چاہیے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Should these political events affect sports?
Turk_Translation_2: Should these political incidents influence games?
Turk_Translation_3: Should these political events affect the sports too?
Turk_Translation_4: Should these political developments have an impact on sports?

Urdu: آپ پاکستان اور ہندستان کے تعلقات کا مستقبل کیا دیکھتےہیں؟
Turk_Translation_1: How do you see the future of the relations between Pakistan and India?
Turk_Translation_2: What kind of relationships do you foresee between India and Pakistan?
Turk_Translation_3: What future for Pak-India relations do you foresee?
Turk_Translation_4: What do you think about the future of Pak-India relations?

Urdu: پاکستان کو نہ امريکہ توڑے گا نہ انڈيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan would be broken neither by America, nor by India.
Turk_Translation_2: Neither America nor India will break Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither America nor India will disintegrate Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: No one will break Pakistan, neither America nor India.

Urdu: پاکستان کو خود پاکستانی توڑيں گے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistanis themselves would break Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistanis themselves will break Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan will be disintegrated by the Pakistanis.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan will be broken only by Pakistanis.

Urdu: اتنی صوبائيت فرقہ واريت اور ملائيت کے بعد آپ کيا توقع رکھتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: What do you expect after so much provincialism and sectarianism?
Turk_Translation_2: What do you expect, after looking at the extent of provincialism, sectarianism and fundamentalism.
Turk_Translation_3: What do you expect after so much provincialism, sectarianism and mullahism?
Turk_Translation_4: What can you expect after so much regionalism, communalism and Mullaism?

Urdu: ويسے جناح نے بھی انڈيا کے مسلمانوں کے ساتھ اچھا نہيں کيا يہ وقت ثابت کر چکا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Time has also proved that Jinnah did not do any good to the Muslims of India.
Turk_Translation_2: Time has also proven that Jinnah did not do good to the Muslims of India.
Turk_Translation_3: The time has proved that Jinnah did not do any good to the Muslims of India either.
Turk_Translation_4: By the way, even Jinnah hadn't treated Indian Muslims in a nice fashion -- time has proved it.

Urdu: yasmin، شکاگو
Turk_Translation_1: Yasmin, Chicago.
Turk_Translation_2: yasmin, Chicago
Turk_Translation_3: yasmin Chicago.
Turk_Translation_4: Yasmin, Chicago.

Urdu: محترمہ اگر جناح صاحب کے وژن پر کام جاری رہتا تو نہ صوبائیت،فرقاواریت اور ملائیت کا کینسر پاکستان میں پھیلتا اور نہ ہی بھارت میں مسلمانوں کے ساتھ ایسا برتاؤ ہوتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Madam, had work continued on the vision of Mr. Jinnah, neither the cancer of provincialism, nor sectarianism would have spread in Pakistan, and India would not have treated Muslims like this.
Turk_Translation_2: Madam! If work on Jinnah's vision remained continued, then neither the cancer of provincialism, sectarianism and fundamentalism would have spread in Pakistan, nor were the Muslims in India treated in this way.
Turk_Translation_3: Dear lady, if work had continued on Jinnah's vision, neither would the cancer of provincialism, sectarianism and mullahism have spread in Pakistan nor would the Muslims of India have been meted out such treatment.
Turk_Translation_4: Madam, if Jinnah's dream was realized and his programs properly followed, Pakistan never would have seen such cancers like regionalism, communalism and Mullaism -- or, at the very least, Indian Muslims would not have been treated badly.

Urdu: مگر غلطی ہماری ہے کہ ان جیسے قد کا کوئی لیڈر پیدا نہیں کر سکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: But the fault lies with us that we could not create a leader like him.
Turk_Translation_2: But the mistake is ours, because we could not produce a leader of his standing.
Turk_Translation_3: It is our mistake that we have not been able to produce a leader of his stature.
Turk_Translation_4: It is our fault that we could not produce a leader of that stature.

Urdu: ہم اگر اپنے ہیروز کی قدر نہیں کر سکتے تو
Turk_Translation_1: If we cannot value our heroes than
Turk_Translation_2: If we cannot value our heroes then
Turk_Translation_3: If we cannot honor our heroes then
Turk_Translation_4: If we can't respect our heroes, then who will?

Urdu: اس خطہ ميں صلاحيتيں تو بہت ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: This region does have a lot of talent.
Turk_Translation_2: Capabilities exist in abundance in this piece of land.
Turk_Translation_3: There are lots of skills in this area.
Turk_Translation_4: There is plenty of talent here.

Urdu: خدا جانے کب عقل آئے گی اور اتفاق کی برکت سے يہ خطہ ترقی کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: God knows when they will get smart and when this region will prosper with the blessing of unity.
Turk_Translation_2: God knows when they will understand, and with the blessing of unity, this land will progress.
Turk_Translation_3: Only God knows when will the wisdom prevail here and this land will progress due to the bounty of unity.
Turk_Translation_4: God knows when will they understand, and this region will learn to become united and flourish.

Urdu: دونوں ملکوں ميں ملا، پنڈت، طالبان، شيو سينا، آر ايس ايس وغيرہ تو امن کے مخالف تيار کیے گئے ہيں ہي۔
Turk_Translation_1: In both countries, mullahs, pundits, Taliban, Shiv Sena, RSS, etc. have been mobilized to oppose peace.
Turk_Translation_2: In both the countries, anti-peace elements Mullah, Pundit, Taliban, Shiv Sena, RSS etc. have been developed.
Turk_Translation_3: In both the countries, mullahs, pundits, Taliban, Shiv Sena, RSS etc. have been assembled to destroy peace.
Turk_Translation_4: The Mullahs, Pandits, Taliban, Shiv Sena, RSS, etc. present in both countries are against peace.

Urdu: اور دجالی قوتيں نہيں چاہتی کہ يہ خطہ امن کے ساتھ ترقی کرے چنانچہ ان ملکوں کو پتلی ناچ نچايا جا رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And the forces of tyranny do not want this region to prosper with peace, so they make these countries dance to their tune.
Turk_Translation_2: Invisible forces do not want this piece of land to progress with peace, and that is why they are made to face great trouble.
Turk_Translation_3: And the satanic forces do not want that this land may progress in peace so these countries are being exploited.
Turk_Translation_4: And the Dajjali powers do not wish to see this region progress in peace -- that is why these countries are made to dance to their tune.

Urdu: کيا آپ تصور کر سکتے ہيں کہ اتفاق کے ساتھ اس علاقہ پاکستان بھارت اور چین کا دنيا ميں کيا مقام ہوگا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Can you imagine what position this region would occupy in the world if Pakistan, India, and China were to come to an agreement?
Turk_Translation_2: Can you imagine if Pakistan, India and China stand united in this region then what will be their status in the world.
Turk_Translation_3: Can you imagine what would be the status of this area consisting of Pakistan, India and China if there is unity?
Turk_Translation_4: Can you imagine where Pakistan, India and China could stand in the world with peace in the region?

Urdu: پاکستان پر تو خدا کا عذاب ہے جو چوروں ڈاکوؤں اور رسہ گيروں کو بصورت ليڈر قوم پر مسلط کر ديا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The curse of God has fallen on Pakistan as thieves, plunderers, and blackmailers have been imposed on the country as leaders.
Turk_Translation_2: God's wrath has fallen on Pakistan that is why the nation is being forcibly ruled by thieves, dacoits and plunderers.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan is suffering God's wrath that is why thieves, robbers and cattle-lifters have been imposed as leaders on the nation.
Turk_Translation_4: It is Allah's wrath on Pakistan that thieves, dacoits and thugs have become the leaders of the community.

Urdu: اللہ کرے ہمارے ملک پاکستان پر کبھی بھی کوئی آنچ نہ آئے، آمين۔
Turk_Translation_1: May Allah always keep our country Pakistan safe. Amen.
Turk_Translation_2: May God keep our country Pakistan under protection all the time. God, please accept our prayer!
Turk_Translation_3: May our country Pakistan never come to any harm. Amen.
Turk_Translation_4: Allah willing, no harm should come to our country, Pakistan, amen;

Urdu: مگر صاحب ذرا آنکھيں کھول کر اپنے ارد گرد کے حالات اور زمينی حقائق کو ديکھيں تو آپ کو نظر آجائے گا کہ امريکی افواج کہاں تک پہنچ گئی ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But Sir, open your eyes and look around at the ground realities, and you will realize to what point the American forces have reached!
Turk_Translation_2: But Sahib! If you look at the circumstances and ground realities around you with open eyes, you will see how far the American armed forces have reached.
Turk_Translation_3: But my Lord, open your eyes and look at the conditions and the ground realities around you and you will be able to see where the American forces have reached.
Turk_Translation_4: but, if you open your eyes and analyze the situation and reality on the ground, you will see how far America has reached.

Urdu: اسکے علاوہ ملکی معاملات بھی درست نظر نہيں آرہے ہيں، سرحد، بلوچستان اور سندھ ميں کراچی کے حالات بھی آپ کے سامنے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Apart from this, the national situation also does not look right. The situation in NWFP, Balochistan, and Karachi in Sindh is right in front of you.
Turk_Translation_2: Apart from this, the affairs of the state are not looking better, either. The state of affairs in NWFP, Balochistan and Karachi in Sindh are open to you.
Turk_Translation_3: Moreover, the internal situation does not look right. The situation in Frontier, Baluchistan and Karachi in Sindh is in front of you.
Turk_Translation_4: Apart from that, even the internal situation is not very encouraging. The situations on the border and in Balochistan, Sindh and Karachi are clearly laid out before you.

Urdu: ايسی صورتحال ميں ملک کو ايک ايسے ليڈر کی ضرورت ہے جو ہميں ايک متحد قوم بنا سکے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In such circumstances, the country needs a leader who can unite us as a nation.
Turk_Translation_2: In these circumstances, the country needs a leader who can make us united as one nation.
Turk_Translation_3: In these conditions, the country needs a leader who can make us a united nation.
Turk_Translation_4: in such situations, the country needs a leader who can unite all of us into a community.

Urdu: يا اللہ ہم پہ رحم فرما۔
Turk_Translation_1: Oh Allah, have mercy on us.
Turk_Translation_2: Oh God, bless us with your kindness
Turk_Translation_3: O God, have mercy on us.
Turk_Translation_4: May Allah bless us all.

Urdu: ميرے خيال سے ايک آخری جنگ کے بغير کوئی چارہ نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: I think there is no option but a final war.
Turk_Translation_2: In my view, a last war is the need of the hour.
Turk_Translation_3: I think there is no solution other than one last war.
Turk_Translation_4: I think one last war is inevitable.

Urdu: بس بہت ہو چکا۔
Turk_Translation_1: Enough is enough.
Turk_Translation_2: It is too much.
Turk_Translation_3: Enough is enough.
Turk_Translation_4: Enough is enough.

Urdu: اب معاملہ آر يا پار ہو ہی جانا چاہيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: It should go this way or the other.
Turk_Translation_2: The matter should be decided now.
Turk_Translation_3: There should be a breakthrough now.
Turk_Translation_4: Now a decisive battle should be fought.

Urdu: يہ مذاکرات کے منافقانہ ڈھونگوں سے مسئلہ حل نہيں ہو گا۔
Turk_Translation_1: These hypocritical pretensions of having a dialog will not solve any problem.
Turk_Translation_2: This issue cannot be resolved with hypocrisy dialogue tricks.
Turk_Translation_3: The problem will not be settled by the hypocritical masquerades of talks.
Turk_Translation_4: These hypocritical bilateral talks will not solve the problem.

Urdu: نہ ہی ايک دوسرے کے ملکوں ميں چھوٹی موٹی دہشت گرديوں سے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Neither will small acts of terrorism in each other's countries.
Turk_Translation_2: And neither by launching minor terrorist acts in each other's countries.
Turk_Translation_3: Neither would it settle by minor terrorist activities in other countries.
Turk_Translation_4: Nor will we get any relief from these small-time terrorist activities in our countries.

Urdu: آخر يورپ کو بھی تو آخری عظيم جنگ لڑنے کے بعد ہی قرار آيا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: After all, Europe only calmed down after the last World War.
Turk_Translation_2: Even Europe, too, got satisfied, only after fighting final the final World War.
Turk_Translation_3: After all, Europe did not have peace until it fought the last world war.
Turk_Translation_4: Europe was relieved of it, but not before it had to fight the last world war.

Urdu: اور يہ جنگ عظيم نہ ہوئی ہوتی تو يہ سب بھی آج تک پاکستان اور بھارت کی طرح چخ چخ ہی کر رہے ہوتے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Had this great war not taken place, they would have been bickering like Pakistan and India do till today.
Turk_Translation_2: If the World War has not been fought, like India and Pakistan, they too would have still been involved in hue and cry.
Turk_Translation_3: If this world war had not taken place, these countries would have been squabbling like Pakistan and India till now.
Turk_Translation_4: If it were not for the last world war, those countries would still be quarreling like India and Pakistan.

Urdu: ہماری تقريباً ساری سياسی جماعتيں اس بات پر اتفاق کرتيں ہيں کہ ملک سے دہشتگردی اور فرقہ واريت کا خاتمہ ہونا چاہيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Almost all of our political parties agree that terrorism and sectarianism should end in the country.
Turk_Translation_2: Almost all our political parties have a consensus that terrorism and sectarianism should be eradicated from the country.
Turk_Translation_3: Almost all of our political parties agree that terrorism and sectarianism should be expunged from the country.
Turk_Translation_4: Almost all of our political parties agree to the fact that terrorism and communalism should end in the country.

Urdu: ليکن ہماری فوجی قيادت اس کام ميں مخلص نظر نہيں آتی، ايک طرف تو امريکہ اور يورپ کو يقين دہانی کرائی جاتی ہے کہ دہشتگردی کی اس جنگ ميں ہم آپ کے ساتھ ہيں دوسری طرف طالبان کی بھی خفيہ طور پر مدد کرتے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: But our armed forces leadership does not seem sincere about this. On the one hand, America and Europe are assured that we are with them in this war against terrorism. On the other, the Taliban are also secretly provided with help.
Turk_Translation_2: But our army leadership does not look honest in this, because on one hand, they assure America and Europe that we are with you in the fight against terrorism, whereas on the other hand, they also secretly support the Taliban.
Turk_Translation_3: But our military leadership does not seem sincere in this effort. On the one hand, America and Europe are ensured that we are with them in this war on terrorism and on the other hand, we secretly help the Taliban as well.
Turk_Translation_4: But our army leadership does not seem to be very sincere about it. On the one hand, America and Europe have promised a helping hand in the battle against terrorism, while on the other hand, they even help the Taliban secretly.

Urdu: ہميں اب سوچنا ہے اور اپنی سمت کا تعين کرنا اور صرف ايک کی راہ کا انتخاب کرنا ہے، شکريہ
Turk_Translation_1: Now we have to think and make a decision about our direction and choose only one way. Thanks.
Turk_Translation_2: We have to think now and determine our direction and have to choose only one path, thanks
Turk_Translation_3: We have to think now, and determine our orientation and choose only one path. Thanks.
Turk_Translation_4: We should ponder it and decide our path and follow it, thanks.

Urdu: اس بات میں کوئی شک نہیں ہے کہ جماعت الدعوہ میں شامل اکثریت لشکر طیبہ کے ان کارکنوں ہی کی ہے جو کہ لشکر طیبہ کے کالعدم قرار دئے جانے کے بعد جماعت الدعوہ پاکستان کے نام سے قائم جماعت میں شامل ہو گئے تھے،
Turk_Translation_1: There is no doubt that a majority of the active members of Lashkar-e-Tayaba joined Jamiat-ud-Daawa after Lashkar-e-Tayaba was banned.
Turk_Translation_2: There is no doubt that a great majority in Jamaat-ud-Dawa consists of those who were formerly members of Lashkar-e-Taiba and after its banning, they entered the other organization created with the name of Jamaat-ud-Dawa Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: There is no doubt that the majority of the members of Jama'at-ud-Da'wah consist of those members of Lashkar-e-Taiba who joined this new party after Lashkar-e-Taiba was declared a banned outfit;
Turk_Translation_4: There is no doubt that most of the members of Jamat-ud-dawa are comprised of Lashkar-e-Taiba cadets who joined the newly formed Jamat-ud-dawa after the Pakistani government banned Lashkar-e-Taiba.

Urdu: تاہم اس کے بعد ان کارکنوں نے امدادی کاموں کو ترجیح دی اور اب بھارت کے پُر زور اصرار پر اقوام متحدہ نے اسے بھی کالعدم قرار دے دیا ہے اور حکومت پاکستان بھی ان کے خلاف کریک ڈاؤن جاری رکھے ہوئے ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: After that these activists gave priority to providing aid, and on the strong insistence of India, the United Nations has banned it, too, and the Pakistani Government has also continued to crackdown against them.
Turk_Translation_2: However, after this, its members preferred doing relief work, and now, upon India's continued pressure, the United Nations has banned it too, and the government of Pakistan is also continuing a crackdown against this organization.
Turk_Translation_3: however, its activists have since then preferred to do aid work. And now the United Nations has declared it a banned group on strong insistence by India and the government of Pakistan is also continuing its crackdown against them.
Turk_Translation_4: However, even though these cadets prefer social work, under strong pressure from India the United Nations also banned the group and the Pakistani government initiated crackdowns against them.

Urdu: میرے خیال میں اگر یہ جہادی گروپس مذہبی انتہا پسندی چھوڑ کر دینی اور امدادی سرگرمیاں جاری رکھیں تو زیادہ بہتر۔
Turk_Translation_1: I think it would be much better if these Jihadi groups abandon religious extremism and continue with religious and welfare activities.
Turk_Translation_2: In my opinion, all these fighter groups, instead of pursuing religious extremism, if carry on religious and relief activities that would be far better.
Turk_Translation_3: I think these jihadist groups had better quit extremism and carry on with religious and aid work.
Turk_Translation_4: I think these Jihadi groups should leave religious fundamentalism alone and start focusing more on religious and charitable activities - the sooner, the better.

Urdu: پاکستان ميں موجود دہشتگر تنظيميں جنہوں نے جہاد کے نام پر پيشہ وارانہ جرائم پيشہ لوگ پال رکھے ہيں يہ اور ان ملاوؤں کے ’بڑے‘ وہی ہيں جو پاکستان کو پليدستان اور جانے کيا کيا کہتے رہے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: The terrorist organizations present in Pakistan that have been sustaining criminals in the name of Jihad, they and the leaders of these Mullahs are the same people who call Pakistan land of the filthy and other bad names.
Turk_Translation_2: The terrorist organizations active in Pakistan who patronize criminals in the name of jihad, they and the 'leaders' of these Mullas have been giving Pakistan the name of Paledistan and many more names.
Turk_Translation_3: The terrorist organizations based in Pakistan who have employed professional criminals in the name of religion and - senior mullahs are the very people who call Pakistan as the land of the defiled and God knows what.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan's terrorist outfits, which have recruited criminals in the name of Jihad, they and the 'bigwigs' of these Mullahs are the very same people who would call Pakistan a land of impurity and so forth.

Urdu: اب يہ پاکستان کو تباہ کرنے ميں کوئی کسر نہيں چھوڑ رہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now they are not leaving any stone unturned to destroy Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Now they are leaving no stone unturned to destroy Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: Now they are leaving no stone unturned in destroying Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: Now they are leaving no stone unturned to destroy Pakistan.

Urdu: اصل ميں يہ مسلمان تو کيا انسان کہلوانے کے حقدار نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Actually, far from being called Muslims, they do not deserve even to be called humans.
Turk_Translation_2: In fact, not to talk of Muslims, they cannot even be called humans.
Turk_Translation_3: In fact, leave aside Muslims, they can't even be called human beings.
Turk_Translation_4: Forget about Muslim- they are not even fit to be called a human being, actually.

Urdu: پاکستان کو ان شرپسندوں سے پاک کیے بغير ملکی سلامتی خطرہ ميں رہےگي۔
Turk_Translation_1: Without ridding Pakistan of these trouble-makers, national security is in danger.
Turk_Translation_2: Without cleaning out these wicked people from Pakistan, the safety of the country will be in danger.
Turk_Translation_3: Without cleansing Pakistan of these mischief-mongers, national security will remain in danger.
Turk_Translation_4: The country will remain in danger until we rid Pakistan of these miscreants.

Urdu: کيا اب بھی يہ سوچنے کی گنجائش ہے کہ ان مفسدوں پر پابندی لگائی جائے کہ نہ؟
Turk_Translation_1: Is there still a need to think about whether or not these conflict instigators should be banned?
Turk_Translation_2: Do we still need to think whether a ban should be imposed on these seditious people or not?
Turk_Translation_3: Is it still debatable whether these malignant elements should be banned or not?
Turk_Translation_4: Does it still require more thinking to ban these rioters?

Urdu: متشدد ملاوؤں کی اس دنيا ميں کہيں جگہ نہيں جنکا کام ہی قتل کرانا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: There is no place in the world for such violent Mullahs whose job is only to kill.
Turk_Translation_2: There is no place for violent Mullas in this world, whose only role is killing.
Turk_Translation_3: There is no room for the violent mullahs in this world as their only job is to get the others killed.
Turk_Translation_4: The violent Mullahs whose only job is to kill will not get a place in this world.

Urdu: اس خبر سے دل چور چور ہو رہا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This is heart-breaking news.
Turk_Translation_2: This news is breaking the heart into pieces.
Turk_Translation_3: This news has crushed the heart.
Turk_Translation_4: My heart is breaking at this news.

Urdu: یہ کیسی دنیا ہے جہاں اللہ کے دین اسلام کہ ایک اہم رکن کا آج نام بھی لینے والے کے لیے اس دنیا میں جینا مشکل ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: What a world this is that makes life miserable for someone who invokes an important principle of Islam, the religion of Allah.
Turk_Translation_2: What type of world is this, where a person who only mentions the name of an important member of Islamic religion gets into trouble?
Turk_Translation_3: What kind of world is this where those who just pronounce the name of one of the fundamental principles of God's religion Islam find life difficult.
Turk_Translation_4: What kind of a world is this, where a man who breathes in the name of Islam can't live in this world peacefully?

Urdu: غیر مسلم تو مسلمان کو مار سکتے ہیں لیکن اگر مسلم بدلہ لینے کی کوشش بھی کرے تو سارے غیر مسلم دنیا کے ساتھ ساتھ اپنے سارے منافق حکمران بھی مل کر سچے اور مخلص دین کا درد رکھنے والوں کے ساتھ یہی سلوک کرتے ہیں جو آج ہمارے عظیم لیڈر حافظ سعید کے ساتھ کر رہے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Non-Muslims can kill Muslims, but if Muslims even try to take revenge, then the whole non-Muslim world together with our hypocrite leaders treats those who are honest and selfless and who care for the religion as they are treating our great leader Hafiz Saeed today!
Turk_Translation_2: Non-Muslims can kill Muslims, but if a Muslim just tries to even the score, then the non-Muslim world together with our insincere leaders badly treat those truthful, sincere and faithful people who have pain in their hearts for divine religion, and today they are giving the same treatment to our great leader Hafiz Saeed.
Turk_Translation_3: Non-Muslims can kill the Muslims but if a Muslim tries to exact revenge, all the non-Muslims of the world along with all our hypocritical rulers join forces to treat the true and the sincere servants of the religion in the same fashion as they are doing today with our great leader Hafiz Muhammad Saeed.
Turk_Translation_4: Non-Muslims can kill Muslims, but if a Muslim even tries to exact revenge, the entire non-Muslim world unites with our treacherous rulers and behaves like they are behaving with our great leader Hafiz Saeed, with righteous Muslim brethren.

Urdu: ممبئی حملوں کی پاداش میں بھارت۔
Turk_Translation_1: India, as a consequence of the Mumbai attacks,
Turk_Translation_2: As a result of the Mumbai attacks

Turk_Translation_4: Because of the Mumbai terrorist attacks, Indian-

Turk_Translation_1: India has constantly held the militant and non-militant groups in Pakistan accountable.

Turk_Translation_1: The return of the relations to normality is being attributed to the action that was taken against these groups.

Turk_Translation_1: Meanwhile, Indian security organizations have directly accused Lashkar-e-Tayaba for being the perpetrator of the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_2: Whereas the Indian security agencies have held Lashkar-e-Taiba directly responsible for the Mumbai attacks,

Turk_Translation_1: In relation to this, Jamiat-ud-Daawa's name is also being brought up again and again.

Turk_Translation_2: This is not the first time that a terrorist activity in India turned the relationships between two countries tense.

Turk_Translation_2: As a result of the attack on Indian Parliament in December 2001, these two neighboring countries moved close to the brink of war.
Turk_Translation_3: In December 2001, these two neighboring countries reached on the brink of war after an attack on the Indian parliament.
Turk_Translation_4: In December 2001, after the attack on the Indian parliament, the two countries were on the brink of war.

Turk_Translation_1: Following this, in 2002, Lashkar-e-Tayaba was banned and its name was added to the list of terrorist groups.

Turk_Translation_4: After that, in 2002, Lashkar-e-Taiba was banned and put on the list of terror groups.

Turk_Translation_1: Now there is a demand to ban Jamiat-ud-Daawa, which, according to security analysts, is the new face of Lashkar-e-Tayaba.

Turk_Translation_1: Under such conditions, if we as a nation do not display unity and harmony, then remember that if Bangladesh could be created, then much more can happen.

Turk_Translation_1: One cannot condemn terrorist attacks enough whether they take place in Mumbai's hotel, or in Islamabad's Marriot hotel, or in Palestine.
Turk_Translation_2: To whatever extent the terrorist attacks are condemned is not enough; whether these are attacks in Mumbai, the Islamabad Marriot Hotel or in Palestine.

Turk_Translation_1: Similarly, terrorists should be destroyed, regardless of where they are from - Pakistan, India, America, or Israel.

Turk_Translation_1: Now the question arises why is the world, including the Pakistani government, silent in the face of terrorist attacks in Pakistan everyday, in which hundreds of people lose their lives?

Urdu: `بی بی سی کے مطابق جہاں اقوامِ متحدہ کی سلامتی کونسل ( کی ايک کميٹي) نے جماعت الدعوہ پر پابندی عائد کر دی ہے، وہاں ملک صاحب کا کہنا ہے کہ ہم نے پابندی عائد نہيں کی اور بہت غور و خوض کے بعد ہی ايسا کيا جاۓ گاـ
Turk_Translation_1: According to the BBC, while (a committee of) the United Nations Security Council has put a ban on Jamiat-ud-Daawa, Mr. Malik says that we have not enforced a ban yet, and it will only be done after thorough deliberation.
Turk_Translation_2: According to BBC, (a committee of) the Security Council of the United Nations has imposed a ban on Jamaat Al-Dawa, whereas Mr. Malik says we have not imposed any ban and it will be done only after much deliberation.
Turk_Translation_3: According to BBC, as (a committee of) the Security Council of the United Nations has banned Jama'at-ud-Da'wah, Mr. Malik said that they had not banned it and would do so only after serious consideration.
Turk_Translation_4: According to the BBC, on the one hand, when a committee of the United Nations Security Council had banned Jamat-ud-dawa, Mr. Malik is saying that we have not banned them and we had done so after a lots of thinking and consideration.

Urdu: يہی نہيں، بی بی سی ہی کے مطابق ملک صاحب موصوف نے اس تاثر کو بھی پوری شدت کے ساتھ غلط قرار ديا ہے کہ دہشت گردوں کی گرفتارياں ’کسی کے کہنے پر‘ عمل ميں لائی جا رہی ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Not just this, according to the BBC, Mr. Malik has also very forcefully called this impression wrong that the arrests of terrorists are being made "on someone's demand."
Turk_Translation_2: In addition to this, according to BBC, Mr. Malik has also rejected this impression with full force that the arrests of terrorist groups are being carried out 'on the advice of someone'.
Turk_Translation_3: Not only this, according to BBC His Highness Mr. Malik has also dismissed this impression vehemently that the arrests of the terrorists are being carried out 'on someone's orders'.
Turk_Translation_4: Not only this, according to the BBC: Mr Malik had rejected this impression with complete severity that terrorists are not being arrested on anyone's insistence (order).

Urdu: نوآباديات کا دور بظاہر نظرنہيں آتا۔
Turk_Translation_1: It doesn't seem to be a period of colonization.
Turk_Translation_2: Colonial regime is apparently not seen.
Turk_Translation_3: Apparently the colonial period is over.
Turk_Translation_4: Apparently, this is no time of colonization.

Urdu: اگر لوگوں کو انصاف کی توقع ہو يا اتحادی آزاد عدليہ کے نفاذ پر زور ديں جمہوري اداروں کا احترام کريں اور کسی آمر يا فوجی کی مدد نہ کريں تو تيسری دنيا بشمول پاکستان ميں امن قائم ہوگا اور جو اتحاديوں کو شاید قبول نہیں ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: If people expect justice, or the allies insist on an independent judiciary and respect democratic institutions, and do not assist any dictator or army, peace will be established in Third World Pakistan, which might not be acceptable to the allies.
Turk_Translation_2: If the people become hopeful of getting justice or the allies emphasize the functioning of an independent judiciary, respect the democratic institutions and extend no help to a dictator or soldier, then there will be peace in the third world, including Pakistan, but this is perhaps unacceptable to the allies.
Turk_Translation_3: If the people expect to find justice or the allies press for independent judiciary, respect the democratic institutions and do not support a dictator or military ruler, peace will be established in the third world including Pakistan which is probably not acceptable to the allies.
Turk_Translation_4: If people expect justice, or if this alliance insists on implementing the rule of law, respecting democratic institutions and not helping any dictator or an army, only then there will be peace in the third world, including Pakistan, and probably this will not be acceptable to the alliance.

Urdu: پاکستان تو ويسے ہی يورپی اور امريکی مقاصد کی اطاعت ميں لگا رہتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan is working anyway to achieve the aims of Europe and America.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan is always for no reason busy in pursuit of submission to the European and American objectives.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan, in any case, remains subservient to American and European ambitions.
Turk_Translation_4: As it is, Pakistan is busy fulfilling the objectives of America and Europe.

Urdu: يہ پاکستان کي ايک غالب آبادی کی مخالفت کے باوجود کروايا جاتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: This in spite of the opposition of a majority of the population of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Despite the opposition of a dominant population size, this has to be practiced.
Turk_Translation_3: This is done in spite of opposition by a large majority of the people of Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: This happens when the majority of Pakistan population is against it.

Urdu: اور يہ اس بات کو مزيد مخالف جزبات کو ابھارتا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And this fuels more feelings against it.
Turk_Translation_2: And this thing further raises anti emotions.
Turk_Translation_3: And this further ignites opposing sentiments.
Turk_Translation_4: And this gives air to conflicting feelings.

Urdu: اگر امريکی اور اس کے اتحادی جمہوريت پر اعتماد رکھتے ہيں تو نوآبادی والے طرز عمل کو چھوڑ کر رياست کی خودمختاری کا احترام کرتے ہوئےاس خطے سے چلا جاۓ۔
Turk_Translation_1: If America and its allies have confidence in democracy, they should abandon the policy of a colonizer, respect the country's sovereignty, and go away from the region.
Turk_Translation_2: If America and its allies believe in democracy, then they should give up the colonial practice and respect the sovereignty of state they should leave this region.
Turk_Translation_3: If America and its allies have faith in democracy, they should shun the colonial practices and leave the area by showing respect to the sovereignty of the state.
Turk_Translation_4: If America and its allies believe in democracy, then they should denounce the colonizing pattern and immediately leave this region.

Urdu: پاکستان ميں اتنی صلاحيت ہے کہ وہ خود مسلحہ يا غير مسلحہ کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Pakistan has the capability to arm or disarm itself.
Turk_Translation_2: Pakistan poses this much capability to arm or disarm itself.
Turk_Translation_3: Pakistan has enough ability to arm or disarm.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan has the capacity to arm or disarm itself.

Urdu: پاکستان کے زیر انتظام کشمیر میں سکیورٹی فورسز نے کالعدم لشکر طیبہ کے ایک مبینہ کیمپ پر چھاپہ مارا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Security forces raided an alleged camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Tayaba in the Pakistani controlled area of Kashmir.
Turk_Translation_2: The security forces in Pakistani-controlled Kashmir raided a camp allegedly linked with the banned Lashkar-e-Taiba.
Turk_Translation_3: The security forces have raided an alleged camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Taiba in Pakistani administered Kashmir.
Turk_Translation_4: Security forces raided an alleged camp of banned group Lashkar-e-Taiba in Pakistan-occupied Kashmir.

Urdu: ممبئی حملوں کے بعد سے پاکستان پر دباؤ بڑھ رہا ہے کہ وہ شدت پسند تنظیموں کے خلاف کارروائی تیز کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: After the Mumbai attacks, increasing pressure is being placed on Pakistan to speed up its actions against extremist organizations.
Turk_Translation_2: After the Mumbai attacks, pressure is mounting on Pakistan to expedite action against terrorist outfits.
Turk_Translation_3: After the Mumbai attacks, pressure is increasing on Pakistan to speed up the action against extremist organizations.
Turk_Translation_4: Pakistan is under immense pressure to act against fundamentalist organizations after the Mumbai terror attacks.

Urdu: ہندوستان کا الزام ہے کہ ممبئی کے حملوں میں لشکر طیبہ کا ہاتھ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: India accuses Lashkar-e-Tayaba of involvement in the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_2: India alleges that Lashkar-e-Taiba is involved in the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_3: India alleges that Lashkar-e-Taiba is involved in Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_4: India believes that Lashkar-e-Taiba is behind the Mumbai attacks.

Urdu: امریکی وزیرخارجہ کونڈو لیزا رائس نے پاکستانی قیادت سے کہا ہے کہ ممبئی حملوں کے ذمہ داروں کے خلاف فوری اور شفاف کارروائی کا عملی مظاہرہ ہونا چاہیے۔
Turk_Translation_1: American foreign secretary Condoleeza Rice has urged the Pakistani leadership to take practical steps for an immediate and transparent action against the perpetrators of the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_2: The American Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice has asked Pakistani leadership to take immediate and transparent, practical actions against those responsible for the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_3: American Secretary of State, Condoleezza Rice, has asked the Pakistani leadership to conduct immediate and transparent action against those responsible for the Mumbai attacks.
Turk_Translation_4: American Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice told Pakistani authorities to take quick action against those who are responsible for the Mumbai attacks, and the action should be practically transparent.

Urdu: ان کا کہنا ہے بلاشبہ ممبئی پر حملہ کرنےوالے شدت پسندوں نے پاکستانی سرزمین استعمال کی۔
Turk_Translation_1: They say that the extremists who attacked Mumbai undoubtedly used Pakistani territory.
Turk_Translation_2: She says that there is no doubt that the terrorists who attacked Mumbai used Pakistani soil.
Turk_Translation_3: She said that there was no doubt that the extremists who carried out the Mumbai attacks had used Pakistani territory.
Turk_Translation_4: She said that the Mumbai attackers had definitely used Pakistani soil.

Urdu: اسی دوران پشاور میں حکام کا کہنا ہے کہ افغانستان میں تعینات اتحادی افواج کو سامان لے جانے والے ٹرکوں کے ایک اور اڈے کو نامعلوم مسلح افراد نے آگ لگائی گئی ہے جس سے پچاس سے زائد ٹرک تباہ ہوگئے ہیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Meanwhile, authorities in Peshawar say that another center for the trucks that take goods to the allied forces in Afghanistan was destroyed by fire by unknown armed men, destroying more than fifty trucks.
Turk_Translation_2: Meanwhile, authorities in Peshawar said that unknown armed men burned down another depot of trucks providing supply to allied forces in Afghanistan, and this resulted in the destruction of more than 50 trucks.
Turk_Translation_3: Meanwhile, authorities in Peshawar have said that another trucking station used for supplying goods to the Allied forces in Afghanistan has been set on fire by unknown armed men. Fifty trucks have been destroyed in this incident.
Turk_Translation_4: Meanwhile, officials in Peshawar said that unidentified armed individuals attacked trucks that were carrying supplies for allied forces deployed in Afghanistan. Fifty trucks were damaged.

Urdu: پشاور میں اڑتالیس گھنٹے کے دوران نیٹو اور امریکی رسد پر یہ دوسرا حملہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the past 48 hours, this is the second attack on the NATO and American supplies in Peshawar.
Turk_Translation_2: In Peshawar, within the last 48 hours, this is the second attack on the NATO and American supply line.
Turk_Translation_3: This is the second attack on NATO and the American forces' supply in Peshawar during the last 48 hours.
Turk_Translation_4: In Peshawar, this is the second attack in the past 48 hours on NATO and American supply trucks.

Urdu: اس دوران پاکسان نے کالعدم لشکر طیبہ کے ایک مبینہ کیمپ پر چھاپہ مارا ہے اور اس سے پہلے بھی کراچی سے قبائلی علاقوں تک مسلح گروہوں کو غیر مسلح کرنے کی کئی کوششیں کی گئی ہیں جن میں اسلحہ واپس کرنے والوں کو معاوضہ دینے اور کوئی کارروائی نے کرنے کی یقین دہانی تک کی گئی۔
Turk_Translation_1: In the meantime, Pakistan has raided an alleged camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Tayaba. Efforts were made even before this to disarm the armed groups from Karachi to the tribal areas, and those who surrendered their arms were assured that compensation would be given to them and that no action would be taken against them.
Turk_Translation_2: Meanwhile, Pakistan raided a camp of the banned Lashkar-e-Taiba. Before this, attempts have been made to disarm the armed groups from Karachi to tribal areas. They were assured of payment and no action in return for ammunition.
Turk_Translation_3: Meanwhile, Pakistan has conducted a raid on an alleged camp of Lashkar-e-Taiba. Prior to this, many efforts have been made to unarm the armed groups from Karachi to the tribal areas in which those who return the arms have been promised bounty and amnesty in return.
Turk_Translation_4: In the meantime, Pakistan attacked an alleged camp run by the banned group Lashkar-e-Taiba. Earlier, an effort was made to disarm the armed groups of Karachi tribals. Compensation was offered to those who surrendered, and a promise was made that no action would be taken against them.

Urdu: حالات بتاتے ہیں کہ جنرل ضیا الحق کے دور میں سابق سوویت یونین کی افغان مداخلت اور اس کی امریکی سعودی فنڈنگ سے شروع ہونے والی مزاحمت کے نتیجے میں جنم لینے والے مسلح گروپوں کو ختم کر کے پاکستان کو انیس سو اسی سے پہلے جیسے ماحول واپس لے جانے کو کوششیں کامیاب نہیں ہوئیں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Events tell us that the former Soviet Union's intervention in Afghanistan during General Zia-ul-Haq's period, and efforts to eliminate the armed groups that were born as a result of the resistance to it with America-Saudi funding, to take Pakistan to the state it was in before 1980, were not successful.
Turk_Translation_2: The circumstances indicate that the Soviet intervention in Afghanistan during General Zia-ul-Haq's regime and resistance thereof by the armed groups formed by funding from America and Saudi Arabia cannot be eliminated now, and any efforts to take Pakistan back to the pre-nineteen hundred & eighty position by trying to do this have not been successful.
Turk_Translation_3: The conditions reveal that the attempts to take Pakistan back to pre-nineteen hundred & eighty position by dismantling the armed groups that were formed during general Zia-ul-Haq's era as a result of former Soviet Union's intervention into Afghanistan and the consequent Saudi and American funded resistance, have not succeeded.
Turk_Translation_4: The situation dictates that Pakistan could not attain a pre-80s General Zia-ul-haq regime type of situation by disarming those who are a product of a conflict created by the former Soviet Union's invasion of Afghanistan and America-Saudi funded armed groups.

Turk_Translation_3: The question is: Does Pakistan want to do so?
Turk_Translation_4: The question is whether or not Pakistan wants to do it.

Turk_Translation_1: I have only one question for all the flag-bearers of humanity:
Turk_Translation_2: I have only one question from all the flag holders of humanity:
Turk_Translation_3: I have only one question to all the torchbearers of humanity:
Turk_Translation_4: : I have only one question to the flag-bearers of humanity:

Urdu: اگر آپ انکے بچے ماروگے تو وہ وہ آپ کے واسطے ہار لے کر آجائیں، يہ ناممکن ہے
Turk_Translation_1: If you kill their children, will they welcome you with garlands for you? This is impossible.
Turk_Translation_2: If you kill their children and in turn expect them to come to you with open arms is impossible
Turk_Translation_3: It is impossible that you kill their children and they welcome you with garlands
Turk_Translation_4: If you kill their children, would they bring garlands to you? This is impossible.

Turk_Translation_1: Saeed, Multan.
Turk_Translation_2: Saeed, Multan
Turk_Translation_3: Saeed, Multan
Turk_Translation_4: Saeed, Multan

Urdu: اور ميرا آپ سے سوال کہ علوم اسلامی سے ليکر علوم مشرق و مغرب تک، کہيں کوئی منطق، دليل اور فلسفہ امريکی حملے کے بدلے بے گناہ عوام بشمول نمازي، مزدور اور نوکری پيشہ غريب ملازمين کے قتل کی اجازت ديتا ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: And my question to you is do the teachings of Islam, or those of the East or West give any logic, philosophy, or reasoning that approves of the killing of innocent citizens, including people who are praying, laborers, and low-income workers, and employees, as a consequence of American attacks?
Turk_Translation_2: And my question is, does all wisdom ranging from Islamic to Eastern and Western, any logic, rational and philosophy gives permission to kill innocent public, including those who pray, laborers and poor employees, only to get the revenge of American strikes.
Turk_Translation_3: And my question to you is that do any system of knowledge ranging from Islamic to eastern and western, any logic, argument or philosophy sanction the murders of innocent prayer-goers, laborers, and poor working class servants in response to the American attacks?
Turk_Translation_4: And my question to you is, right from Islamic teachings to that of western and eastern religions, no logic, argument or philosophy can justify the killings of innocent people, including Namazis, laborers and poor workers, by American assault.

Urdu: اور اگر جواب نہ ميں ہے تو آپ کو اپنے نقطۂ نظر کی اصلاح کی اشد ضرورت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: And if there is no answer, then you have a dire need to correct your point of view.
Turk_Translation_2: If the answer is no, then there is a strong need to get your point of view rectified.
Turk_Translation_3: And if the answer is in negative, you are in dire need of amending your point of view.
Turk_Translation_4: And if your answer is negative, then you should check on your point of view- you are required to reform.

Urdu: لوگوں کو مسلح کيا گيا اس وقت يہ خدشہ تھا کہ روس افغانستان کے بعد پاکستان کارخ کرے گات لہذا ان لوگوں کو مسلح کيا گيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: At the time when people were given arms, it was feared that Russia, after Afghanistan, would turn its attention to Pakistan; therefore people were provided the arms.
Turk_Translation_2: The people were given arms because of the concern that Russia after Afghanistan would move towards Pakistan and, therefore, these people were given arms.
Turk_Translation_3: People were armed. At the time there was the threat that after conquering Afghanistan, Russia would target Pakistan. Therefore, these people were armed.
Turk_Translation_4: People were armed. At that point in time, it was believed that Russia could move into Pakistan after Afghanistan; therefore, people were armed.

Urdu: اب جب يہ خدشہ ہے کہ امريکہ افنستان کے راستے پاکستان پر چڑھ دوڑے گا جس کا موجودہ امريکی صدر اپنی صدارتی مہم ميں برملا اظہار کر چکے ہيں تو ہم ان لوگوں کو کيوں غير مسلح کريں؟
Turk_Translation_1: Now that we suspect America to attack Pakistan from Afghanistan, which the present American president has spoken about during his presidential campaign, why then should we disarm these people?
Turk_Translation_2: Now, when there is a concern that America will attack Pakistan through Afghanistan - and this has been openly indicated by the existing American President in his presidential election campaign - then why should we disarm these people?
Turk_Translation_3: Now when there is the danger that America would attack Pakistan via Afghanistan, the current American President has expressed this openly during his presidential campaign, so why should we disarm these people?
Turk_Translation_4: Now when there is a serious concern that America could attack Pakistan through Afghanistan, which was time and again expressed by the currentAmerican president during his election campaign, why should we disarm them?

Urdu: صرف اسليے تاکہ امريکہ يا بھارت کو پاکستانی فوج کو زير کرنے کے بعد کسی قسم کی عوامی مزاحمت کا سامنا نہ کرنا پڑے؟
Turk_Translation_1: So that America or India, after subduing the Pakistani armed forces, do not have to face any kind of resistance from the people?
Turk_Translation_2: Only for the reason that after overpowering the Pakistan army, America or India do not have to face public resistance of any type.
Turk_Translation_3: Only to ensure that after conquering the Pakistan army, America or India would not have to face any public resistance?
Turk_Translation_4: Only because America should not face a backlash from them after defeating India and Pakistan?

Urdu: ہاں اگر ان ميں سے کوئی کسی تخريبی کارروائی ميں ملوث ہو تو پاکستان صرف اس کے خلاف کارروائی کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: However if anyone is involved in oppressive activities, Pakistan should take an action against them only.
Turk_Translation_2: Yes, if any one among them is found involved in terrorist activities, only Pakistan should take action against him.
Turk_Translation_3: True, if anyone of them is found involved in a terrorist activity, only Pakistan should take action against him.
Turk_Translation_4: But if someone is involved in destructive activities, Pakistan should deal with them in a tough manner.

Urdu: ليکن افسوس يہ ہے حکومت کا لشکر طيبہ کے دوالے ہوجانا نے بھارت کی بات کو صحيح قرار دے ديا ہے کہ اس ميں پاکستان ملوث ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Regretfully, the government's seizing of Lashkar-e-Tayaba has proven India right about Pakistan being involved in this affair.
Turk_Translation_2: But sorry to say that the government's action against Lashkar-e-Taiba made the Indian point of view correct that Pakistan is involved in this.
Turk_Translation_3: But the sad aspect of it is that government's action against Lashkar-e-Taiba has verified Indian claims that Pakistan is involved in it.
Turk_Translation_4: By being on Lashkar-e-Taiba's side, the government of Pakistan had proved India right that Pakistan is involved in this. This is very disappointing.

Urdu: نجيب الرحمان سائکو، *لاہور* [P@KI$T@N]
Turk_Translation_1: *Najeeb-ur-Rehman Saiko*, Lahore, Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: Najeeb-ur-Rehman Sieko, Lahore [P@KI$T@N]
Turk_Translation_3: Najeeb-ur-Rehman Psycho, *Lahore [P@KI$T@N] *
Turk_Translation_4: Najeeburrehman Saiko, Lahore, Pakistan.

Urdu: اگر يہ مان ليا جائے کہ لشکر طيبہ ملوث ہے تب بھی پاکستان حکومت کو الزام دينا صحيح نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Even if it is accepted that Lashkar-e-Tayaba is involved, it is not right to blame Pakistan's Government.
Turk_Translation_2: If it is accepted that Lashkar-e-Taiba in involved, then implicating the Pakistan government is also incorrect.
Turk_Translation_3: Even if it is accepted that Lashkar-e-Taiba is involved, blaming Pakistan government is not right.
Turk_Translation_4: Even if we accept that Lashkar-e-Taiba was involved, it is not right to blame the Pakistan government for that.

Urdu: اور ايک سوال يہ بھی کہ کيا ان دہشتگردوں کو کسی سرکاری يا غير سرکاري بھارتی اہلکار کی مدد حاصل نہيں تھي؟
Turk_Translation_1: And another question is did these terrorists not have the support of some government or non-government officer in India?
Turk_Translation_2: Another question is whether these terrorists were supported by any governmental or non-governmental employee of India?
Turk_Translation_3: And this question too: did these terrorists not have the support of some official or unofficial Indian agent?
Turk_Translation_4: And there is also a question whether these terrorists were not supported by some government or non-government recruits of India or not.

Urdu: کيا دہشتگرد صرف پاکستان ميں پيدا يا تيار ہوتے ہيں اور بھارت اور دنيا کے ديگر ممالک ميں تيار نہيں ہوتے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Are terrorists born or trained only in Pakistan and not in India, or any other countries of the world?
Turk_Translation_2: And whether terrorists are only born or created in Pakistan and not created in India and other countries of the world?
Turk_Translation_3: Are the terrorists produced and trained only in Pakistan and are not trained in India and the other countries of the world?
Turk_Translation_4: Are terrorists only born in Pakistan and not in India and other parts of the world?

Urdu: جہاں تک لشکر طيبہ کا تعلق ہے حاليہ دہشت گردی کا اس سے کوئی تعلق نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: As far as Lashkar-e-Tayaba is concerned, it has got nothing to do with the recent acts of terrorism.
Turk_Translation_2: As far Lashkar-e-Taiba is concerned, recent terrorist activities have no linkages with them.
Turk_Translation_3: As far as Lashkar-e-Taiba is concerned, it has no link with the recent terrorism.
Turk_Translation_4: As far as Lashkar-e-Taiba is concerned, it has no connection in the recent terror attacks.

Urdu: يہ بات ياد رکھنے کی ہے کہ حافظ سعيد ہی وہ پہلے ’جہادی رہنما‘ تھے جنہوں نے طالبان کی کارروئيوں کو ’فتنہ‘ قرار ديا تھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: A point to remember is that it was Hafiz Saeed who was the first "Jihadi leader" to label the acts of the Taliban as "chaos."
Turk_Translation_2: The thing that must be kept in mind is that Hafiz Saeed was the first 'jihadi leader' who termed the activities of the Taliban a 'sedition'.
Turk_Translation_3: It is worth remembering that Hafiz Saeed was the first 'jihadist leader' who declared the Taliban activities as 'seditious'.
Turk_Translation_4: It is to be remembered that Hafiz Saeed was the first 'Jihadi Leader' who declared Taliban's activities as a 'Fitnah'.

Urdu: مجھے پختہ يقين ہے کہ طالبان کی شورش امريکی منصوبوں کا جزو لانيفک ہے لہذا ہراس شخص اورگروہ کو راستے سے ہٹانا ضروری ہے جو کسی بھی حوالے سے طالبان کو چيلنج کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: I am completely sure that the Taliban's invasion is [a part of] American plans. Therefore, it is necessary to remove every person and group from the way who should challenge the Taliban in any way.
Turk_Translation_2: I have a strong belief that Taliban activities are an integral part of the American planning, and any person or group who challenges the Taliban on any pretext, it becomes essential for them to clear him from their way.
Turk_Translation_3: I firmly believe that the Taliban insurgence is a vital part of American strategy so every person or group who opposes Taliban in any way will have to be removed from the scene.
Turk_Translation_4: I firmly believe that the tumult of the Taliban is an essential element of American plans, and therefore it is necessary to remove all such people and organizations from the way who, in any capacity, can challenge the authority of the Taliban.

Urdu: پوری قوم کے تعاون کے باوجود بھارتی دباؤ ميں آ کر لشکر کے خلاف کارروائی کرنا زردری اينڈ کو کی گبراہٹ اور چاپلوس طبعيت کی طرف اشارہ ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Despite the consensus of the whole nation, under pressure from India carrying out an action against Lashkar reflects the nervous and servile nature of Zardari and company.
Turk_Translation_2: Despite support from the whole nation, taking action against Lashkar under Indian pressure indicates Zardari and Company's anxiety and their sycophant nature.
Turk_Translation_3: Despite co-operation from all the nation, the action against Lashkar under Indian pressure is an indication of the nervousness and sycophantic disposition of Zardari & Co.
Turk_Translation_4: Even after support from the entire nation, Zardari and company's action, under India's pressure against Lashkar, indicates their panic and flattering nature.

Urdu: امريکہ سعودی فنڈگ سے شروع ہونے والی مہم کو ختم کرنے کے لیے ان سے ہی درخواست کريں کہ خدارا اب اس گندگی کو بھی سميٹيں جو ہمارے معاشرے کو ذہر آلود کر چکی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: To bring an end to this campaign, which was started by the Saudi and American funding, a request should be made of them, for God's sake, to clean up this mess, which has poisoned our society.
Turk_Translation_2: To bring this mission, launched with the American and Saudi funding, to an end, a request should be made to both of them saying that in the name of God please clean up this filth that has poisoned our society.
Turk_Translation_3: To end this movement that started with American and Saudi funding, now request them to mop up this corruption that has contaminated our society.
Turk_Translation_4: To finish this movement started by American-Saudi funding, we will only have to request them to clean this filth which has poisoned our society.

Urdu: ان سے احتجاج بھی کريں کہ کس اخلاقيات کے تحت امريکہ اور سعودی نے ہمارے ملک ميں خطرناک اسلحہ اور نام نہاد جہادی مگرحقيقتا نفرت انگيز لٹريچر اور کلچر کا وائرس پھیلايا، جس سے ہمارے ملک ميں انسانی ذبح خانے کھلے۔
Turk_Translation_1: A protest should also be lodge with them as under what guise did America and Saudi Arabia spread the virus of dangerous weapons in our country and so-called Jihadis, and truly hateful literature and culture, which opened human slaughterhouses in our country?
Turk_Translation_2: Also record a protest with them saying that on what moral grounds the American and Saudis together spread dangerous arms and so-called jihadis, but in reality the virus of contemptuous literature and culture, as a result of which human slaughter houses were opened up in our country.
Turk_Translation_3: Also let us register protest with America and Saudi Arabia that on what moral grounds had they spread the virus of dangerous arms and so-called jihadist which are actually hate literature and culture prompting killings in our country.
Turk_Translation_4: We have to resist against them and ask as to under which moral ground America and Saudi Arabia had supplied dangerous weapons, so called Jihadis, literature, and a culture of hatred to our country which had opened human butchery in our country.

Urdu: بھارت کی طرف سے حملے کے خطرے کے بعد پاکستانی فوج کے اس اعلان نے کہ وہ افغان بارڈر سے فوج ہٹاکر بھارت کی طرف توجہ دے گا اور طالبان کا يہ اعلان کے کہ وہ افغان بارڈر سنبھالينگے امريکی بری طرح لڑکھڑا گئے اور اپنا پورا زور لگاديا کہ بھارت پاکستان پر حملہ نہ کرے۔
Turk_Translation_1: America was badly rattled when the Pakistani army declared, after fear of an Indian attack, that it would move its forces from the Afghan border and pay attention to India, and the Taliban announced that they would take care of the Afghan border. America used all means available to stop an Indian attack on Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_2: After the danger of Indian attack, the Pakistan army's announcement that they will withdraw their forces from the Afghan border to pay attention to India and, subsequently, the Taliban's announcement that they will take care of Afghan borders disturbed the Americans, who did their utmost to avoid an Indian attack on Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_3: After the threat of Indian attack and the declaration by the Pakistan army that they would move the troops from Afghan border and post them against India, and the declaration by the Taliban that they would take care of the Afghan border, America stumbled and used full force to ensure that India did not attack Pakistan.
Turk_Translation_4: After India threatened to attack, Pakistan declared its intention to remove its army from its Afghan border to tackle the current issue with India, and Taliban declared that they will look after the Afghan border. America was shattered, and left no one stone unturned to ensure that India should not attack Pakistan.

Urdu: اس سے خطہ ميں امريکی قوت کا سارا بھرم کھل گيا۔
Turk_Translation_1: And this exposed America's reputation in this area.
Turk_Translation_2: This fully exposed the secret of American strength in this region.
Turk_Translation_3: This has revealed the truth about American power in the area.
Turk_Translation_4: This has harmed America's reputation in the region.

Urdu: حالانکہ بھارت نے نہ تو حملے کی دھمکی دی اور نہ ہی اسکی اتنی ہمت ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Although India neither threatened to attack, nor does it have the guts to do so,
Turk_Translation_2: Though India neither issued the threat for attack nor it has the courage to do this.
Turk_Translation_3: Although India has neither threatened to attack nor does she have courage.
Turk_Translation_4: Although India has not threatened to attack, nor does it have the courage to do it.

Urdu: رہی سہی کثر امريکی رسد پر طالبان کے حملوں نے پوری کردي۔
Turk_Translation_1: the rest has been taken care of by the Taliban's attacks on American supplies.
Turk_Translation_2: The rest of the task was fulfilled by the Taliban's attack on the American supply line.
Turk_Translation_3: And the rest was done by the Taliban attacks on American supplies.
Turk_Translation_4: Taliban's attack on American supplies proved fatal even for them.

Urdu: ثابت ہوا کہ پاک فوج اور حکومت پاکستان کی سپورٹ کے بغير امريکہ کچھ نہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: It proves that without the support of the Pakistani army and the Pakistani Government, America is nothing.
Turk_Translation_2: It has been proven that without the support of the Pak Army and government, America is nothing.
Turk_Translation_3: Thus it is proven that without the support of Pakistan army and the government of Pakistan, America is nothing.
Turk_Translation_4: It is proved that, without the support of the Pakistan army and the government of Pakistan, America is nothing.

Urdu: کراچی پاکستان کا کاروباری مالياتی مرکز سارے پس ماندہ علاقوں کا دبئی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Karachi, Pakistan's trade and finance hub is like the Dubai of all undeveloped areas.
Turk_Translation_2: Karachi being Pakistan's financial and commercial hub is a Dubai for all under-developed areas.
Turk_Translation_3: Karachi, Pakistan's financial hub is Dubai of all the backward areas.
Turk_Translation_4: The financial business hub of Karachi, Pakistan, is the Dubai of all the backward regions.

Urdu: لاکھوں يہاں سے خالی ہاتھ کبھی نہيں لوٹتے، مگر جب سے مغربي سرحدی علاقوں ميں قانون کی بالادستی مفقود ہوئی ہے سبوں کی توجہ کراچی نے لی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Millions do not leave this place empty-handed. But ever since the western border areas have become lawless, Karachi has become the focus of everyone's attention.
Turk_Translation_2: Hundreds of thousands of people never return empty-handed from this city, but the absence of rules of law in western border areas, Karachi has invited the attention of all.
Turk_Translation_3: Millions never return empty-handed from here. But ever since the supremacy of law has been challenged in the western frontier areas, all the people have diverted their attention to Karachi.
Turk_Translation_4: Millions of people come here and no one leaves empty-handed, but after lawlessness prevailed in the border areas, Karachi has become the focal point for all.

Urdu: اب وہ اس شہر کی اغوا کے درپے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: Now they are on the verge of taking this city hostage.
Turk_Translation_2: Now they are bent upon the abduction of this city.
Turk_Translation_3: Now they are bent upon to take this city hostage.
Turk_Translation_4: Now they are bent on hijacking the city.

Urdu: پہلی بار پٹھانوں کو پختون کہا جانے لگا ہے، جو ايک شہر کے لوگوں کو اجنبی بنا کر لڑايا جا رہا ہے، حالانکہ ضرورت يک جہتی کی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: For the first time, Pathans are being referred to as Pakhtuns, and inhabitants of the same city are being considered outsiders to make them fight each other, although the need is for unity.
Turk_Translation_2: For the first time, Pathans are being regarded as Pukhtoons, due to which the residents of the same city are made to fight as strangers, whereas the need is for unity.
Turk_Translation_3: For the first time, the Pathans are being called Pakhtoons. People of the same city are being made to fight as strangers although there is need to show solidarity.
Turk_Translation_4: for the first time, Pathans are called Pakhtoons, and people of one city are lined up against the others, whereas harmony is the need of the hour.

Urdu: مسئلے کا ايک حل تو يہ ہے کہ يا تو اردو بولنے والے پشتو سيکھ ليں يا پشتو بولنے والے اردو، يا سبھی انگلش سيکھ ليں تو اور اچھا۔
Turk_Translation_1: One solution to the problem is that either the Urdu-speaking people should learn Pashto, or the Pashto-speaking people should learn Urdu, or everyone learns English, that would be even better.
Turk_Translation_2: One solution to the problem is that either those who speak Urdu should learn Pushto or those who speak Pushto should learn Urdu or much better if all learn English.
Turk_Translation_3: One solution to the problem is that all Urdu speaking people learn to speak Pushto, or vice versa. And if all the people learn to speak English, it would be even better.
Turk_Translation_4: One solution to the problem is that Urdu-speaking people should learn Pashtu and vice versa, or if all the people should learn English, all the better.

Urdu: آپ يقيناً اسے ايک مضحکہ خيز تجويز سمجھيں گےليکن آپ کو تصادم کی وجہ کيا مضحکہ خيز نہيں لگتي؟
Turk_Translation_1: You would definitely find this suggestion amusing, but don't you find the reason of the clash amusing?
Turk_Translation_2: You will certainly treat it as a ridiculous proposal, but don't you feel the reason for conflict as being silly?
Turk_Translation_3: You would definitely consider it a ridiculous piece of advice but does the cause of the clash not seem ridiculous to you?
Turk_Translation_4: You will definitely see it as a ridiculous proposal, but don't you think the reason for violence is equally ridiculous?

Urdu: کہ تشدد کي وجہ زبان ہو؟
Turk_Translation_1: That the reason for violence is language?
Turk_Translation_2: That language is the cause of violence?
Turk_Translation_3: That language may be the cause of violence?
Turk_Translation_4: Can language be the reason for violence?

Urdu: ظہير چغتائی
Turk_Translation_1: Zaheer Chughtai.
Turk_Translation_2: Zaheer Chughtai
Turk_Translation_3: Zaheer Chughtai
Turk_Translation_4: Zaheer Chughtai

Urdu: جناب يہ تجويز حقيقت ميں ميں نے اپنے دوستوں کو جن ميں ہر مذہبي اور لساني طبقے کے لوگ شامل تھے بچپن ميں بار ہا دی، پر يار لوگ ان باتوں پر ہنسا کرتے تھے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Actually, sir I gave this suggestion many times as a child to my friends who belonged to different religious and linguistic groups, but they used to laugh it off.
Turk_Translation_2: Sir, in my childhood, I presented this proposal many times to my friends consisting of people from all religious and linguistic groups, but they used to laugh at these proposals.
Turk_Translation_3: Sir, time and again I offered this piece of advice to my friends who belonged to all religious and linguistic groups, during my childhood but every time people used to laugh at it.
Turk_Translation_4: Sir, as a child, I made this suggestion many times to my friends who hailed from different religious and language groups, but they would always laugh at me.

Urdu: اس وقت ان لسانی اور مذہبی منافرتوں کے جن کي حالت آج سی جاندار اور توانا نہ تھي بس اندر ہی اندر پک رہی تھي۔
Turk_Translation_1: In those days, these linguistic and religious differences were not as strong and active as they are now. They were just percolating beneath the surface.
Turk_Translation_2: At that time, these linguistics and religious hatred was not as powerful and strong as this is today but was internally gathering strength.
Turk_Translation_3: These linguistic and religious hatreds were at that time not as powerful and strong as they are today and were mellowing within the hearts.
Turk_Translation_4: At that point in time, language- and religion-based hatred was just growing. It was not as violent and strong as it is today.

Urdu: سمجھ ہی نہيں آتا کہ يہ کيا اور کيوں ہو رہا ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: It is hard to understand what is happening and why it is happening?
Turk_Translation_2: Do not understand what and why is happening?
Turk_Translation_3: I cannot understand what this is and why this is happening.
Turk_Translation_4: I don't understand what is happening and why.

Urdu: کيا قيامت کی يہی نشانياں ہيں؟
Turk_Translation_1: Are these the signs of the Day of Judgment?
Turk_Translation_2: Are these signs of the day of judgment?
Turk_Translation_3: Are these the signs of the doomsday?
Turk_Translation_4: Is it an indication of insurrection?

Urdu: معصوم اور بيگناہ کس جرم ميں مارے جا رہے ھيں؟
Turk_Translation_1: For what reason are the innocent and blameless people being killed?
Turk_Translation_2: For what offense are the innocent and blameless being killed?
Turk_Translation_3: For what crime are the innocent people being killed?
Turk_Translation_4: Innocent people are being killed for things not their fault?

Urdu: وجوہات سبکے سامنے ہيں جو پاکستان کو ٹکڑے کرنا چاھتے ہيں وہی سرگرم ہيں اور جو يہ سب کرتے ہيں انکا نہ تو کوئی مذھب ہے اور نہ ملک۔
Turk_Translation_1: The reasons are obvious. Those who want to break up Pakistan are the ones who are emotional and they do not belong to any religion or country.
Turk_Translation_2: Reasons are in front of us all - the same people who want to turn Pakistan into pieces are active, and they don't have any country or religion.
Turk_Translation_3: The reasons are before every one. Those who want to disintegrate this country are active and those who do it have neither any religion nor any country.
Turk_Translation_4: The reasons are before everyone. Those who want to break Pakistan, only they are active. Whoever is doing all this has no religion, and belongs to no country.

Urdu: کراچی ہو يا ممبئی گھر کو آگ لگی ہے گھر کے چراغوں سے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Be it Karachi or Mumbai, the home has been set on fire by its own inhabitants.
Turk_Translation_2: Whether it is Karachi or Mumbai, both have been burned by their own people.
Turk_Translation_3: Whether it be Karachi or Mumbai, the destruction has been caused by inmates.
Turk_Translation_4: Whether it is Karachi or Mumbai, the house caught fire from its own lamp.

Urdu: جو حکومت آتی ھے وہ صرف جگہوں کے نام تبديل کر کے نام کمانے ميں لگ جاتے ہيں، جيسا کہ آجکل ائرپورٹ، روڈز، بلڈ نگز سب بينظیر۔
Turk_Translation_1: Whichever government comes in, it tries to make a name for itself simply by changing the names of places; like these days, airports, roads, buildings, everything is being named after Benazir.
Turk_Translation_2: Whichever government comes into power, they start earning their name by changing the names of places, for example, these days airport, road, building are all Benazir.
Turk_Translation_3: Whichever government comes, it only changes the names of places to become famous. For instance, now a days airports, roads and buildings are all called Benazir.
Turk_Translation_4: Whichever government comes along, it seems to be only interested in changing names for popularity. For example, airports, roads, buildings all are named after Benazeer.

Urdu: کيا بينظير کے يہی معنی ہيں جو کراچی اور پاکستان کےعوام کے ساتھ ہو رہا ہے؟
Turk_Translation_1: Does the name Benazir represent whatever is happening to the people of Karachi and Pakistan?
Turk_Translation_2: Does the "treatment" being meted out to the people of Karachi and Pakistan be called "Benazir"?
Turk_Translation_3: Does Benazir mean that what has been happening to the people of Karachi and Pakistan?
Turk_Translation_4: Whatever is happening in Karachi and Pakistan, could it be called 'Be-nazeer'?

Urdu: ممبئی حملوں کے عين عروج پر را کی طرف سے کراچی ميں لسانی فسادات شروع کروانے کی کوشش کا ناکام ہونا يہ ثابت کرتا ہے کہ ماضی ميں را کے پے رول پر کام کرنے والے سياسی عناصر اب اس نوکری سے مستعفی ہو چکے ہيں۔
Turk_Translation_1: At the peak of the Mumbai attacks, the failure of RAW that instigated riots based on linguistic differences in Karachi is proof that the political elements that used to work on RAW's payroll in the past have resigned from their job.
Turk_Translation_2: When the Mumbai attacks were at their peak, the failure of an attempt to start linguistic disturbances in Karachi proves that those who were at the payroll of RAW in the past have now resigned.
Turk_Translation_3: The failure of RAW's attempt to ignite linguistic violence in Karachi at the height of the Mumbai attacks proves that the political elements that used to be on RAW's payroll have now resigned from the service.
Turk_Translation_4: While the Mumbai terror attack is on the ascendancy, a failed attempt by RAW to incite a language-based riot shows that the political elements working on behalf of RAW, are retired from the job.

Urdu: پشتو بولنے والے محنت کشوں کے خون ناحق اور بھارتی دھمکيوں نے کراچی سے خيبر تک سوئی ہوئی پاکستانيت کو جگا ديا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The unwarranted killings of the Pashto-speaking laborers and India's threats have awakened Pakistani nationalism from Karachi to Khyber.
Turk_Translation_2: The sleeping Pakistanism has been awakened from Karachi to Khyber by the killings of innocent Pushtoon laborers and the Indian threats.
Turk_Translation_3: The murders of Pushto speaking laborers and the Indian threats have awakend the dormant nationalism in Pakistanis from Karachi to Khyber.
Turk_Translation_4: The blood of innocent Pashtu-speaking laborers and Indian threats awakened the sentiment of Pakistanism from Karachi to Khaibar.

Urdu: تمام سياسي، مذہبي، لسانی و قومی جماعتوں کے حب الوطنی سے بھر پور يکساں ردعمل نے جہاں بھارت کو سفارتی آداب سکھائے ہيں وہاں امريکی منصوبہ سازوں کو سوچنے کا ايک اور موقع بھي فراہم کيا ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: While this strong display of patriotism from all the political, religious, linguistic, and national parties has taught a diplomatic lesson to India, it has also given the American policy makers another opportunity to think.
Turk_Translation_2: A strong, uniform patriotic reaction from all political, religious, linguistic and national parities has not only taught India the diplomatic norms, it has also provided Americans with another opportunity to think about.
Turk_Translation_3: The identical patriotic reaction by all political, religious, ethnic and national parties not only made India to learn rules of diplomacy but also provided food for thought to American planners.
Turk_Translation_4: A full and similar reaction of patriotism from all political, religious, linguistic and national parties had, on the one hand, taught India the etiquette of diplomacy, and at the same time, it provided American strategists one more chance to think.

Urdu: کراچی ميں حالات خرابی کی ذمہ دارمتحدہ اور اے اين پی ہيں اور انتظاميہ جانبداری برت رہی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Muttahida and ANP are responsible for the deterioration of the situation of Karachi, and the administration is being biased.
Turk_Translation_2: Mutahiddah and ANP are responsible for the bad situation in Karachi, whereas the administration is partially.
Turk_Translation_3: The responsibility for the worsening of the situation in Karachi lies on Muttahida and ANP and the administration is taking sides.
Turk_Translation_4: The Alliance and the ANP are responsible for the bad situation in Karachi, and the administration is also being partial in this matter.

Urdu: انتظاميہ 1گھنٹہ ميں حالات کنٹرول کر سکتی ہے مگر جان بوجھہ کر اس کو ہوا دي جا رہي ہے
Turk_Translation_1: The administration can control the situation in an hour, but it is consciously adding fuel to the fire.
Turk_Translation_2: The administration can control the situation within one hour, but they are intentionally backing it
Turk_Translation_3: The administration can control situation in 1 hour but this is being aggravated on purpose,
Turk_Translation_4: The administration could control the situation in one hour, but it has been ignored and provoked intentionally.

Urdu: ، پوليس اور رينجر پرسياسی جماعتوں کا دباؤ ہونے کی وجہ سے کارروائی کرنے سےگريز کرتی ہے۔
Turk_Translation_1: Police and Rangers avoid taking any action due to the pressure of the political parties.
Turk_Translation_2: It avoids taking action due to pressure on the police and the rangers from the political parties.
Turk_Translation_3: due to the pressure of political parties on police and rangers, it refrains from taking action.
Turk_Translation_4: There is political pressure on police and rangers, because of which they avoid taking action.

Urdu: اتحاد کرنے کي باتيں صرف بيانات تک محدود ہيں، سياسی جماعتوں کو اپنے مفادات ترک کرکے عام انسان کے مفاد کے ليے کام کرنا چاہيے۔
Turk_Translation_1: The talk of unity is only limited to talk. Political parties should forget about their political gains and work for the betterment of the common man.
Turk_Translation_2: The talks about unity are limited only to giving statements; political parties should leave their own interests and work for the well-being of the common man.

Turk_Translation_2: It appears that after submitting the draft Eighteenth Amendment, these parties have created a proof of their effort, which means they are now able to tell the people tomorrow that they had submitted the amendment, but the speaker of the government party did not process it.
Turk_Translation_3: It seems as if these parties have hoodwinked people by submitting the manuscripts of the 18th amendment. This means that they have got the justification now that they had submitted the amendment and it was the ruling party's Speaker who did not initiate proceedings on it.
Turk_Translation_4: It seems that, by only submitting the amendment bill, they cleared the air and can say that they had submitted the amendment but the government had not acted on it.

Urdu: ایم کیو ایم حکومت کی اتحادی، مسلم لیگ ن حکومت کی درپردہ حلیف اور مسلم لیگ ق سترہویں ترمیم پاس کرنے والی جماعت تو پھر کیسے ہو سکتا ہے یہ جماعتیں سترہویں ترمیم ختم کرنے میں مخلص ہوں۔
Turk_Translation_1: MQM, the government's ally; Muslim League (N), the government's ally behind the scenes; and Muslim League (Q), the party that got the seventeenth amendment passed - how then can these parties be sincere in getting the seventeenth amendment annulled?
Turk_Translation_2: MQM is a coalition partner of the government, Muslim league N is a hidden ally of the government, whereas Muslim League Q is a party responsible for passing the Seventeenth Amendment. How, then, can it be possible for these parties to be sincere in doing away with the Seventeenth Amendment.
Turk_Translation_3: MQM is the ally of the government while the Muslim League (N) is the hidden ally and the Muslim League (Q) is the party that passed the 17th amendment, how can these parties be sincere in repealing the 17th amendment.
